descriptionHTML:
Help your people! Join the fight against the Skeleton Boss, and become the best hero in the dungeons.

Live a real adventure with this online Action MMORPG game. Enjoy Dungeon Legends for free, and discover an endless world of battles, quests, and epic creatures.

Dungeon Legends is a hack & slash game optimized for mobile devices. A classic ARPG experience adapted to touch screens.

Fight against other players in the pvp multiplayer modes like the Arena, and become a legend of the dungeons. Go over the dungeons looking for incredible adventures, and legendary treasures, or ask for help to overcome the quests of the online cooperative multiplayer mode. Join a clan and fight the most epic battles to conquer the dungeons.

Adapt your hero to your gameplay. Turn your Dwarf into an epic warrior, a healer, a hunter or a protector. Train your hero in the adventure quests, and fight other heroes in the online pvp multiplayer arena.

🐲 BUILD YOUR OWN ADVENTURE
It was a long time ago, but Dwarfs remember the Skeleton Boss. He attacked the villages with his army of goblins, skeletons, trolls, and balrogs. But Dwarfs do not surrender, they fear nothing, and they cooperated to hunt their enemies, and battle that army.
Dwarfs defeated the Skeleton Boss, and force him to hide in the ancient Dungeons.

Now, the Skeleton Boss is back.

He is summoning an army to leave his prison, and take revenge on the Dwarfs.
The Skeleton Boss is waiting in his throne, deep in the Dungeons.The only hope for the Dwarfs is to find him, cooperate, and hunt him before he recovers his power.

🔮DISCOVER AN ENDLESS ADVENTURE RPG GAME
Each quest in this Action RPG is unique. Unleash your arcane powers, and hack and slash the evil creatures with a good strategy to obtain legendary rewards. Hunt the evil in the campaign or take part on the multiplayer battles onlines.

⚔️ FIGHT IN THE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER ARENA
Fight epic PvP battles with other heroes, or the online multiplayer modes. Enter the arena alone or with friends, and prove you are the best evil hunter in the dungeons.

🏆 PARTICIPATE IN PVE/PVP EVENTS
Help your fellows dwarves in the PvE events, and compete with them in the PvP battles. Each week there is a new opportunity to prove yourself as the best dwarf.

🎮 ENJOY A TRUE ACTION RPG GAME
This mmorpg controls are designed for touch screens. Hack & Slash game mechanics adapted to mobile devices.

🎁SHARE YOUR ADVENTURES ONLINE
Explore the online multiplayer coop adventures with your friends. Cooperate with other epic heroes online to complete the hardest quests or fight against them in the online multiplayer PvP arena.

⭐️ AWESOME FEATURES:
- Play a true Action RPG adventure
- Enjoy the Hack & Slash mechanics
- Fight in epic multiplayer battles against other heroes online
- Join other heroes to complete the online coop quests
- Play PvP fights in the dungeons
- Participate in weekly PvE events
- Team up with your friends in the online coop adventure
- PvE events, PvP battles, online multiplayer battles, and coop battles can be played for free

If you are looking for a new hack & slash game and mobile action rpg game, this mmorpg adventure game will be your new favourite RPG, action MMO, online RPG, and PvP game. Will you be the best dwarf? Be prepared for amazing boss battles, legendary online PvE quests, coop multiplayer levels full of action, and a new world full of arcane magic.

Please note:
- This epic MMORPG game is free to play, but in-apps items can be purchased with real money. To restrict in-app purchases adjust the settings on your device.
- Dungeon Legends is an online ARPG game, and requires an Internet connection to play.

---

Join the Official Forum: http://forum.codigames.com

comments: Very good app that trains logical thinking. If you want to be a computer scientist, math isnt everything since math and logic are different areas. This game gives a pretty good idea of whats behind coding, and its a good supplement to play when you are bored while improving some skills at the same time. The controls could improve, such as being able to reset the bots position, or cancel a loop run without having to reset all the code. Im looking forward for more planets :D

One of the best applications I have encountered till date. Am not into programming, but still had to learn it as a necessary course for a semester. There was no need of it afterwards, so the teachers were simply skimming everything. We were taught from basics to looping in two classes with zero previous knowledge about programming. But still this thing caught my attention. Only if they would have recommended this game to one and all, we would have spent a nice semester. This game pretty much explains the basics, but with better understanding. Great job.

Love this game/app. I mean the only thing I wish it had a little more instruction to learn from (I got function-2 but not the way it should have been done.)  Just as I am "self teaching" with only books and apps. But anyway this app still gets 5 stars.

For User: If u intrested about programing language.Play this helpful game to learn basic , function and loop methods of programing.  For Developer: This is helpful fun game for learning programing game.Keep try. I want to advise you.  First: When U go your Profile,use Intent To Direct Facebook App when Facebook App is Installed. Second: Use Rate This App Function to get more Point on Your App. Third. When I tap RUN button,it cannot stop if loop was entered.So use pause and stop buttons for 2 functions because if i can't stop i tap Retry button and all of code are gone away and stard think again.it's the bad moment for me.  More Easy More Powerful.Thaks.

Difficulty level is all over the place. Doesn't really do well to teach programing concepts and more of just puzzles.   Coding is about finding the most efficient way to do something.   The game actually encourages you to do an infinite loop and run redundant steps to complete a puzzle.   Crashes almost all the time

It's interesting, but my main gripe is that it really doesn't feel like you're learning how to code. There's also a bug where if you press the restart button it erases all your work. So, if your robot is stuck in an endless loop, you can't save your work at all. It's also a bit short at the moment, finished all the levels in under an hour.

description: ‚óÜ Sign-up now to Fatal Raid and receive your rewards~! ‚óÜGet 2600 Gems, 300 Energy, Character Hilda (7days)![Game Features]The zombie apocalypse has arrived. Carnage ravages the streets of Nova City. All that stands between its salvation and ultimate destruction is a squad of elite super soldiers. Do you have what it takes to fight back the undead horde and reclaim the city?Fatal Raid is an action packed first-person shooter like you've never seen. No mere mobile game, Fatal Raid gives you the full FPS experience right at your fingertips. From the complex, story-driven single player mode to the realtime PvP battles, Fatal Raid has unparalleled depth and replayability.[Single Player Campaign]Fatal Raid provides a rich and compelling single player experience. Uncover the truth of what happened in Nova City as you are guided by your deep-cover mole towards the city center. But as you fight your way through the war-torn streets, you'll discover that zombies aren't the only enemies standing in your way...‚ñ∂ Hours of voice acting and cut scenes, to fully immerse you in the apocalyptic hellscape of Nova City‚ñ∂ Massive range of weapons and weapon types to unlock. Assault rifles for taking down multiple targets, sniper rifles for long range engagements, shotguns for close encounters; be sure to bring the right hardware for each mission. There's even machetes and chainsaws for when you really need to get up close and personal.‚ñ∂ Boss Battles. Take on some truly epic enemies in the insane boss fights, and get rewarded with unique items. If they're too tough you can recruit up to three friends to help you out. Strength in numbers![Multiplayer Mode]The true essence of an FPS is in its multiplayer mode, and Fatal Raid is no different. Challenge people online in real-time with head to head battles, competitive missions, or clan wars.‚ñ∂ PvP Team Death Match: The classic battle to the death. Face your opponents either solo or as a unit, and prove once and for all who the champ really is.‚ñ∂ PvP Bombing Mission: compete against other teams in this competitive mission mode. Be the first team to capture strategic points, or take out key objectives. Individual skill is important, but it's teamwork that rules the day this game mode.‚ñ∂ Survival Mode: They don't call it a zombie horde for nothing. Waves of enemies will crash against you with increasing fury until they take you down. The question is, how long can you last, and how many will you take down with you? For true masters only.‚ñ∂ Robust Clan System: Join a clan, or start your own with your friends. Challenge other clans to competitions and earn special rewards for participating in clan activities.Jump right into the Recruit Training course and start reaping the rewards of being part of this elite group of soldiers.  Install this game and just complete the Recruit Training course that lasts for 7 days, and you‚Äôll get to enjoy a lot of benefits! Fatal Raid is the best shooting game there is! Download it now for free!Official Forum: http://cafe.naver.com/fatalraidFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/fatalraid[Device Permission Use Information]READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGEThese permissions are required to write files in an external memory device.RECORD_AUDIOThis permission is required to record voice along with video while you play the game.----Developer Contact Information:help@selvas.com

[Single Player Campaign]

Fatal Raid provides a rich and compelling single player experience. Uncover the truth of what happened in Nova City as you are guided by your deep-cover mole towards the city center. But as you fight your way through the war-torn streets, you'll discover that zombies aren't the only enemies standing in your way...

▶ Hours of voice acting and cut scenes, to fully immerse you in the apocalyptic hellscape of Nova City

▶ Massive range of weapons and weapon types to unlock. Assault rifles for taking down multiple targets, sniper rifles for long range engagements, shotguns for close encounters; be sure to bring the right hardware for each mission. There's even machetes and chainsaws for when you really need to get up close and personal.

▶ Boss Battles. Take on some truly epic enemies in the insane boss fights, and get rewarded with unique items. If they're too tough you can recruit up to three friends to help you out. Strength in numbers!

[Multiplayer Mode]

The true essence of an FPS is in its multiplayer mode, and Fatal Raid is no different. Challenge people online in real-time with head to head battles, competitive missions, or clan wars.

▶ PvP Team Death Match: The classic battle to the death. Face your opponents either solo or as a unit, and prove once and for all who the champ really is.

▶ PvP Bombing Mission: compete against other teams in this competitive mission mode. Be the first team to capture strategic points, or take out key objectives. Individual skill is important, but it's teamwork that rules the day this game mode.

▶ Survival Mode: They don't call it a zombie horde for nothing. Waves of enemies will crash against you with increasing fury until they take you down. The question is, how long can you last, and how many will you take down with you? For true masters only.

▶ Robust Clan System: Join a clan, or start your own with your friends. Challenge other clans to competitions and earn special rewards for participating in clan activities.
Jump right into the Recruit Training course and start reaping the rewards of being part of this elite group of soldiers.

Install this game and just complete the Recruit Training course that lasts for 7 days, and you’ll get to enjoy a lot of benefits!

Fatal Raid is the best shooting game there is! Download it now for free!

Official Forum: http://cafe.naver.com/fatalraid
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fatalraid

These permissions are required to write files in an external memory device.

This permission is required to record voice along with video while you play the game.

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

comments: I've enjoyed playing this game since I downloaded it. I do have a couple of issues with it though. First, each level seems to be different in terms of which words they will accept as "bonus words". Some levels accept certain words, while others don't. Second, this game has a ridiculous amount of ads. An ad will pop up after each level you complete. I understand the devs need to make money, and I don't have an issue with ads themselves. This game just seems to have an excessive amount. Otherwise it is a fun little game. I like playing it while waiting for Word Cookies updates.

Please add these and will rate 5 stars. 1) same music keeps repeating. Please make the music longer. 2) please make the family shown in tge pictures appear in real game. 3) please change the setting according to the name of the chapter. Till now this game is Similar to Word Genius. Please make these improvements for 5 stars.

GAME HAS ADS THAT FREEZE YOUR SCREEN UNLESS YOU INSTALL THEM! YOU CANT GO BACK TO THE GAME. THE ONLY WAY TO GET RID OF IT ON YOUR SCREEN, IS TO CLOSE DOWN THE AP, AND REOPEN IT. I'LL CHOOSE WHICH GAMES I WANT TO INSTALL, NOT YOU. REMOVE THIS FEATURE, AND I'LL GIVE 5 STARS.

descriptionHTML:
Think, search, swipe and connect all letters into words!

What is Wordsdom?
An interesting word game with endless fun!
Thousands of puzzles of words!
The best choice for family and friends!

What are you waiting for? Just click and start to play! Challenge yourself!
Play Wordsdom, the addictive word puzzle game, for once and you can’t stop playing it! More importantly, Wordsdom is a free game and you can play it whenever you like, wherever you are. The fun is ready for you anytime!

How to play:
• Easy to learn. Swipe your finger over letters, search, connect and combine a word.
• Flexible to control. Connecting words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backwards.
• Plain and clear. If you've found a valid word it will remain highlighted and marked on the word list as found.

Wordsdom is more than special!
• Simple, easy, and addictive puzzle gameplay!
• 2000+ levels with infinite word puzzles await you!
• Login every day to get a wonderful daily bonus for FREE to unlock higher levels and solve more puzzles!
• Enjoyable graphics will bring you and your friends a brilliant puzzle memory of words!
• Without time limit, you can use time wisely to find new words and solve puzzles at your own pace!
• No Wifi? Don’t worry, play Wordsdom and clear word puzzles anytime, anywhere!
• Support both phones and tablets.
• FREE update to unlock more word puzzles!

Wordsdom is a perfect choice for fans of classic word search or swipe games and crossword puzzles. Try not to guess but to use your word intelligence so as to solve difficult puzzles more efficiently. And remember to share the fun with your family and friends, so as to enjoy this addictive Wordsdom together!
We sincerely hope that you can have a good time with our word puzzle game. So if you have any comments, questions or feedback, please contact us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Wordsdom2018

descriptionHTML:
Safely guide the jumping ball through the helix tower maze! Don't hit yellow!

Helix Jump is super simple to learn yet insanely addictive to play. Here's how to play Helix Jump…

HOW TO PLAY HELIX JUMP:
- Rotate the helix maze by sliding your finger horizontally across your screen so that the jumping ball can fall through the gaps in the helix tower.
- Be careful to not let the jumping ball hit the yellow planks in the helix maze or it's game over!

Good luck and have fun playing Helix Jump.

comments: I love this game! I have never played a game for such a long time before, I have stuck around for a year. I spend a few dollars every month but now that the connection to server times out I am reconsidering my devotion to the game. I will definitely not spend any money on the game until the sync to server issue has been resolved. Will update review if that happens.

Paying player here. Was very happy with the game until patch 1.9.6. Whoever thought it was a good idea to force you to NOT be idle in order to progress in a game advertised as an IDLE game should be fired or forced to realise their seriously flawed decision making. Patch 1.9.7 did NOT fix  this. Tempted to take my time and money elsewhere. Just hanging on by a thread, the memory of over a year of this patch not existing. Fix this stupidity, or lose people. Fast!

I still love the game, and will for now continue playing, but a server issue introduced over the past couple of weeks has made playing difficult. This passive online game now randomly stops connecting to the server without letting you know. It can happen at random, and resets your progress for the past hour or two. Extremely frustrating.
Sync to server issue has completely ruined this game. I'm constantly having to reload the game and lose progress in doing so.  Complete joke of an update.

After the last update the game has become unbearable to play. It constantly locks up and becomes unresponsive. When you log out after playing and log back in again later your progress is missing. The game has become very unenjoyable and the devs aren't doing anything to fix this problem.

Game is unplayable since the 1.9.6 update. My game stops syncing with the server or something and I have to restart ever 5 mins. I can't play like this and if it's not fixed I'm quitting. It's not an idle game if you can't idle. That's the whole point!

descriptionHTML:
Legendary heroes join an endless idle RPG battle that began over a thousand years ago! Fight legendary monsters, enter online PvP role playing battles and end the reign of the Dark Prince in Endless Frontier!

Travel across endless stages of fantasy RPG action with online PvP games, offline RPG guild wars and plenty of treasures to unlock! Upgrade your character with limitless fantasy RPG power ups and take control of legendary heroes in the Endless Frontier!

After failing to defeat the dreadful Prince of Darkness, Erin vows to revive himself again and again to organize the Knightgage of Dimension! Join the automatic fantasy RPG action!

Endless Frontier Features:

1. Idle RPG Fantasy Games
★ Idle RPG gameplay in an exciting fantasy adventure!
★ Lead your knights into the heat of battle and defeat the dreaded Prince of Darkness in epic autoquests!

2. Legendary Heroes
★ Heroes number over 150 and have their own powers – Which ones will you command?
★ Monster trainer – Recruit more than 50 pets to aid you in your quest!
★ Command more than 100 kinds of army units, to become legends of war!

3. Endless Inflation RPG
★ Grow stronger each time you revive with progressive gameplay!
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Level up and tap your way through an expansive frontier of over 9000 stages!

4. Online PvP Guild Wars and Dungeon Games
★ Online multiplayer awaits with endless PvP battles and 200 vs. 200 guild wars that offer endless fun
★ Dungeon boss battles award you with 20 kinds of unique treasures and rare gifts

5. Find Gifts and Treasures
★ Discover more than 200 relics to aid you in your autoquest
★ Get treasure chests in each stage for even more great rewards!
★Obtain gold automatically the longer you stay in the frontier, the more chances you’ll have to tap and find more treasures


Traverse the frontier, take on your friends and see why Endless Frontier is one of the best idle RPG games on the market, today!


■ Rights Information
We request the following permissions for smooth gameplay.

[ Modify or delete the contents of your SD card (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) ]
Use an external storage such as SD cards to save and load game data.

[ Find accounts on the device (GET_ACCOUNTS) ]
This right is need for the linkage and notification between your game account and google account information.

[ Read cell phone's status and ID (READ_PHONE_STATE) ]
Inquire the device information for the advertising services provided within the customer interaction and game. (Manufacturer, model, OS version, etc.)

[ The approximate location (network-based) (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION) ]
Use the network/wifi information to provide the advertisement in one of the advertising services because items can be obtained free of charge after seeing it.
summary: Free RPG Online! Idle RPG with Tactical PVP, Battle Arena, Knights & Dragons!
title: Endless Frontier Saga ‚Äì RPG Online

This is probably gonna be my longest ever review for a game, so:  Where do I start with Agent A? Its sublime graphics? Its almost superb controls? Its value for money? The story is interesting (and full of twists, wink, wink) and gripping. The puzzles are a perfect difficulty, and hitting the solution gives you that beautiful "Ah-HA!" moment. The permissions (and nagging to rate, like, or tip them) are few and far between. Honestly, it's the best game (on Android) that I have ever played. Can't wait for chapter 5! Take your time to develop the ending to the best that you think you can. Until then, I'll try and go for the Speedy Agent achievement :)  -DungeonCrawler (and no, I'm not a bot.)

One among the best game I've ever played. Credits to developers. You are awesome guys, with just a team of 2, this is incredible.   Coming to the puzzles, it was like wowww! You guys never failed to amaze me throughout the game. I don't remember the last time I had to think so much. Thank you so much.  I bought this game when it was on sale, and I truly regret that. Sorry! Waiting for the chapter 5.

Im giving this a 4 star as I really dislike using the 2 finger method of going back. Annoying. Also why do we have to wait for stage 5 to be developed? I'd expect that with free games, but not games we pay.
description: Selected as a Google Play Android Excellence Game of 2018.Agent A, your new mission is in from headquarters. An enemy spy known as Ruby La Rouge has been targeting our secret agents. descriptionHTML:
Selected as a Google Play Android Excellence Game of 2018.

Agent A, your new mission is in from headquarters. An enemy spy known as Ruby La Rouge has been targeting our secret agents. Your mission is to find and capture her.

First we need you to follow Ruby, then locate and infiltrate her secret lair. Once inside it is imperative that you uncover her plans.

Oh and agent... do be careful. Miss La Rouge has a taste for dismissing agents such as yourself.

———————————————————————————

Agent A: A puzzle in disguise is an episodic tale of espionage spanning five chapters:

Chapter 1 - A puzzle in disguise
Chapter 2 - The chase continues
Chapter 3 - Ruby's trap
Chapter 4 - A narrow escape (OUT NOW!)
Chapter 5 - The final blow (2018 Q2)

You play as Agent A, your mission (should you choose to accept it) is to infiltrate the secret hideout of Ruby La Rouge and apprehend or neutralise the target.

Uncover a stylish 60s themed world full of retro futuristic contraptions, hidden gizmos, gadgets and clever logic based puzzles. But do be warned… Ruby La Rouge is no spy to be taken lightly! Explore a labyrinth of perplexing puzzles in this quirky game of cat and mouse that’ll have you wondering whether you’re the cat… or the mouse!!

Notice something strange or out of place? Making mental notes and observations (like a good secret agent) will aid you in solving tricky puzzles later on. As you explore Rubys secret hideout, collecting objects and using them cleverly is crucial in unlocking a trail of puzzles leading you ever closer to your target!

Agent A features:
* Stylish 1960’s inspired art
* 26 environments to explore, 72 inventory based puzzles and 42 puzzle screens
* 13 achievements to collect, for the trophy hunter in all of us


———————————————————————————

If you like escape games, you will love Agent A!

One Purchase - No In App purchases.

***** Game of the Year AGDA 2016 Winner *****
***** PAX Indie Showcase Winner 2017 and 2015! *****

4/5 Touch Arcade "This is one of the most playable and least frustrating adventure games I've played, and it speaks to the strength of the game design that it is great."

AppUnwrapper "Agent A feels like something really special."

———————————————————————————

Are you clever enough to outsmart Ruby? Slip into the exciting world of espionage with Agent A now!


*Agent A does not require any special permissions. If permissions are shown other than network access, please review permissions on your Android device.
summary: An episodic tale of espionage
title: Agent A: A puzzle in disguise

description: Draw as many lines or polygons as needed to gradually make the ball fall into the U. Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines! This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button. Physics Drop is a fun way of practising physics... download it and try!
descriptionHTML:
Draw as many lines or polygons as needed to gradually make the ball fall into the U.
Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity.
Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!
This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve.
If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
Physics Drop is a fun way of practising physics... download it and try!
recentChanges: With our new Chronometer feature, your best completion time per puzzle is saved for you to check and challenge yourself anytime.
How quick are you solving the puzzles?
summary: Push the ball into the U by drawing lines and polygons!
title: Physics Drop

comments: I'm sure this is a fun game, however I do not see the reason why it needs to have permission to manage my phone calls or know my location if I never plan to use any online abilities. That is just too much access to my phone. I did not even get a chance to play the game because it wanted that access on start up; it will not allow you to play the game without give permission.

It's a great strategic game. PvP is more event driven rather than a free for all.Great value for the money you spend whether it's a little or a lot...and the purchases give a little free to your team. Lots of ways to win free stuff and points you can spend on items needed in alliance store and keep up with your wallet warrior team mate. One downside is the support..they can be a little sliw in response time to problems. But they don't just ignore you either.

Why does this app request access to make calls/read sms/messages? Un-installed right away.  Edit: That's not how it works. Just because you say "your phone is safe" doesn't make it safe. You're still getting the permission from un-educated users that you can read their messages. That's very shady.

Stuff stuff goody good good forensic anthropology your pizza up your potato juice ham sandwich with homework for your face mouth nose elbow skin football Olympic gold karrot. Tough to install, took me about 5 ham sandwiches until this thing fuannlay installed. This piece of shananagins went down a water stream faster than your baby TV

Why need to be legendary first to send rallies? In previous games that I played you don't need it to send rallies. Rallies are what makes an alliance one and it should be done even if you're not in legendary... Still love the game tho..

Less false advertising would be better the game is not like what the video shows I found this on YouTube. May I make a suggestion..dont advertise it like runescape. I don't like playing games that false advertise. I am going to be making up a YouTube page where it is going to identify every game on advertising and how the game really is.
description: Our brand new hero system is just around the corner! In the ever turbulent land of ROK war is here, there... everywhere. People are suffering from war and pain. In these, the most crucial of times, a group of heroes must rise up! They are a group of the most gifted people and the most magical of creatures coming! With their tremendous talent, they will turn the tide in battle or play a pivotal role in your Castle development. Choose the heroes you yearn for in the new update, and have them join the fight against you enemies!  The Great Dragon casts his shadow across the land...In Rise of the Kings, players from all over the world battle to rule this new epic real time strategy game online. Utilizing the best of theRTS, RPG, and MMO gaming genres, take your place in this epic war game as one of many Lords fighting for survival in a hostile fantasy world. In this army game you hold the fate of your kingdom, your army, and yourself firmly in your hands. Tap and install this mobile game to train an army to clash with evil in the best online empire game available! Rally your friends and engage in epic clashes against determined enemies and fearsome foes. Utilize clever strategy, superior leadership, and cunning diplomacy, to rise to the top and claim the crown and the throne. Download this top fantasy RTS MMO today on your phone or tablet and begin playing online with players from around the world! Amass Your Army - Gather friends, old and new, and form a top Alliance to conquer the best new war strategy game available. - Build your empire and train an army, then lead them in PVP war against friends, new and old! - Train your army, lead them into battle, and crush your enemies.Explore the Wild Lands! - Stalk the monster clans roaming the lands and dungeons, and kill them to sharpen your skills and claim their treasure. - Explore the dark dungeons inside the Ruins of the old Kings, and face down the Dark Guards to uncover the riches of the ancients. A King will Rise - If you love PvP challenges, then prove your mettle against the best Lords in the Realm. - Grow faster, build faster, train faster, and then put it all on the line against the terrifying Orcs, the ghastly Grimm Raider Clan, and more as you clash with other ambitious Lords. - Do you have what it takes to Rise and become King? Shoot us a message at servicerok@onemt.com with any questions or comments relating to this wicked multiplayer strategy war game. Ask us anything! Also, connect with Rise of the Kings and friends:https://www.facebook.com/RiseoftheKings

descriptionHTML:
😜 You can’t miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you’re taken on a hilarious adventure where you’ll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.

😊 To spare their embarrassment, we’re not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won’t escape Troll Face’s ridiculous pranks.

😬 TROLL OR BE TROLLED?
How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time.

• 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL
• Experience new controls
• Unlock wacky achievements
• Conquer the global leaderboard
• Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi needed

😁 So whether you’re a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you’re sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.

We love your feedback! What’s your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!

#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames
summary: Now you can troll your favorite video game characters in this hilarious sequelüòÑ

descriptionHTML:
Express your creativity as you customize your Sims’ distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and décor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims’ lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell?

CREATE UNIQUE SIMS
Customize Sims’ appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.

BUILD THE PERFECT HOME
Design your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub.

SHAPE YOUR SIMS’ LIFESTYLE
Guide the stories of your Sims’ lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms.

PLAY TOGETHER
Host and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people’s Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, vote for the most popular Sims as they make their way to fame.

There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!

descriptionHTML:
- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration - one of the best pixelated games in the first-person mode, time-tested! This game will not leave you indifferent and will present many interesting subjects and opportunities.

This game is created in the style of a sandbox with an open world, in which the player does not have any specific goals. You choose what to do in this game.

Explore the endless world of blocks and cubes. The most interesting war against zombies at night. Crafting and gathering, survival and building. And much much much more ...

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration provides the player with a three-dimensional generated world, entirely consisting of cubic blocks. This world you can freely rebuild, creating from the blocks of complex structures.

Features:

*** Easy operation and unrivaled interface
*** A lot of game modes of the game.
*** Numerous types of weapons for your taste.
*** Zombies and fighting with them.
*** The most diverse construction. Even more possibilities for creativity without limits.
*** Beautiful pixel graphics Super HD. Very beautiful texture in high resolution.
*** High FPS, without compromise.
*** For children and adults.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game has three modes.

Survival mode.
In this mode, you must extract natural resources (wood and stone, various minerals). Of these, you can build a variety of tools, blocks and elements. In the dark hours of the day there are dangerous monsters and zombies.

Creativity.
In this mode, you have unlimited access to all things, things, and building blocks. You can instantly destroy any blocks.

Multiplayer mode.
The name of this regime speaks for itself. Play with your friends and win.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game is developed by a professional team of developers with the involvement of design, rezhsure and sound specialists.

The pixel world is waiting for you!
summary: - # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -
title: Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration

comments: Maybe add an option to disable some graphics. Like the fimish animation. It does not add much to the game experience but it affects the performance quite a bit.  About the ads: I have premium, and I only have to watch an ad if I choose to get a reward in return. There are no sudde, unwanted or random ads anymore.

Simple game. Ads galore. Also when ads pop up better not be listening to music because it's gonna pause your music even if the ad has 0 sound. Thus the one star rating. You can advertise all you want but don't interrupt any background apps to force me to look at your ad. That's just messed up.

First of all the game it self is a great little game. Graphics are fine game play is simple and easy to pick up it's a good game. Now for the reason it only gets two stars. WAY TO MANY ADS! I mean for f@$k sake every two seconds there's an ad. Click on the car buying button there's an ad. Sit there to long there's an ad. I understand this is how you make your money but come on there's a line and you didn't just cross it you swan dived over that bad boy. I'm sorry but I do not recommended this game for anyone.

Potential to be a great game but wayyyy to many ads, like every 10 seconds of gameplay there's a 30 second ad, and when you choose to watch an ad to get a reward you never actually get it. Waste of time. No idol earnings so you have to have the app open to advance and forces you to watch more ads.i get you want to make money but this app is basically unplayable.
A 60 second add for every 30 seconds of play is ridiculous. All I can say is don't waste your time unless you like to learn how to kill a game with to many advertisments

Just...bad. The concept is simple enough. It forces you to watch ads pretty much any time you accomplish something, whether you know it or not. The mechanics are poorly-thought-out and I frequently would hit the "wrong" button while trying to play, which would cancel my productivity. Not worth my time and not worth yours.

description: Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.The Underbelly of the Justice System...Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you. Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation. Time is of the Essence... It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down. Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life. Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. descriptionHTML:
Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.

The Underbelly of the Justice System...
Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you.

Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation.

Time is of the Essence...
It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down.

Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...
When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life.

Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

descriptionHTML:
Its a physics puzzle game.
Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity.
You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..
When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!
Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!
This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
summary: Its a nice brain-training game.
title: Puzzle Studio - Physical Line

comments: What really drew me into this game was the the Pac-Man promotion, I love a good crossover and I can say with total certainty that I wouldn't be playing it if I couldn't play as Pac-Man, he's such a good inclusion. It's a super addictive game, setting it aside to do something else is quite difficult, hours go be seamlessly when playing it. The graphics as well are beautiful, very vibrant and colourful.   I have a few minor gripes with the game though, it crashed on me and when I restarted the game I had briefly lost all my content, that gave me a minor scare. The game is heavily geared towards microtransactions as well, unless you're prepared to pay money, get ready for a very, very long grind trying to get the stuff you want. Having said all that I absolutely love the game, very glad I downloaded it.
Game looks good and it's well design, but far too many gimmicks and interruption. Hardly ever can actually run. Plus some silly hanging in the air for no reason. Got bored in 5 m

This game is one of the best out there. Now I know it might seem like a remake of Subway Surfers or any other endless runner game out there, but I must say, Sonic Dash is much more than that. You can do way more in this game than you could in Subway Surfers. I would recommend this game of you haven't tried it. It's occupies time and above all else, this is a great game!

descriptionHTML:
Play as Sonic the Hedgehog as you dash, jump and spin your way across stunning 3D environments. Swipe your way over and under challenging obstacles in this fast and frenzied endless running game.

SONIC…
The world famous Sonic the Hedgehog stars in his first endless running game – how far can you go?

…DASH!
Unleash Sonic’s incredible dash move that allows you to run at insane speed and destroy everything in your path!

AMAZING ABILITIES
Utilise Sonic’s powers to dodge hazards, jump over barriers and speed around loop de loops. Plus defeat enemies using Sonic’s devastating homing attack!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Sonic’s beautifully detailed world comes to life on mobile and tablet – never has an endless runner looked so good!

MULTIPLE CHARACTERS
Choose to play as one of Sonic’s friends, including Tails, Shadow and Knuckles.

EPIC BOSS BATTLES
Face off against two of Sonic's biggest rivals, the always scheming and cunning Dr. Eggman and the devastatingly deadly Zazz from Sonic Lost World! Use all of Sonic's agility and speed to take down these villains before it's too late!

POWERUPS
Unlock, win or buy ingenious power-ups to help you run further. Including head starts, shields, ring magnets and unique score boosters!

KEEP ON RUNNING
Get more rewards the more you play! Level up your score multiplier by completing unique missions, or win amazing prizes including Red Star Rings & additional characters by completing Daily Challenges and playing the Daily Spin.

SOCIALLY CONNECTED
Challenge your friends on the leader boards or invite your friends through Facebook to prove who the best speed runner is…

comments: It's a simple little game that allows you to unplug your brain and allow the white noise of the universe wash over you. Not as challenging as Dark Souls. It's not even as challenging as peeling a potato. It does the job of distracting me from the stuff I should be doing.

Can't get the first fight to load. Game just freezes. Uninstalled and reinstalled 4 times now...and I still can't even get the very first fight to load. Pretty lame really...I thought this might be a cool game.
I have an issue, any time I tap the battle button it sends me to an empty background where nothing loads but the music so I can't even get past the tutorial... Any way to fix this?

Downloaded today cause it looks pretty cool. Well, everything works except the battle. Went to battle and all I get is the field background and music. Cant do anything until this is fixed. Will update review when this major bug is fixed.
Game is too simple no interaction in combat some taps for menus not fun to play at all. Also had a lot of ads play I put maybe 30 min in and saw 7 or 8 ads play
Fun game. Entertaining and easy to play. Glad I can walk away while it's running so I don't feel stuck starring at the screen.

comments: Love the detail of going down to nut and bolts practically to do repairs. Two bones of contention:  The timer to access new barns is too long, does not make for satisfying game play. Also, after purchasing a tool upgrade, I was pleased to see a longer list of repairs gained. Great. Except I couldn't remove the fuel pump to remove the fuel tank. It said my tools needed upgrading for that one part. Please fix that bug so all repairs needed can be made with tool set level.

It's a good game with room for improvement, I've leveled up my tools to level 4 but it's so annoying when it says tools need to be upgraded, this need to be  improved. All so when you fix a vehicle the money could be upped a bit more. I know you can re-paint the vehicle but I wish you could improve the wheels and the interior of the vehicle to make some more money. The other thing that the other paint uses coins how about instead or all so to pay for the other paint with the in game money.

Well let's see ..played the game fixed 7 cars and I made about $70,000 on the game I bought another car and had to replace just about all the parts on it I bought all the parts and was in the process of putting all the parts on it and in the middle of that ,the game shut down on me I opened it back up to continue playing and it had started back over from the beginning at the tutorial and I lost all progress. y'all need to fix this. until this is fixed and or I am put back where I was on the game then I would not recommend downloading this game or any of the other mechanic games for 2018, much less even playing it. it's a waste of time and data also had a trouble with the other 2018 version mechanic game you will see a posting on that one where it's not giving enough time to fix panels and it's not registering clicking on panels to find out if anything's messed up on them .thanks for the problems and the issues. This game is on this phone of mine and the other game is on my other phone developers. You'll see a post on the other garage mechanic 2018 game by Wesley wright. Yaw need to fix these issues ok , because these bad ratings I have been seeing by others isn't looking good for you games.

Game is great but I would've loved some more features or more cars it gets repetitive real fast please add more features like OBD SCAN or inside car customizations also pc version you can change rims and wheels lights bumpers and add more cars not saying you should add all that but maybe some if possible to make it less repetitive
"Breaks" is misspelled, and the photo button is in German or something. Cool game, can really help someone learn how a car works.
Hi, I think this game is great, but it has a problem. Whenever I try to scroll on the menus all the items in the menu dissappear.  Would you please see what you can do to fix this?

description: Escape Game: Star Hotel is a point and click escape game. A person who is on a business trip is staying at this star hotel in a suite. comments: The game is cute. Very straightforward and not at all time consuming but relaxing to check in every  once in a while. I loved visiting my Axolotl every day. Mine grew up to almost 9 cm! Unfortunalely, I didn't  check in for a few days. I checked every day until suddenly I forgot. Poor Lottie is gone now but I'm going to do my best to be a good virtual Axolotl owner this time!! The only thing I would like differently is I'd like more interactions with the axolotl and to be able to zoom in. Anyways, its an overall lovely game. Simple but sweet.

It's like having an Axolotl, but on your phone! It's extremely hard to find one around where I live, so I guess this is the closest one I could get for now? I love Axolotls and I dream of getting my own smiling water-walker. They're so cute! Thank you for making this app I love it. But try to make more options in communicating with the little dude. And I like the idea of scrubbing the screens instead of pushing a button. Something that will make it not too button-pressy-game thingy?

AMAZING AND SUPER CUTE! Doesn't take up alot of storage. I think it needs more interactions but that's is! Also could you add a feature to get another pet after your original has been alive for a certain amount of days because they look lonely.

Cute and fun, even if it's not 100% realistic. The axolotl doesn't do much, but neither does a real one. It would be nice if you could change the tank decor and choose different colors of axolotl (or even have a random color when you get a new one). I like that it doesn't require as much care as a real axolotl, who wants a game on their phone to be that much work? I'm also curious to see how big it will get. Real axolotls can get to 30cm or more, but at just under 7cm my virtual one already takes up most of the screen space. All in all I like the app.

I think that you definitely need more things to do. It would be great if you could do more things and maybe get more Axolotl! THEY MUST BE SO LONELY! I also think that it should let u personalise the tank and maybe make it so u can design your Axolotl! Other than that it is a EPIC game. (Will rake 5 star if u do) ;-)

I've got 91 days now. My Axel started out just a little boy & now he's gotten so big. I love my boy(even though he doesn't do anything unless u touch the screen & then he just goes where u direct him)but he's still adorable. My friend downloaded this app same time I did & killed 2 of her pets & gave up. Not a good pet owner(even if it is virtual). I love my Axel. This is cool. It helps teach u some responsibility, if ur humane enough to keep up with the feeding & cleaning.
description: Over one million downloads worldwide!Introducing the „ÄåAxolotl„Äç to this already popular game!  FREE DOWNLOAD!  It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!‚ñ†Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.‚ñ†Watch how cute your Axolotl moves.  It's so soothing and therapeutic.[Instructions]This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone.  It`s so easy to raise.  Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week.  This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious.  Try this game out!  It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time![Basic Functions]- It's simple to raise.  Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen.  Look at how adorable this is!- You can give your Axolotl a name.  You can give it a new name at anytime.- Your Axolotl grows in realtime.  The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.  - The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions![Recommended for:]- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums- people who love raising virtual pets- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
descriptionHTML:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the 「Axolotl」 to this already popular game! FREE DOWNLOAD! It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

■Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.
■Watch how cute your Axolotl moves. It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone. It`s so easy to raise. Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week. This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious. Try this game out! It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise. Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.
- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen. Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Axolotl a name. You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Axolotl grows in realtime. The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
summary: How would you like to experience the warm feeling of raising your own Axolotl?
title: Axolotl Pet

comments: Amazing and a unique type of game. The currency is all obtainable even as a free to play. Cool looking dragons and the movement in the game more lively than just pictures. I've played many app before this and I would say that this is top 1 so far. The only problem is the game will stop and crash. I don't know the reason but I've tried in another device and also stops working. Overall the game is magnificent and I definitely recommend it to everyone!

Awesome! I really like the game. Top 5 game? Worth it! I've played some similar game but this one is the best. The graphic is great and the dragons are cute. The resources are not too hard to get. The best part is the drag-skill! It's really different. Each dragon have their skill effect with different area form. You have to drag it right. A long way to be a master tamer. So enjoy the process!

I Tried this game with fair expectations, and even as I started i thought it might not be as fun as some other ones I've tried. But this game legitimately blew my standards away! It looks great, latency is great, gameplay is great! It's just a great game. Characters have simple tropes but are written in a likable way, which can't be said for alot of games. Everything about this game is very approachable and fun, and not to mention really nice to look at. I'm a fan for sure!

This game is awesome. The graphics are beautiful. The game is really unique because of the dragging skills. This game definitely give you a lot of chance for getting a good dragon. In my opinion it is action packed. Overall the game is awesome. The only reason I rate 4 stars is because of the fact that the game crashes several times and sometimes freezes. However, this game is still the best game out of all the other dragon game I played.

Pretty well made game afterall, all currency ingame can be obtained in fairly free and quick way. The game also offers really big help/supply for newbies. Spend a few (for me 3)days and you can already get 3 times of 11 advanced draw. Can get a little bit of grindy but not pay to win either. The flaws being some English translation error and extreme flashy visual effects, and the lack of (limited even) variety of the dragons and campaign plot.

Good games guys but the summon rate for a 5 star is too low. Im one of the top players on the server. When i do get a 5 star its one that i already have. Also the log in event is not working for the American server. Even if you pay. Its a waste cuz rates are too low. So don't

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

Not bad for free. Minimal ads. The two drawbacks are that in career mode, the game is slanted in the opponents favour too much. And in 1 on 1, it takes forever to load an opponent. Fix that and I would give it a five star rating. Also, it would be nice to see the developer actually respond to some people's concerns.

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ‚òÜ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.
description: If you love beer pong, this game will captivate you.Over 230 levels one more beautiful than the other, including tables, shelves, walls and many other obstacles to overcome to reach your goal simple: center the glass of beer!Hoping that you enjoy it, do not hesitate to send suggestions to improve the game or for new levels to our email address.HAVE FUN!!
descriptionHTML:

comments: Much improved! Very impressed with the work done on the game. Some serious polish has gone under the hood. The current rating unfairly represents the current state of the game.  Everything has been given effort.  From combat to control,  the warp gate and power up detection.  Quests are still a bit buggy,  and some new music and vehicles wouldn't hurt things at all. Game has ZERO pop-up Ads.  All ads are voluntary  and easily can play without ever seeing one.

Just fun to play I have to admit that this game surprised me. I was expecting low gameplay, repetitive and quickly thrown together...but not the case here. This game has amazing visuals, it's fast paced, re-playability is high, and the soundtrack is great. I would love to see more than one life per run. I dont mind watching an ad, but they often dont load which resets the game and any work done for that run. I had hoped that the Facebook issue had been resolved with this last update...but it was not...still cant login.

This is a great game and the concept is amazing. Although I do wish there a lower detail mode for it as my tablet isn't able to run it well and I get input delay. (I am using battery saver mode if that does anything but I would prefer a low detail mode for lower end devices)

Apart from other bugs there's another thing that when you use the warp the banner, that comes on the screen displaying what sector it is, is intrusive and keeps the screen occupied for a very long time. This hinders the visibility and eventually the ship crashes many a times. So, either the banner needs to be more transparent or its visibility time needs to be reduced.

Many obstacles are impossible to dodge if they were in front of you even if you were still far away, cause you don't have enough time to turn. Also some obstacles move towards you right when you're next to them which is also impossible to dodge. Otherwise the game is fun but I won't play it anymore.
Would be a lot better if I can pay to get rid of the ads. I just threw$5 at the game and nothing changes nor do you gain anything. I'm all up for supporting games, but really over the ad aspect

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..
Great time killer The only reason I stoped playing is eventually it would not let me see my scores without having to share on internet. I would not.

descriptionHTML:
Grow Phone
It’s a new concept game and growing the phone by your touch.

Game Released Event. When your phone becomes 2nd generation, limited Gift free jewels
(until Feb 28th)

■ Feature
- It’s possible to create your phone.
- It’s a new type game and not normal.
- Just by playing touch, you can stress relief.
- It’s possible to see the evolution of your phone.
- Try to play a battery acceleration and booster skill
- Easy to play and various modules

■ Information for enjoy playing
- Signal starts up from a battery.
- When the signal arrives to CPU, RAM, each module, the module is charged.
- When module gauge is full, it’s possible to get the gold
- It’s possible to get more gold by the module upgrade.
- It’s possible to send more signal to module by the battery upgrade.
- By the technical point (TP), it’s possible to upgrade the board.
- If upgrade the board, it’s possible to add new modules.
- Signal speed up by holding touch
- It’s possible to charge the battery fast by battery touch when the battery is out of battery.
- Press the bonus button that appears momentarily in the game. By the bonus button, buff is activated. Also, buff, it’s able to be accrued (Combo).

■ Caption
- If your phone is changed or uninstall the game, the data is deleted. You had batter push the save button.

■ Request Permission
- About the access permission Info.
Request access to permission follow

[Storage]
• Modify or delete SD card contents
• read the contents of your SD card
[Phone]
• read phone status and identity
• directly call phone numbers
[Contacts]
• read your contacts
• find accounts on the device

■ CS
- If you have install or playing problems, please contact to E-mail.
(help@mobile-game.co.kr) We're going to reply it ASAP.

■ Login error solution
1. Run 'Play Games' App
2. Go to 'setting' menu
3. Check on to 'Sign in to games automatically'

■Notice for Load and Save functions
- When you Save a Data, a previous data will be deleted if there is a previous data.
- When you Load a saved data, on going data will be deleted.

■ Brand page : http://mobile-game.co.kr/eng/

Enemies capture hostage and harass people with their tyranny and criminal advancements. Win greatest battle against them. Too risky to involve military to the city and civilian affairs so the crime fighter spider hero is the ultimate choice to overcome the danger. Opportunity to overcome the crime lords who use the military grade weapons and kill hundreds of people every day. Total warzone neglected by the good cops. Ruined environments with best graphics is extraordinary quality that makes this game a great addition to the action genre gaming. Now the ultimatum by the terrorists to destroy the city halls and kill the people in the streets. To avoid becoming the city a slaughterhouse run by criminals, break their gangs today. descriptionHTML:
Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market!

----------------------------------------

Game Features

• Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can!

• Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond!

• Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!

• Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).

• Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!

• Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!

• Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!

• Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!

• Complete contract missions to earn rewards.

• Can you unlock all of the achievements?

----------------------------------------

Adverts and Permissions

• Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!

• Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!

• Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!

----------------------------------------

With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!

----------------------------------------

Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.

- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.
- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.
- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.
- Do not leave games playing overnight.

----------------------------------------
ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES

- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.

- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.

- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.

- You must be aged 13+ to play.

title: Dirt Inc.

comments: The game is a lot of fun, very addictive. The only problem I'm having is it seems to close by itself. I'm running it on the Razer Phone so I know I can more than handle this game. No lag, no freezes.. Just random force closure. You should check that out devs. Otherwise, good all round.

I love this game. Every part of it. Even the weird "multiplayer" that's supported by another app... the graphics are incredible, music is intense yet becomes subtle in the background after a bit of playing. It's challenging enough to come back and try again after dying without giving up completely. I have experienced zero bugs or glitches during regular gameplay. You've made the perfect game for me, and I thank you.

In general a pretty good game, but the achievements rarely register. I have a high score of 11, and yet I don‚Äôt have the loop 10 achievement. I needed to get past loop 5 about 6 times before it finally gave me the achievement. Other than that though, I liked it.

This game has little to offer. U just jump over obstacles and thats it. Customizable options are so bad and expensive. Your in the first person prespective so why bother customizing yourself. Theres barely a difference from your default skin to the most expensive skin. But the game is OK i guess. Nothing special

Really cool game. Expect to rage as you move higher up in the loops.  Really wish there was a way to save replays. I love that the devs give you the option to turn ads on and reward you for having them on instead of making you pay to turn them off like other game devs. Keep it up!

Two things I've noticed: 1. Haptic is a little laggy; maybe make a section in setting to let users adjust that to their own devices? 2. Graphics are amazing but it seems like the FR is spotty which effects users' game play; maybe add a setting if you haven't already for lower quality options?
