comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Great game. New problem with update. I can't enter the magic spire. Every time I try, game crashes.

This is the most addictive game I ever played.  Super cool and really fun to play every moment is worth the play. Plus you get to meet so many people all over the world. You become great friends or earth rivals. Thank you for an awesome game and for the interaction with the developers.
Can get expensive... and be sure to keep track of purchases because on numerous occasions i have been double sometimes tripple billed.

descriptionHTML:
Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process.


Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.
4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.
5) Make ultrasound scan to see in what state the babies are in.
6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.
7) Play with her child, help her to do so as well.
8) Make the baby go to sleep, so you can help Melissa dress.


A game for young children who want to become a doctor in the near future. Test your skills to the limit and show the world that you can become a doctor. With so many mommy’s to select from and so many prince and princesses to come in this world. You surely can be the best surgery doctor on playstore

description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!
recentChanges: - Fixed a bug with a plate that did not break;
- fixed a bug that did not allow to run the leaderboard.
- reduced the size of the application

comments: Won't let me play 1st level. The screen shows what i think is a pause menu over the game. The screen says start but it will never start no matter where you press non of the buttons work. Game sucks. I dont know how it plays because it wont let me play. Dont install this app its bugged

A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

descriptionHTML:
This is a free survival and strategy game. Preserve your life carefully and thwart off zombies and other threats. The enemies are everywhere in the living space, you need to keep alert in the fight against other survivors or zombies. Kill them, or be killed.
HORROR SCHOOL:
You can take a chance and go to the abandoned school. God willing, you may be able to find many precious resources to help you create more powerful weapons to boost your chances of survival.
MARKET CENTER: 
The market will be open in the first 30 minutes of each hour. Enter the chat room during those times to communicate with other survivors and exchange information to help you survive. But remember that not all survivors are friendly.
Guild
Do you want to stay alive all by yourself in this doomsday? Maybe you could get some help from the guild. Radio tower is your connection to the outside world. Repair it, then you can unlock the guild. Many more survivors are waiting for you in the guild continent.
UNION TRADERS: 
Union traders may be helpful under the right circumstances. They can never refuse a good deal. Trade with them your unwanted items, as long as your items are attractive enough for them.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarZ-survival-867255676789139
summary: Preserve your life carefully and thwart off zombies and other threats.
title: WarZ: Law of Survival

comments: One of the best free puzzle games. I ended up buying the extra 3 platforms ($1.99). It has loads of levels (120 free, 60 more paid) but it adds in features over time so it doesn't get boring. There is a decent amount of replay value for a mobile app, since you can go back and try solving in fewer moves. The only addition I'd recommend is displaying somewhere the fewest moves each puzzle can be solved in, so we can know if we've truly beaten the puzzle or not.

I always get bored with games the same day I've downloaded them, but with this game I'm captivated and I'm absolutely addicted. Bonus points for how cute the game and the name are. The only other game that I've loved so much is Mr square.
great game, needs an undo button and the music is terrible. needs something lite and playful, also gets too hard too fast in platform 2
Excellent :) A stand out puzzler that's hard to stop once you pop...    errr yeah..
It needs a slide control option. My phone screen is cracked and at one point I couldn't drag the dude
Awesome puzzle game. My only complaint was how fast the levels and platforms went by. More levels please!

descriptionHTML:
Smoosh your Blops together in the funnest game ever, brimming with puzzles so amazing you’ll probably break your phone in a fit of joyous frustration! Get Smoosh now and we’ll give you a free cat (although we actually won’t… you have to earn it).

In other words, Smoosh is an addictive puzzler full of brain bending challenges and a slew of colorful, smoosh-able Blops. Guide your Blop buddies to their color-coordinated Blop Drops through 180 fantastic (and puzzling) levels. Smash Blops together to mix new colors, avoid treacherous Pits of Despair, and work around deviously placed obstacles to master every level and drop those Blops! Think you’re good? Complete each level within a set number of moves to achieve Par or under and prove you’re a real Blop droppin’ pro!

--- WHY YOU’LL LOVE SMOOSH ---
• MASTER 180 addictingly fun puzzles full of Blops, blocks, tubes, and drops.

• INTERACT with Blops to mix new colors and watch Blops respond as you play.
• PLAY at your own pace and plan moves without the stress of a clock.
• BEAT each level at Par or better and become the ultimate Blop Dropper.
• WIN & feel great!

comments: I really like this game and I wanted to love it but just couldn't give it 5 stars.  It's super fun and easy to play but it doesn't give you near enough coins to expand your zoo. You quickly run out of room and it gets increasingly expensive to expand making it nearly impossible. I would play this game way more often if it was easier to earn coins. I started out playing it every day all day long but because I couldn't expand I simply ran out of things to do. Even when purchasing coins i quickly ran out. I hope the developers will make some changes so I can continue to enjoy this game.

Please help me. I can't play my game after the recent update. Whenever I open it, more than 5 minutes is taken by it to get opened. Game has gonna super slow . It takes at least two minutes to collect profit from even a single emporium. Can you imagine how much hectic it is ?  I am at level 41. I can't even think about uninstalling this. I am highly attached. Please help me.. Whenever mobile data or WiFi is connected the screen suddenly gets blackened and I'm unable to go to any other zoos. Please help me.

Its a fun game till you reach the higher levels. I cant even play the damn thing without having to reload it every 5 seconds. I have trued and tried to tell them by reporting it but they never reapond back. So i DO NOT recommend it

Love the games and would give five stars if you could fix the problem with game.  Always crashing. Everytime I and others I know open game have to open it several times to get to work. Always says Zoo Craft is not responding. Please fix problem. Even worse if we get in wifi area. Thanks!

Love this game. Very enjoyable and has long-term playability.  My only suggestions would be: 1) make the habitats slightly cheaper as the price increases dramatically as the game progresses 2) add a feature where animals can be sold to other players to decrease waiting times.

Zoo team, I'm begging you - improve your quests!!! Halloween, Christmas and the current pirate one are all the same - you give us nowhere near the time needed to complete, unless we spend coins which are too precious to waste. Why not give us 2 weeks instead of 2 days? You see there's this thing called sleep, which we're doing for half your quest time. Stop taking the fun out of our zoo play!
description: DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO RUN A REAL ZOO? As a Zoo Keeper, you‚Äôre handed the keys to a run-down zoo, what will you do? Build your own unique zoo, breed cute animals and discover new species by preforming genetic experiments.Feed and play with your animals in their habitats, raise up animal babies and let visitors buy them as pets.Exhibit more than 120 types of cute animals, from common rabbits, boars and badgers, bizzare koalas, chameleons and monitor lizards to the exotic babirusa and solenodon. descriptionHTML:
DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO RUN A REAL ZOO?

As a Zoo Keeper, you’re handed the keys to a run-down zoo, what will you do?

Build your own unique zoo, breed cute animals and discover new species by preforming genetic experiments.

Feed and play with your animals in their habitats, raise up animal babies and let visitors buy them as pets.

Exhibit more than 120 types of cute animals, from common rabbits, boars and badgers, bizzare koalas, chameleons and monitor lizards to the exotic babirusa and solenodon. Not to mention peculiar mythical animals and the sea creatures in the huge Oceanarium!

Play mad scientist in the Laboratory to get new, unusual and rare animals. Grow your collection and expand your zoo!

Construct and upgrade zoo kiosks, attractions and emporiums! Design it your way with colorful decorations, roads and walkways to delight visitors and earn profits!

Managing a zoo is hard work, complete tasks and special quests to improve your business and earn new achievement statuses.

Meet other ZooCraft players and share tips about the game. Animal fun facts, competitions, awesome rewards and a ton of interesting things are waiting for you:
https://www.facebook.com/zoocraftgame/
https://twitter.com/zoocraftgame
Don't forget to follow our handyman Stew on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/zoocraftgame/

ZooCraft is still being actively developed, you can expect lots of updates and great additions to the game in the nearest future. Stay tuned!


TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
OS Version: Android 4.0+
Device: 1 GB Ram Recommended
Optimized for: Samsung Galaxy S3
Wifi: Required


TROUBLESHOOTING
If the game doesn't start up, runs slowly or crashes, please get in touch and we'll do our best to help.
- If you have any questions, use one of the two ways to contact us through our Support system: https://support.creative-mobile.com/ or via e-mail at support@creative-mobile.com
recentChanges: - Build a cool sailing ship by playing with the charismatic pirate captain that visits your zoo
- Valentine's Day is around the corner, Start decorating your zoo with an extra bit of love!
summary: Just Zoo It! Build your own Zoo with Cute Animals, Good Graphics & Lots of Fun!
title: ZooCraft: Animal Family

description: The fate of the block world rests in the hands of a small but elite band of rebels in The Survival Hungry Games 2. As their leader, you have called the shots and mapped out the plans that will crush the government officials who have turned the human race into a cruel sport for the entertainment of the privileged. It's time to rise from the ashes of the war torn nations and defend the blocky race against these sadists. It's time to survive.Progress through your mission and mow down enemies and blow away groups of foes as you battle unique enemies with their own set of challenges. As you rise to the threat, the figurehead of the district has sent mass mobs of clan enemies to smother your efforts. Take control, tactic and quick thinking is everything when dealing with this enemy. Deal damage in your quest and enjoy smooth, intuitive controls in this survival game. It's do or die...

descriptionHTML:
You’ve never played a wrestling game like this before! The controls are simple and fun; they might remind you of pool, marbles, or pinball. Classic wrestling moves and unique combos add exciting tactical and strategic depth. Bounce a monster strike at the exactly the right spot to KO your rival, save your signature move for a massive bodyslam, or bank a shot for a multi-hit combo.

Collect, train, and promote hundreds of wrestlers. Combine the unique stats and abilities of your hyper heroes to build the perfect tag-team for each match and battle it out in extensive single player campaigns or the real-time PvP league.


BUILD YOUR ROSTER
● Collect hundreds of unique wrestlers and build the best tag-team
● Train your wrestlers and unlock signature throws, holds and aerial attacks.
● Manage their wrestling career path from rookie, to jobber, to superstar

POOL-LIKE GAMEPLAY
● It’s simple to wrestle, only one hand required
● Just pull back, aim, and release!
● Deceptively deep tactical choices
● Work the angles for combos

EXTENSIVE SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN
● Hundreds of levels to play, filled with unique challenges
● Throw chairs, set the ropes on fire, and jump off the top turnbuckle
● Hit the high scores on the leaderboards

REAL-TIME PVP LEAGUE
● Go head to head with other players in the pvp multiplayer league
● Progress through arenas in the league to go to the top

WRESTLING DRAMA
● Hilarious announcer commentary
● Spot a talented rookie when they’re just a little jabroni
● Please the crowd as a babyface, or turn heel
● Make sure to never break kayfabe!


Download The Muscle Hustle (TMH) now!

descriptionHTML:
|happy wheels| is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.
|happy wheels| is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damage your character.


When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csr bike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.
This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, |happy wheels| offers an exhilarating mix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses. Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!
Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain, paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Rolling down a hill under the hot sky,your wheel is hot , your legs so tired, just one way is drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many hill to rolling, mountain to climb, river to cross and.. many ways to die.
Welcome to |happy wheels| A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dash and rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die. Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you’re not a fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.
Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop button to decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.

The problem is that not every part of your body will get along with you. Huge chainsaws, thorns, watermelons, pineapples and many others want to tear off a piece from you!
|happy wheels| a game in which all you need to survive.
Time to jump on your wheel and racing with |happy wheels| game.

comments: I love this game and I play it all day long. I love the game play in it as it's very addictive and all the awards you get motivates you to keep playing on and achieving higher levels. I gave this a four star rating because the only problem with this game is how much is crashes and struggles to maintain server connection. You can restart the game and it'll fix but it'll happen very easily again and there's even times you have to restart the game multiple times for it to work again. If this game will be able to maintain server connection at all times and not crash as much then this game will be worth five stars and more people will play it guaranteed.

Typical idle RPG. Nothing special or new compared to all the other stat grinders avail. Major connection issues, lag and server instability. Sometimes I can log in with no issue, mostly it takes 4 or 5 tries to even connect...staying connected is another issue all together...
EZ PZ CRASH n FREEZY  Seriously servers can't maintain a connection for more then 3 minutes.. literally log in, do one thing, time out, relog repeat.. don't waste your time or money on this
Now I give 1 star. How can you enjoy and play a game if it crashes all the time? I can only play 5 minutes and then it crashes. WORST GAME EVER

Love the game, but just started on server 2 and game crashes any time you leave the battle page, it's near impossible to progress. I've lost countless rewards in mail, if you claim them and the app crashes there gone for ever lost hundreds of gens from arena as well, even lost my Facebook share reward this way too. There's times the game will crash and I will lose hundreds of thousands of xp, really like the game and wanna spend but I refuse to spend if I can't even claim simple in game rewards.

It is very buggy. At times when you do something it will crash and keep trying to load it. Making you have to close and reopen. Not recommended making any in game until fixed. In game purchases work on Chinese tier system. More you buy better stuff you get.

comments: Really unique concept. Accurate depictions & commonly accepted stereotypes.  fun to play & appropriate for all ages.  The only complaint I have is that the images you choose to make the associations aren't always immediately recognizable as the objects that they represent. A little more image detail would easily make this a 5 star game for me.  Definitely a fun & worthwhile download.

Really fun association game Starts out easy, gradually gets more challenging but not too challenging. Read a lot of reviews saying it makes no sense but I haven't come across a level that was totally off the wall. My only criticism is that some of the icons are a little difficult to figure out exactly what it is. Overall great app guys!

Sooo close, but no. Falls short in relation to hints. They are useless. One randomly tells you that one of 20 pictures does or does not belong. Always one that you had no question about. Absolutely not helpful. Have to pay to skip it too. Also doesn't let you review your answer when you get it right. I uninstalled it

It's a fun game but the hints and interface can get petty. I have small fingers and I have to angle it right to click the hint button. I know its hard to give specific hints but some are too obvious whether its text or excluding one. I find myself using corrrect the picture hint because its more reliable than the other ones. Even if I want to sit through ads pressing the ad button doesn't work instantly I either have time it right or press it multiple times until an ad pops up.  Otherwise this game is fun but could be better.

A hint told me that if I disagree with the solution then I am an individual :) boy was that accurate. Im struggling to put my mind in the place of the developers at a very early level. I can't for the life of me figure out why a pacifier doesn't have anything to do with a new year. And it kinda went downhill from there for me. Great concept great game! Im just one of those individuals I guess.

I thought that the game would have something to do with stereotypes, like, French people do this or Germans do that. But its nothing like that. I thought it would just be poking fun at stereotypes but it just turned out to be some inane guessing game. I uninstalled it after about ten minutes of gameplay. A real waste if brain cells if you ask me
description: Score a stunning victory! Start playing right now! OK, enough with the stereotypes already. The goal of this game is to match suitable pictures to words. For example: what does a woman keep in her purse?Choose pictures that match up to the task and reveal new stereotypes! Unleash your inner intellectual! Many tasks in the game require you to really get your brain in gear. Don't miss even the slightest detail!Here are some examples of the tasks that you need to choose the right pictures for:night, luck, France, the Oscars, what do people think about when they're in danger?And just remember ‚Äì if your associations don't correspond to what the writers had in mind, then you're unique!‚òë an interesting, fresh idea‚òë loads of albums with tasks‚òë intellectual tasks‚òë achievements‚òë available in many different languages‚òë checking checkboxes is fun
descriptionHTML:
Score a stunning victory! Start playing right now! OK, enough with the stereotypes already. The goal of this game is to match suitable pictures to words. For example: what does a woman keep in her purse?

Choose pictures that match up to the task and reveal new stereotypes!
Unleash your inner intellectual! Many tasks in the game require you to really get your brain in gear. Don't miss even the slightest detail!
Here are some examples of the tasks that you need to choose the right pictures for:
night, luck, France, the Oscars, what do people think about when they're in danger?
And just remember – if your associations don't correspond to what the writers had in mind, then you're unique!

☑ an interesting, fresh idea
☑ loads of albums with tasks
☑ intellectual tasks
☑ achievements
☑ available in many different languages
☑ checking checkboxes is fun
recentChanges: So it's new tasks you want? In that case, you're in for a treat! Enjoy!

description: Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day. If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it. Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again! Wouldn't the surprise element in the aforementioned cases be amazing?Wouldn't you just look forward to waking up from your bed every single day to try to find out what awaits you today?Wouldn't the excitement levels be extremely high if there was something like this?Well, there is!SALT brings to you a wide variety of games. In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day. On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man. On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens. On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSayingOn Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles. On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, ‚ÄúOnly the fittest survive‚Äù, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week. Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way. Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. (That's what high scores are for!) Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!And as a sie man once put it."The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."Come join the SALT adventure.
descriptionHTML:
Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day.
If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.

In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.
Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it.

Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again!

Wouldn't the surprise element in the aforementioned cases be amazing?
Wouldn't you just look forward to waking up from your bed every single day to try to find out what awaits you today?
Wouldn't the excitement levels be extremely high if there was something like this?
Well, there is!

SALT brings to you a wide variety of games. In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day.

On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man.
On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens.
On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSaying
On Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles.
On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, “Only the fittest survive”, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.
On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.
On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.
And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week.

Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way.
Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. (That's what high scores are for!)

Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!

And as a sie man once put it.
"The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."
Come join the SALT adventure.
recentChanges: The app that‚Äôll spring a new surprise for you everyday in the form of engaging and challengingly exciting new games.
summary: Take a plunge into a new beginning every 24 hours & play something new every day
title: SALT - Play Something New Everyday

descriptionHTML:

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

description: Tribes Age is a FREE MMO strategy game. Here you can experience the most primitive, funny hunting and battles! Find your clan mates, and start your prehistoric life in the uncivilized world!Game Features:The Most Exciting Tribal Warfare-Outposts can be freely built in anywhere, getting stronger is a simple way to against resistant.-Seamless zooming makes it easy to navigate in the world!-Players in every country can fight against each other simultaneously. Try to make reliable friends, and protect your honors altogether!Various & Funny Troop Collocations-Default Troop Types: Warrior, Beastmaster, Shaman and Demolisher. Every type of troop has its unique talents, yet yield certain weak points.-16 unique types of troops in total! Try various combinations to optimize your battle strategy timely.Unique & Outstanding Gameplay-Collect unique heroes, utilize their talents in PvP battles as well as exploring the world.- Each hero has its unique skill and ways of attack, they can learn from each other when grouped in certain combinations. eventually, it makes weak overcoming the strong possible. Create Your Own Clan-Join a clan or create your own, share your thoughts, ideas and help each other.-Hunt together; defeat prehistoric monsters for sweet rewards!-Call up the clan members, initiate epic wars and conquer the Wonder to become the great chief of the Tribes Age!Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/Tribes-Age-180520095838759/Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/545840965764783/
descriptionHTML:
Tribes Age is a FREE MMO strategy game. Here you can experience the most primitive, funny hunting and battles! Find your clan mates, and start your prehistoric life in the uncivilized world!

Game Features:

The Most Exciting Tribal Warfare

-Outposts can be freely built in anywhere, getting stronger is a simple way to against resistant.
-Seamless zooming makes it easy to navigate in the world!
-Players in every country can fight against each other simultaneously. Try to make reliable friends, and protect your honors altogether!

Various & Funny Troop Collocations

-Default Troop Types: Warrior, Beastmaster, Shaman and Demolisher. Every type of troop has its unique talents, yet yield certain weak points.
-16 unique types of troops in total! Try various combinations to optimize your battle strategy timely.


Unique & Outstanding Gameplay
-Collect unique heroes, utilize their talents in PvP battles as well as exploring the world.
- Each hero has its unique skill and ways of attack, they can learn from each other when grouped in certain combinations. eventually, it makes weak overcoming the strong possible.

Create Your Own Clan
-Join a clan or create your own, share your thoughts, ideas and help each other.
-Hunt together; defeat prehistoric monsters for sweet rewards!
-Call up the clan members, initiate epic wars and conquer the Wonder to become the great chief of the Tribes Age!

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/545840965764783/

comments: I used to love this game hence  I moved to the English server... having played on the Chinese server, I noticed the drop rate for this server is super low. Also the packages in the game ate way overpriced. Some skins in the Chinese server are free (ie moonlight blossom yuki onna) whereas in NA server you have to pay to get it. Honestly if the playing field is equal between the NA and the Asia server were equal, I'll stay in the NA server. Right now I'm going to move back to the Asia server even tho I can barely read the story.

I love absolutely everything about this game. Its perfect...accept for one very big detail. Sadly, the characters that have unique and strategic skills are amazingly fun but will never amount to anything in pvp. The good characters are all too easy to play with and it becomes dull due to the lack of thought it takes to win. PVP is a disaster in gameplay and matchmaking. Otherwise, this game is very good.

I loved the game when I played the beta. Turn based rpg with different parables within the story mode. Unique unit designs. I cant get very far with the game because the audio echoes itself to the point where its almost hard to understand what is happening. Its a good thing there is subtitles. The game prides itself on its audio aspect by recommending "use earphones for best experience" before starting, and I would really love to hear the game.

It's a beautifully made game with a good story line involved. Sure it can be pay to win and all that, but nothing that a bit of hard work can't catch up to.  The controls are easy enough to understand and the combat system is just as simple. It does offer a few unique things such as the shared resource for bigger and better attacks, but it only adds to the depth of the combat system. All in all it's a good game and well thought out.

After playing for awhile, I just noticed the attention to detail (eg. characters look at others when a move is made, particles effect etc) is superb. Can't comment on the gameplay as for now, but the layout and the flow of the game is awesome. Definitely a game to try out!

We need more event and rewards so f2p player will stick into this game.  Almost no resources after playing more than 14 days. Only open this app for around 30 min a day and run out of energy.  Might as well getting bored soon :/

Background:
In a time when demons and humans coexisted… Evil spirits from the underworld have begun a quest for power, strength, and dominance. The balance between the two worlds is now in jeopardy.
Fortunately, there's a group of gifted humans who can read the stars and draw amulets. They have the power to connect the two worlds, and even tame the spirits. They are willing to lay everything on the line to maintain peace and order between the two worlds. They are known as Onmyoji.

description: Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress. Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.Try to top the leaderboard.Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
descriptionHTML:
Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress.
Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.
Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.
The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.

Try to top the leaderboard.

Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
recentChanges: New Feature added to make it a little harder and more enjoyable. Thanks for playing!
summary: Relaxing Gameplay
title: Balls Blast

descriptionHTML:
Ready for our most epic adventure yet?! Play mahjong with titans & meet Olympic Gods as you explore the mythical world of Mt. Olympus and beyond!

From giant pantheons and colosseums to great cities in the clouds, you’ll journey through over 100 levels of fun mahjong, find and craft rare treasures, unlock HD artwork and meet lots of interesting characters on the way! With more levels added every week, the fun never stops!

★ Fun, Relaxing & Casual Mahjong

Our mahjong games are designed to be fun and relaxing – suitable for players of all skill levels! All of our puzzles are created to be solvable no matter what. That means you can sit back and not worry about making the wrong move and creating an unsolvable puzzle. All you need to do is enjoy the game!

If you ever get stuck and need a helping hand, just tap on the hint button!

★ Hunt & Craft Rare Treasures
The Gods & titans of Mount Olympus have hidden treasures throughout the world for you to find on your mahjong adventure. As you visit the wonders of this mythical realm, you’ll have the chance to collect crafting tiles. Collect all the crafting tiles for an item and you’ll unlock that piece of treasure!

The mahjong titans are generous – at the end of every puzzle, you’ll be given between 1 and 3 extra treasure chests to open. What could they contain? Coins? Power ups? Who knows!

-----------------------------------------------------------
MAHJONG TITANS ADVENTURE - HIGHLIGHTS
-----------------------------------------------------------
⦁ Classic mahjong solitaire rules with a Gods & titans theme
⦁ Easy to understand gameplay suitable for all ages
⦁ Helpful hints are always available when you need them
⦁ Match tiles on an epic journey with over 100 levels
⦁ More maps, features & levels added every month!
⦁ Normal and challenging expert modes for the skilled mahjong solitaire player
⦁ Bonus levels with various ways to play
⦁ Collect mahjong titans artwork, save & use as a HD background
⦁ Complete dark dungeon levels in each map to earn HUGE rewards
⦁ Free daily rewards & coins for active players
⦁ Each level uses its own uniquely themed tile sets
⦁ Replay each level as many times as you like to earn more coins
⦁ Earn coins to unlock more exciting mahjong boards
⦁ Play offline – no wifi needed!


--------------------------------------------------------------------
YOUR MOUNT OLYMPUS ADVENTURE…
--------------------------------------------------------------------



Land 1 – The Tunnel Of Hades
Your journey through the land of the titans starts in the realm of Hades. You must beat him at mahjong to pass through to the other side. Do you have what it takes?

Land 2 – Poseidon’s Kingdom
Meet Poseidon, the powerful God of the sea, as you adventure through a world full of shipwrecks, ocean monsters and more. Who knows what’s hiding beneath the depths!

Land 3 – Gardens of Athena
Seek Athena’s wisdom as you relax, play mahjong and explore the gardens of Mount Olympus

Land 4 – The Sacred Pantheon
This monumental temple to the titans and Gods of mount Olympus is surrounded by beauty. Meet with the residents and take in the sights as you journey through the town.

More Lands Coming Soon…
We’re constantly adding exciting new maps each month, so keep checking back for more mahjong fun!


START YOUR MYTHICAL ADVENTURE – DOWNLOAD MAHJONG TITAN TODAY!

descriptionHTML:
Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is an exciting, FREE endless talking running game for boys and girls of all ages. Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest kittens in the world!

😻Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Features 🙀
- Dash, slide and jump to dodge obstacles and animals - don't talk!
- Chase the rainbow and catch coins with the coin boost
- Choose from 12 unique Kitty Cats, each with different accessories
- Equip the rainbow shield to smash through obstacles!
- Use a variety of exciting power ups to reach the high score
- Unlock new upgrades, cats and boosts in the shop with your coins
- Come back every day to complete tasks and earn exclusive rewards
- Great graphics and performance
- Free updates: New features and characters implemented regularly

Choose your favourite Kitty kitten and guide them through the forest and city as you try to collect as many coins as possible.

Run, jump, dash and slide to dodge obstacles and keep your Tom kitty safe in this endless cat racing simulator game, where fast reactions will be required if you want to reach the highscore! Run, surf and slide for as long as you can to earn more points, and collect powerups to double your score! Will you be able to reach the high score in Tom Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten?

In Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten once you and your cute kitty have collected enough coins, you will be able to chase the rainbow for a HUGE number of coins as the coin boost starts. Watch coins fall from the sky as you try to collect them all!

After you have finished running in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten, you can visit the store where 12 kitties are waiting for you to unlock them. Try and collect exciting cats such as Tom, Salem the witches cat, Jess the post cat and even Princess, the most royal cat in the land!

As well as Cats, you can upgrade your powerups, buy extra boosts or even purchase headstarts so that you can whizz straight to the front of the pack on your next run! Reaching the highscore is more possible than reaching the end of a ball of wool with all of these upgrades in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten!

Subway trains, temple ruins and city streets can all be dangerous for a cute little kitty, so don’t forget to double tap the screen and activate the rainbow shield if you are going to crash! Smash through obstacles and collect extra coins for as long as it is active!

Make sure to come back every day to complete daily tasks. These will allow you to earn exclusive and exciting rewards!

Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Racing has been carefully designed for boys, girls and families to have ultimate fun!

Please rate us for future improvements and updates!

Invite your friends to play the cute, magical, addictive games designed for Girls & Boys of all ages created by Green Tea Games and challenge them to beat your highest score!

Facebook at Facebook.com/GreenTeaGames to get more info about all our upcoming titles.

comments: Got 4 stars for the creepy factor.  This game was released,I think, for Halloween 2016 on PC.  I'm starting to investigate a bit more before buying but have purchased just for something to do in my spare time.  Not too far in but there are things to collect and the map does transport you.  So far no problems with picking up items or lagging.  Will update if I encounter any problems.

Yay, a new game for us Android users!  And it was wonderful........ my favorite part is the Match 3 that you can play instead of some of the Hidden Object puzzles.   Has all the other Bells and whistles that I've come to expect in a game.   Thanx

Lots of bugs. Awkward games, one where you are supposed to move a receptionist figure through double doors to win, first the figure looks like a toy soldier or a doorman not a receptionist. Controls are very spotty. Sometimes good often times not. Very disappointed that Eipix would release this game with so many issues. Clearly this platform isn't BF's focus because we haven't had a good game since last year.

Finally!  Big Fish finally gave Android gamers a new game!  A GREAT GAME!  I enjoyed every this game so much!  WELL DONE again EIPIX! Game has customizable difficulty settings, hidden morphing objects throughout (with a spinning spiral that is lit up so you know to look and stops spinning if you've found it.) This is GREAT so you're not so distracted double checking yourself that you don't enjoy the game,  bonus chapter, teleporting map, souvenir room that has a little more than just looking for objects AND strategy guide! My ONLY complaint is NO zoom‚Ä¢in that stays after you click objects.  But still money well spent!  Hopefully we won't have to wait 3 months for another new game!

Phantasmat rein of shadows. Just trying to figure the game out. Now I am at the washer where I need to fix the circuit board and I keep crashing please fix this! Back when finished. Finished finally! Great game! Once you fixed the problem the game played fantastic! Looking for a great sequel!

Waited weeks for a new big fish and found this one disappointing, I know it's meant to be spooky but I had to turn my screen up to 100% which I never do to stand any chance of completing it. The story line was ok at best and the responsiveness to tapping wasn't brilliant

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to duel! Flick Arena is a real-time multiplayer game where you fight against players from all over the world in a physics-based battle!

Collect and upgrade great amounts of cards and play with awesome characters including the Ninja and his bouncy shurikens, the Ghost who can pass through obstacles, the massive Golem and many, many more!

Kill the enemy King, push him in a hole or eliminate all of his minions to defeat your opponent and win Crowns, Battle Points and fame! Create your own setups and strategies to defeat your opponents by brute force or trickery. Win matches and move up to the best leagues!

FEATURES
- Real-time duels against players worldwide
- Earn chests to unlock rewards
- Collect powerful new characters and upgrade existing ones
- Multiple arenas with regular rotation for endless challenges
- Complete the daily quests to earn epic rewards
- Create the ultimate setup to defeat your opponents
- Move up the ladder and reach Diamond League
- Form a guild with your friends and clash with others

A network connection is also required to play Flick Arena.

Terms of Service
By accessing or using a flaregames product, you're agreeing to our Terms of Service (www.flaregames.com/terms-service/).

Parental Guide
Flick Arena is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use these features, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. According to our Terms of Service, Flick Arena is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or more of age, or with explicit parental consent. You can read more here: http://www.flaregames.com/parents-guide/

comments: Great game. Beautiful, if not repetitive graphics. Gameplay is pretty easy to pick up, but overall satisfying. There is definitely a pay to win wall if you don't get lucky with your initial packs/first rare ruby deck.  My advice - always buy fusion stones as soon as they come up in store. After your first 25 ruby pack, save up for the 50 one.

Amazing game, really well made, mechanics are simple yet extremely fun and the graphic style is great! A few small things to ask for tho, firstly can the timer be increased a little, especially because different animations take up longer time and u can't play during this time, and also that certain cards, mainly all those that deal face damage, pls be balanced as they can be a mindless way to win, especially things such as needle bomb. Other than these minor things, I've had an amazing time playing, keep it up üòÉ

Great app with epic graphics and ideas. Like the different Kingdoms you can build your deck from and the cards are all cool. The only thing I would like changed is where you have one enemy you want to take out, but there is another enemy on the other side and it forces you to attack the other enemy like it's in the way or something. Please change this and it would be great to have a way of directing you troops as they are placed, e.g, left or right or forwards, which thing you attack and so on. But other than that, I think it's am amazing, original game and I would recommend getting it.

Well, I personally think it's pretty great, but it's not for everyone. The mechanics seemed wonky to me at the start, but as I got more cards and built a better deck, everything fell into place, and I began to enjoy it much more. The artwork is absolutely stunning, and I really love the style. The same goes for the soundtrack. If you're reading this, I say give it a try, and play for about a week, if you still don't like it, that's fine, but the game deserves a chance.

This game is not only incredibly pretty but also addictively fun to play. The card art is perfect and the minimalist design works brilliantly. The games tend to be a little on the longer side but there is plenty of challenge to appease newbies and ccg veterans alike

The "command" and "border" functions don't always work properly which means the game is lacking when it comes to good programming. The "you can upgrade this card if you happen to collect duplicates of it" system has been proven to be unfriendly and the companies who use it are usually just greedy. Not to mention that you have to use gold to upgrade cards as well. If you want a simpleton's money-grabbing game, dig in. Oh, and time consuming as well, enjoy the grind.
description: Immerse yourself in the rich world of Stormbound, as four kingdoms struggle for dominance. Construct a deck of unique and powerful cards and then dive into real-time battles against other players. Novel gameplay combines your favorite aspects of collectible card games with the tactical strategy of board games. Play cards from your hand to the game board and then watch your units march on the enemy base.FEATURES: *Tactical gameplay that rewards the most clever strategists*Real-time PVP battles against players all around the globe*Dozens of powerful cards to collect and upgrade!*Incredible 2D and 3D art immerses you in the world of Stormbound*Four distinct kingdoms with unique advantages and playstylesPlease Note: Stormbound: Kingdom Wars is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

comments: The game is good to play. But even though you have guessed the word it doesn't submit until you've spent coins to get hints. This happens after every 3/4 levels. After it happened for the sixth to seventh time, I started making a note of what words I tried. Not good, needs fixing ASAP. Luckily for me, I'm not one to waste money buying coins.

Should be able to spell words no matter how many letters are only recommend. Would've had a lot more coins if that wasn't such a limiting factor. Definitions should be added after word is found in case user wants to know what he/she spelled. At least, I want to know what the definition is. That way, I am learning new words. Enhancing my vocabulary as what this app was created/designed for. Right? Right?

Really enjoyed the game. Fun to play, keep coming back, sometimes letters are too close together and it is hard to select the ones you want without others getting in the way. The present doesn't ever give me above 39 coins. It's either rigged or I am very unlucky.

comments: I love the app! Great graphics, Cool story settings and characters. Also addicting. I haven't encountered any problems, yet. I wish there were more story settings.It would also be great if the characters could interact with their settings, like using an elevator, opening a door, sitting down or climbing a ladder ( Simple actions and reaction). Plus some sounds for the characters like laughing or Giggling.

The app is amazing it's lot of fun but it is difficult to control and there is a limit to make the animation.And only 7 character can be taken as cast at a time. And it is difficult to make animation. But it is awesome if I play continue I will be expected in the game and Google is awesome.

I can't seem to back out and close the app once I open it. Also it will not let me export any of the files to my photos. I think it could be improved if you were able to exit with the settings button and also be able to choose where your files are exporting to even add an option for YouTube or something. I was pretty let down knowing this app was from Google.

plz give us a basic body of male and female instead of creating a whole cartoon and also there should be an option of deleating things such as binoculars and also add  give som options to change moustache or remove them other wise it is a good app

Google is always the best, so no need to say IT IS THE BEST EDUCATIONAL, ADDICTIVE & FUNNY APP EVER!!! But at ONE point IT IS UNGOOGLE. & That is IT CONSUMES A VERY LARGE AMOUNT OF MOBILE DATA. I request to Google LLC that please try to FIX THIS PROBLEM.

Love the idea for this app, maybe a small intro or pop-up tops would be helpful, but after a few times I figured it out...at least I think I did. Would really love to see ability to use my note's pen with it to draw or move characters, also maybe ability to lock background from moving when I ment for the character to move. description: 3‚Ä¶ 2‚Ä¶ 1‚Ä¶ ACTION! With Toontastic 3D you can draw, animate, and narrate your own cartoons. It‚Äôs as easy as play. Just move your characters around onscreen, tell your story, and Toontastic records your voice and animations and stores it on your device as a 3D video. Toontastic is a powerful and playful way to create interstellar adventures, breaking news reports, video game designs, family photo albums, or anything else you might imagine! What people are saying:‚Ä¢ Parents' Choice Gold Award: "Toontastic 3D is a wonderful creative outlet for all budding storytellers, young scientists, or those who increasingly blur the lines between the two - perhaps this is where the next documentary makers and Pixar artists will get their start."‚Ä¢ Five star rating from Common Sense Media - "Kids are in the director's seat and have free rein to let their creative side shine with this flexible and easy-to-use storytelling platform."‚Ä¢ A+ and Editor's Choice rating from Children's Technology Review - "Powerful and free, this rich language experience lets you create your own self-narrated puppet shows."‚Ä¢ Winner of the 2017 BolognaRagazzi Digital Award for 'Best Kids App of the Year'FEATURES ‚Ä¢ A giant toy box chock full of swashbuckling pirates, transforming robots, nefarious villains, and many more characters and settings to spark kids‚Äô imaginations ‚Ä¢ Design your own characters with 3D drawing tools ‚Ä¢ Add yourself to your adventures with photos and custom colored characters ‚Ä¢ Mix your soundtrack with dozens of built-in songs ‚Ä¢ Choose from three Story Arcs for digital storytelling (Short Story, Classic, & Science Report) ‚Ä¢ Export videos to your Photos library to share with family and friends ‚Ä¢ An idea lab chock full of playful stories, characters and settings to inspire new adventuresFruit Ninja ¬© 2017 Halfbrick. All Rights Reserved.
descriptionHTML:
3… 2… 1… ACTION! With Toontastic 3D you can draw, animate, and narrate your own cartoons. It’s as easy as play. Just move your characters around onscreen, tell your story, and Toontastic records your voice and animations and stores it on your device as a 3D video. Toontastic is a powerful and playful way to create interstellar adventures, breaking news reports, video game designs, family photo albums, or anything else you might imagine!


What people are saying:
• Parents' Choice Gold Award: "Toontastic 3D is a wonderful creative outlet for all budding storytellers, young scientists, or those who increasingly blur the lines between the two - perhaps this is where the next documentary makers and Pixar artists will get their start."
• Five star rating from Common Sense Media - "Kids are in the director's seat and have free rein to let their creative side shine with this flexible and easy-to-use storytelling platform."
• A+ and Editor's Choice rating from Children's Technology Review - "Powerful and free, this rich language experience lets you create your own self-narrated puppet shows."
• Winner of the 2017 BolognaRagazzi Digital Award for 'Best Kids App of the Year'


FEATURES
• A giant toy box chock full of swashbuckling pirates, transforming robots, nefarious villains, and many more characters and settings to spark kids’ imaginations
• Design your own characters with 3D drawing tools
• Add yourself to your adventures with photos and custom colored characters
• Mix your soundtrack with dozens of built-in songs
• Choose from three Story Arcs for digital storytelling (Short Story, Classic, & Science Report)
• Export videos to your Photos library to share with family and friends
• An idea lab chock full of playful stories, characters and settings to inspire new adventures

Fruit Ninja © 2017 Halfbrick. All Rights Reserved.
summary: Lights! Camera! Play!
title: Toontastic 3D

descriptionHTML:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.

Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!

Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces!
Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!

Features:
● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes.
● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!
● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!
● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!

Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!

Note:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game
recentChanges: "Tiny Parties" are available now! These are small short-time events. For example, all buildings get skill "Death: deals 10 DMG to enemy warlord" or all "Titanias" get double HP.
Create a deck that will rule the ladder!
A lot of small fixes and improvements
summary: Epic Warlords & strategic PvP fights returns in fast turn-based RPG Mighty Party
title: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash

comments: Guys since you are charging money and have no feedback system to report mistakes. Please invest in few people to go through the grammar...   I would give a perfect score then...  Love the design. Love the music. You could add a few different voices too that we can select coz i personally find the original voice bit annoying(sorry)...  Keep up good work!

It's a good game about evaluating our grammar. But one thing that should be improved, the app needs to have preposition lesson so that the players won't just guess the correct answer brutally if they get wrong.

Overall a nice little practice game.  I had a few issues and suggestions, that might make this even better: ‚Ä¢Some grammar issues were found. "Dose he have vehicle ____ his own ?". A game about grammar, having grammar problems is quite funny. (I am not perfect either) ‚Ä¢Getting a star rating after every single question seems a little pointless. I recommend giving feedback every 5-10 questions, and that might improve flow of the game.  ‚Ä¢Some questions (rarely) have more then one good answer, because there is not enough in the question sentence to establish logical context. ‚Ä¢If you have a longer sentence in the question, you need to increase the allowed time to get the answer. Maybe base the timer on word count, and letter count to give a fair amount of time per question.  ‚Ä¢It would be nice to have an option to view the explanation of the sentences that you failed, this would add to the app's educational market.  I do understand that this will add some extra work to achieve, but it might be worth the effort.

So far, so good. üëç I would have made some recommendations about a tutorial but I see many recent reviews have stated this. One thing I've noticed is that if you miss on purpose you can retry and score perfect on each level. It would be nice to see it skip that set and come back to it later. Highly recommend too friends and family.
An essential tool for learners looking to level up, easy to use and addictive, it should be a compulsory APP for all ESL learners! Love it.
Fun game and as I am not a native English speaker, it is definitely helping me in improving my English. Love it !

descriptionHTML:
Learn English and grammar free by putting the prepositions in place to form correct sentences and sayings.

Preposition Master is a fun and educational game for kids and English language students of all ages who want to learn and improve their language skills in a more entertaining way.

How do you play?

It’s easy. The game consists of putting the prepositions from each level in the correct place to form a correct sentence. (Beginner, competent, professional, expert, sayings.)

If you make a mistake and click the incorrect preposition, there is a time penalty.

Once you have completed the sentence you will receive a score based on how fast you were and your total number of errors.

You can share your knowledge with other players worldwide thanks to online multiplayer mode or with your friends on Game Center.

Are you an English expert who wants to show off your skills? Are you an English student who wants to improve your skills? Preposition Master will help you use prepositions in sentences correctly.

Preposition Master is the first game of its kind designed and developed completely by educators to help students improve one of the biggest problems language learners all face, correct use of prepositions. With four levels from beginner to expert, Preposition Master is a challenge for everyone from the Beginner to the most seasoned English language communicators. The Proverbs and Sayings level is a great way to learn and remember popular English idioms and expressions.

These are the levels:

Beginner: Ideal for children. This level contains the easiest sentences with the fewest prepositions to work with.

Competent: This is where things start to get harder. This level is great for learners who are a bit farther along in their English language learning adventure.

Professional: Great for users with a solid base in English who want to keep their skills up to date.

Expert: Only for those with the most proficient English skills. Are you one of them?

Do you have what it takes to become the next Preposition Master? Try your luck in single player mode or against friends and other players worldwide.
Learn English with a smile on your face.

Designed by masterKey games and the educators at masterKey english.
summary: Learn English and grammar free by ordering the prepositions to form sentences
title: Preposition Master Pro

comments: I love these games, really, and I was on a roll, but I can't get pass level 48 because my Wiko LENNY3 touch screen isn't responsive enough to register both fingertips at the same time. EDIT: I was too quick to judge the alternative way to be wrong. Thank you Bart, for your response. I retried what you said and had no trouble finishing the game. Can't wait to see the next game. You have a beautiful mind. These things you create, are a work of art.

Brilliant follow-up to YELLOW! ACCEPT NO SUBSTITUTES! And, there ARE games trying to pretend that they're the same...only Bart Bonte does it right!  I try not to let myself do too many levels at once, just so I can extend the game. I can't wait for the next color!

This game and yellow have single handedly improved my relationship with my niece. She loves playing these games over and over every time she comes to visit. Christmas day she didn't want to play with her gifts, she just wanted to sit with me and play yellow. It means so much to me. Thank you for making these games.

By far one of the best puzzle creators for Android games! I was hoping for another "Yellow 2", and changing the color really surprised me, Looking forward to... Blue? (PS: after playing for a while, All I see is orange :P)

Bart Bonte is a genius! If I see his name, I know I will love it. I just finished this one tonight and I loved every minute. I only needed the clues for the very last level because I'm familiar with Bart's mind by now. <3 I think it's great that clues are available though and that they don't give everything away right away. It's a big bummer when that happens on other games. Love, your die-hard fan! Please make another one soon!

Thank you, thank you, thank you, Bart Bonte! I've been waiting for a very, very long time for this game to come out since I first played "Yellow". Thanks a lot! But here are a few other questions I have for you: what will be the next game? How long will I have to wait until the next game comes out? Could you at least give me a hint? Thanks!

comments: An easy to learn game but interesting storyline using manga style. As an f2p player, I struggle a lot against other paid player who have a lot SSR character, although its not impossible to gain one, but it required a lot of patience...and luck. So far i still enjoy the game but seriously the energy recovery should be shorter, I can't even farm my character to blue+2 at this speed.

My son loved it till I made a recent transaction for him. Bought the 59.99 diamond pack for my son and he didn't receive all 4000 something diamonds he only received the amount for the 29.99 worth but payment shows for 59.99 would like a reimbursement on the rest of the diamonds or my money back please!

The story is great. The animations are great. The only thing I don't like is the chat system is awful and how little I can edit my announcement board in my faction. In most games that board is where the leader puts his rules and it would be especially useful because of how bad the chat system is few people are using it.

Can u make more playable girl character more striples D: .. just kidding.. but mybe iam really hope its become real haha  By the way.. i love this game.. i never play game in Android.. but yeah.. now I play because law of creation... 5 stars ^^

It's not bad for what it is. Magna style game that puts each picture as a stage. Every page is the chapter as you move on. Biggest flaw is obtaining a new character. Is very hard to get rare characters and most likely going to keep your same old group. Stamina also ruins game play as you need to grind out pages to upgrade your units. Not perfect but at least I had my fun with it.

The energy refill takes ages. 6mins per 1 enegy?? I already recharged and wanted to play game more. But the waiting of energy is hilarious that i have to play the game next day after draining the energy today. I'm uninstalling it now.

comments: Nice tone and music but thats about all. I like the radio future and pipboy, but... I rader prefer to put a bullet on a table and smash my head in to him than playing this. Do you guys know anything about RPG'S? Or at least tell me that you know what is a Game Book? I mean book from the old times when you just sit and read a story, making your own choices...??? It's something that you need to check. Then I will talk with you. Where the hell is going this world?

Not much actual gameplay. Stuff just happens and there is nothing you really influence. I'm not gonna talk about the translations because that has been talked about far too many times. But there's no real gameplay. I at least expected some RPG style battles. But no. It's like a text based adventure game, but you don't do anything.

I liked the ui of the game but its another developer that forgets girls exist and play these games. Bethesda never ever ever ever forgets this but its fans do. Thanks for that. There's no gameplay here either. No exploration and no combat. Your game isn't ready to be played.
