comments: A good graphics for a good beginning franchise. A well tame game for an anime base. But my concerns on playing this game is sometimes ita forcing crash. (I thought this was a high end game so basically you need a good phone that can handle a game like this) im looking forward for better improvements such as more charcaters to come. And much more sfx. Big thumbs up for this game.

Great game and graphics. Need to work on the optimization though as constant crashes occurs. Will also be thrilled to see rework on Yomo as he looks really plain in this game. Character collision and ability lock in also needs improvement, especially those with dashes which will be better to have single target lock in. Overall as a TG fan I love this game.

Bad review.. Took hours to download, though that's not the problem. I selected Facebook, logged in and everything, it went back to the start screen. Nothing happened. I tried my Google account and the same thing happened. I even tried joining as a guest but nothing happened.  There is no start button or anything. Help?

Decent game. Same game play as Marvel Future Fight. Graphics are decent. Maps are way too bland and boring though. Also feels like its too big compared to the characters. Lacking auto sign in. when game starts, maybe only gor Goggle accounts, havent tried with facebook login. Otherwise a decent game for TG fans.

Love this game and can't wait to see how it improves! I would love to see more characters though, especially a Kakuja Kaneki or a new variety of Ayato. Some of the lag needs to be fixed though as well as the auto fight randomly activating on its own.

This is the first app of Tokyo Ghoul that I've seen for my mobile that is actually decent. The pictures advertising the app on this page though don't really show the good detail. Which basically means the graphics are better than shown!
description: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.- Especially designed for mobile devices!Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!- Rich solo and team gameplay!Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart‚Äôs content!
descriptionHTML:
Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.

- Especially designed for mobile devices!
Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.

- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!
The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.

- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!
Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!

- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!
Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!

- Rich solo and team gameplay!
Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!
recentChanges: 1. Optimized the novice guide to make the game more enjoyable
2. Fix the incorrect ognization rank rewards
3. Fix the bug that battle times in arena does not restore evey hour as described
4. Fixed the bug that hero debris was not double dropped in double drop event
5. Add more chapters in ognization boss
10. Add new Ghouls Expulsion in game
summary: 3D mobile game based on Tokyo Ghoul.Officially authorized by Studio Pierrot!
title: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War

descriptionHTML:
"I thought… it had to be you."
The story starts when you find a girl,
whose data's been factory reset.

★[Becoming a loved one from being abandoned is…]
A repair shop owner who found the girl,
Free spirit, Tay.

★[I'll give you all my heart]
A man with a golden heart,
Full of hope and expectations, Simon.

★[Because you are the only one who sees me as I am!]
A cute boy who's bold and slightly perverted.
Love-seeking, Richard.

★[Did I really see this thing… as a girl?]
His actions speak louder than his words.
A guy who denies his feelings, Greg.

★[Why are you… trying to become different from me?]
He's intelligent and kind,
But his expression is odd sometimes, David.

★[You are the most precious person to me from now on!]
An android, just like her.
His love for her is pure, just like his name, P:ure.

Jealousy
Rivalry
Desire
and…

"Love"

A story of a Girl who's learning new emotions.
Who will be her true love?

comments: It is amazing.really keeps you hooked on.. However when it comes to completing the quest, resources get over quickly and as per the time we need to wait for 3hrs for getting the refill,or buy it with the diamonds.... Lower the time limit for resource production like in different expeditions..as that will unable us to play more and complete it too on time.

Such a great and fun game but you can't do anything without buying food, money and diamonds with real money. No videos or exchange options. Would have played a lot longer if these options were available instead op purchasing with real money. Such a shame.

I like the game, it helps pass time. My only complaint is you make it super hard to do anything without having tonso3ns real money. Which is ridiculous. I get that you need to make money off of this, but don't be so ridiculous about it.

Really enjoy the game. Not spent a penny on it yet and managing alright to do tasks etc in a reasonable time. Though I've not completed a quest yet but that could be me not getting back to the game regularly enough. That's my issue though.

The idea of this game is fun, but the actual game play can be a little monotonous. Almost impossible to advance without spending money.  For all the time and effort you have to put into it, there should be a bigger pay off.

It's not my favourite game because resources take FOREVER to get. I cannot spend real money and its expensive to purchase the package. It's so difficult to get diamonds and other resources. Please make it easier to get the needed items for the events.  PLEASE  !

descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it.

But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

Island Experiment features:

♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island
♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm
♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city
♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland
♥ Hunt for hidden treasures
♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos
♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid
♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions
♥ Gain unique rewards
♥ Collect lovable local pets
♥ Play with your friends and make new ones
And… have fun!

The game is free to play and addictive. Be careful!

descriptionHTML:
Explore the terror of an unlawful city where survival is the only option among the deadly enemies.

This game lets you enter a match of survival death where you can experience an explosive third person shooter. You need to face powerful and lethal enemy prisoners that have escape from jail.
You have to stop them from destroying the city!

The different missions of the game are highly entertaining and several exciting features enhance the excitement. There are various weapons to pick up including grenades, you can enter the different vehicles to escape or defend yourself, get a jetpack and even destroy the buildings around the city! Enjoy a fast-paced shooter action and defeat enemy gangs that will come for you.

New Features:
Full update to Third person gameplay
Flying jetpack
Tanks, taxis, planes, a lot of vehicles and new weapons

comments: This is a 4$ game for people who enjoy simple games. You will not find gatcha nor lengthy game here. Only a quality game akin to the feel of a "mini game" by the developers of the Kirby franchise. The art style feels abit remincent to Kirby or Wario Ware games. The gameplay is meant to be a relaxing challenge using the claw mechanic to pick up things to complete "jobs." The only downside is wishing it were longer but hey, no Loot boxes or RNG mechanic! Have fun :)

This is a short game. You might be averse to paying for a phone game that will likely take you only a short time to beat, but it's worth it.    It's cute and sweet, with the kind of plot and visuals you'd expect from Boxboy and Kirby developer HAL. With adorable characters, quirky levels, a fun gameplay mechanic, and a gallery of unlockable costumes, you'll most likely want to pick it up and play it again even if you've beaten it 100%.   There is definitely potential for updates, dlc, or sequels. I could see this becoming a great franchise.

This is the first mobile game from the creators of Kirby and developers of Super Smash Bros among many more. The type of quality you'd expect from a HAL or Nintendo product are all here. The game boasts fun characters, a beautiful art style, and great music. The game is simple, it's a sort of claw game where you have to load or stack things, but the developers have made many varied and fun levels

Extremely adorable! Fun and challenging at some of the later stages too. It's fairly short though and I can't see too much replay once you've gotten all the medals and achievements. But still worth the money I think, if you're a fan of HAL Labs and their games and you want to support them. I'd like to see some updates later on hopefully!

Only completed 5 stages so far but I'm having a total blast with the game. The background music is so silly and cute, and attempting to pick up or stack things can lead to hilarious results. I hope to see more cute mobile puzzlers like this from HAL Laboratory in the future.

Pretty fun game to play if you've got some time to kill. The core concept is simple, you just pick stuff up and place it where it needs to go but there are extra medals you can earn in every stage by completing certain tasks that add to the replayability not to mention cosmetic items that add abilities to your UFO. Glad to see HAL Laboratory has gotten into the mobile game business and for $4 this isn't a bad game by any means.

descriptionHTML:
○Part time worker, full time UFO!
In Part Time UFO, fly a UFO around and complete odd jobs.
Help out at a farm, support cheerleaders, cook up the ultimate dessert at a restaurant, build castles, and much more!
Wherever the UFO goes, there are sure to be plenty of jobs waiting.
At the center of all this is the UFO's super special awesome claw!
Use the claw crane to grab, move, and stack objects to complete jobs.

○Change your look with classy outfits!
Use your hard-earned money to buy costumes to change into.
Wearing these can give the UFO a whole new look and new abilities.
Whether you want to show your stripes with the Tiger Suit or zip around in Ninja Wear, there are lots of costumes to pick and choose from.

○Lots of friends (and foes?)!
Meet tons of people on the job.
From a tight-lipped ship captain, a clumsy museum curator, or a fishy professor, to even elephants, dogs, and hamsters, they'll cheer on the UFO during jobs, let out a sigh when the UFO fails, and show all kinds of reactions.
Some of them may also be disguised and hiding in wait...

○Work those tunes!
Part Time UFO features tons of catchy beats.
They're scientifically proven to make you more productive.
*Not scientifically proven

○Share your masterpiece!
Job? What job? Sometimes a UFO's just gotta stack to its unidentified flying heart's content.
Create fun or artistic shapes and snap some shots!
Show off the fruits of your labor with all your friends.

○"Works" with Google Play.
Try your claw at lots of different achievements!
Become the part-timeliest part-timer of them all!

[Caution]
◆No in-app purchases
This app contains no in-app purchases.

◆Available languages
The following languages are available:
Japanese, Italian, Spanish, German, French, Chinese (Traditional and Simplified), English, Korean.

◆Compatible OS
Android 4.4 or newer

▽Official Site
https://www.halegg.jp/eng/ufo/

▽Official Twitter Account
https://twitter.com/HatarakuUFO/
summary: A UFO is here to work on Earth!Use your claw to move and stack objects.
title: Part Time UFO

descriptionHTML:
Bầu Cua 68 là phiên bản game online 2018 mô tả lại trò chơi dân gian Bầu Cua Tôm Cá của người Việt có kết hợp thêm mini game Tài Xỉu treo với nhiều trải nghiệm thú vị. Phổ biến hơn là chơi đánh sâm.

Trò chơi Bầu Cua 68 phiên bản 2018 có cách chơi tương tự như Xóc Đĩa và Tài Xỉu, người chơi chỉ cần chọn 1 hoặc nhiều linh vật trong 6 linh vật có trong game là: Bầu, Cua, Tôm, Cá, Gà, Hươu và đặt mức tiền cược. Nếu nhà cái lắc đúng linh vật bạn chọn, bạn sẽ là người chiến thắng.

comments: I've been playing this game for only a total of 10 minutes, but so far, it has been enjoyable. The game delivers on exactly what it presents to be. It is a crisp, clean, smooth running, first person target shooting game. It is simple in design and very easy to play. Touch your screen, drag to aim, align your sight on target, and release to fire. The sound of the rifle firing is very enjoyable, as are the "hit target" sounds, the reward/level up music, and the "successful stage" jingles. If my opinion changes after further examination, I will be certain to edit this review accordingly.

Lots of fun. Simple yet difficult to master. I play everyday. I like the variety of targets. Purchasing option doesnt work. I tried to buy $4.99 of coins in the app. It took my money  but it never added the coins to my score. Google Play credited the amount back to me. Good app overall.

This Is A Good/Fun Game To Play If You Are Bored. I Just Downloaded It A Few Minutes And I'm Already Up In Ranks. I Love Arcery And Guns. This Game Puts Both Of Them Together That's Good For Me. I Rated This Game A Full 5‚òÜ

It is about slowly balancing your gun to release and take the shot within a set time limit but not quite as easy when you actually try. This makes it a challenge to perfect hand eye coordination so that makes for a good game.

This Game was very exiting and relaxing  and spend time with shooting king with archers I like Guns  and the bullet was very Big and the level is 100000 I think I will pay every day First higher stakes multiplayer and it appeared with the opponent cheated the time ran out from the shoot but the Game was froze. But the Game was very interesting and exiting I like shooting very much

First higher stakes multiplayer and it appeared that the opponent cheated. The time ran out for them to shoot but the game then froze. I was able to change guns, sent emotes, etc. and I was connected to a stable internet connection. I waited 20 minutes until finally sending the game yo the background so I could google if it was a cheat. Low behold I instantly lost all of my coins. Dont waste your time with this game, poorly made and cheaters will take all of your coins in multiplayer.

comments: it was love at first sight. beutiful visuals that match each song perfectly. a simple but adictive game that i cant recommend enough. a fair warning though, if you have visual epilepsy DO NOT play this game for it has strong flashing lights

My first thought when I opened uo the game and saw that it was made in unity I was expecting a broken half assed game. However, this game is crafted very well. Amazing effects for the sound pitches of the music played and the screen shake makes you really feel the music. For the car selection its pretty good. But personally, I would reccomend only including cars from the 70s to 90s. Since i'm guessing you're going with a vaporwave vibe, a modern car such as the jaguar isn't really the best thing in my opinion. Cars I would reccomend would be the Lamborghini Diablo, Ferrari Testarossa, Ferrari 348TB, any classic Porsche 911, ofcourse the delorean and any other 80s retro car.

Many games I play on a mobile device either start out lame or end up lame. But this is game gives me more joy than many other games combined. Its a masterpiece, now slap a price tag on it to make it worth your while. Good luck, AbstractArt.

I overally love the game itself, it just lack a bit if features. For example: -Song search -Difficulty settings -Speed settings Add these, and you have an awesome rhythm based racing game on mobile. The Devs did a great job.
Surprisingly awesome! Got it after seeing Neon Drive gameplay. Only problem is that when u hit a column, the screen flashes too long. I end up hitting more and more because I can't see.

Well it's not a game it's MP3 player with some visual effects. Zero gameplay, you can just start level put your phone away and your bird will finish level for you. No matter if u hit a red pole or not. You can't die here anyway. there's no challenge, there's no game at all. I like visuals though

comments: The latest update has again reverted my progress while suddenly gifting me some toons I haven't earned. I don't understand what the Devs are trying to do with this, but what a mess
Please include tweety bird on the character. üòçüòçüòçüëçüëçüëç  Bad update though toon task can't be collected. What just happened? The heck, its too hard to level up. The pieces are too huge.

The new update has changed a lot of mechanics and features and it really feels odd from an old player and a Looney Tunes fan standpoint.  For instance, I might understand Porky Pig being moved to WB Studios, because he has had roles before such as a talent caster, but Road Runner?  Wile E. Coyote?  Ralph Wolf?  Really?  Even placing Marvin's house in WBS seems totally odd and questionable, that, ignoring the fact that the Space region is a thing in the universe.  The task mechanic also makes less sense.  One task point even for larger tasks?  And what about the Toons' houses?  They don't even change form after each upgrade and the "bigger loot" incentive still does not apply beyond Level 3.  Also, we kinda know for a fact that the wheels are rigged, but with the current update, you can't really make it more obvious.  I still love the game, but definitely less than before.
Love this game best game in the world and if you do an update make it that you can add six people in your team when you fight other people.

boring after update more pay to play oriented they ask you to get more upgraded toons to progress mission while they reduced numbers of tickets to win in missions plus that restrictions that toons must be from there or there for mission not recommended

After last update the wheel doesnt feel random anymore but programmed to just give the same bronze square. Only hitting the two squares next to the jackpot. Wheel feels rigged now. Didnt had that before update.

comments: If you are into interactive games, this is a must play. It doesn't have any romance or even a big friendship to speak of, but it is still a game worth playing. The story is interesting and above all, it is fun. The only minor drawback might be its shortness. Despite that, I can only recommend it :).

It was fun the first time. But not a lot changes between playthroughs and despite killing off ylen they appear at the end of the game like nothing happened. Good but perhaps not worth the 3-4 dollar price tag with how short it turned out to be without the replayability.

[Spoilers] Although this game is a bit short, it does deliver on its promise of an interesting storyline. There a few issues, however. As mentioned, the story is short, and because of this, your fellow Gods don't have much development aside from a few possible quests. There are also some oversights. Killing Ylen at the climax of the battle will still result in her appearing later. Things like that. If this game was expanded to a larger experience, I would happily pay more for that. As it is, it's an entertaining short CYOA.

Well i think its a bit short. Tried all possible routes. Being 100% good and 100% bad but all routes have the same ending. Not worth my money,but hey i already bought it since the first 3 chapters are good. But it was a let down

This was the best game I have ever played, no joke! I feel like it was a little too short though, what if you were to add a free mode? A mode where the story wasn't a thing, but you could play the game without it.

While overall the story was alright, it left a lot to be desired. With the game being so short, I assumed that each path had it's own story for you to explore, however the game is very strict about what you can do.  I honestly do regret purchasing the full game, as imo it falls flat fairly quickly after the first three chapters.  Overall, the idea is great, but in execution it is fairly lackluster.
description: Create a mortal race to worship you and grow your strength. Guide them in their daily lives and help them grow. The power you collect will grow your mind and body. Dabble in the affairs of other gods or seek to destroy them and steal their power."The Aether: Life as a God" is a 60,000 word interactive fantasy novel by A. Reddwolf, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based‚Äîwithout graphics or sound effects‚Äîand fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.‚Ä¢ Create a custom mortal race.‚Ä¢ Engage in mortal affairs.‚Ä¢ Travel the Aether and steal power from lesser beings.‚Ä¢ Dabble in political affairs at The Court of Gods.‚Ä¢ Battle other gods in epic one one one conflicts.‚Ä¢ Complete unique quests and events with impactful outcomes.
descriptionHTML:
Create a mortal race to worship you and grow your strength. Guide them in their daily lives and help them grow. The power you collect will grow your mind and body. Dabble in the affairs of other gods or seek to destroy them and steal their power.

"The Aether: Life as a God" is a 60,000 word interactive fantasy novel by A. Reddwolf, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

• Create a custom mortal race.
• Engage in mortal affairs.
• Travel the Aether and steal power from lesser beings.
• Dabble in political affairs at The Court of Gods.
• Battle other gods in epic one one one conflicts.
• Complete unique quests and events with impactful outcomes.
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Countless minor bug fixes and changes.
‚Ä¢ Tweaked the rate at which you gain alignment points toward Good/Evil.
‚Ä¢ You should now receive the correct ending to Nothastrus' quest.
‚Ä¢ Ylen should now reward you with the correct amount of power.
‚Ä¢ In one of the later chapters, your race should no longer temporarily go from millions to a few hundred population.
summary: Rule over your mortal race, explore the Aether, and become an omnipotent god.
title: The Aether: Life as a God

comments: This is honestly one of the best games that I've played, and here's why: No in-app purchases, same gameplay in all levels with increasing difficulty. There was variation in maps, and game style. I would only change troop control, picking which troops go where so there could be more strategy. Also, change the way your money adds up. Instead of variation between $10-20, go up by ones at the same rate. It's more predictable.

Over all i give this game 4 stars. It is an amazing game, the graphics while simplistic still have a certain charm to it. The gameplay is smooth and addictive. My only problem i have come across is the gas doesn't appear i select it and the artillery doesn't kill he soliders even though the explosion was right on top of them. Other than that it is an amazing game worth the download. More missions and perhaps a survival mide would be a welcome addition. Amazing game!

The gameplay is simple and immersive. It gives you the perspective of how much commanders are willing to give for victory. But, flamethrowers are short-ranged, gas doesn't spread and it would be nice if one had tge function to send only a few soldiers at a time while others stayed behind.

Great great game but I think multiplayer would be better If finding a server was easierand  everything else brilliant love de game play nd idea. Also maybe more units . Also more options eg a cav charge for 80 nd a undermine for 100,maybe building defences in ur trench eg farmers or wire or turrets

this is actually a decent game, and it's hard to find a decent game in the playstore. first of all, it's fair. it isn't a pay to win bullcrap and you have the same options as your foe second of all, it's simple. it does not have unnecessary ultra graphics, it only shows you the important events that are happening. third of all, it does not have a difficult algorithm. the way the money grows is understandable and the levels get harder and harder. and last of all, it's really fun. it improves your patience and your critical thinking. its also a bit of a time consumer lol. sorry for bad english, and thanks alot for reading my review!

Good game and kinda reminds me of old computer games. Only 72 levels of game play but it took me a few days in all to finish the game. Controls are very simple and some levels work your brain every now and then. Would keep the game downloaded for pvp but no one ik plays it. Will download again in the future.

comments: I like this game a lot BUT the lack of gems takes the fun out of it.  I've tried a few times to get free gems by installing game's or completing a quiz but I only sometimes get the gems after. And the casino boat thing is a joke. You barely win anythingüòï I noticed nearly everyone is complaining about the same thing so I've been waiting for this to be sorted. Nothing has changed so I'll be deleting the app shortly..... What a pity!

If you love using your hard earned money for virtual play this is the game for you. What starts out with gems being a few at low amts as you advance the gem amt grows ridiculously outrageous. Move on because this game will break your bank account quickly.

It's a pretty entertaining game. BUT you have to buy EVERYTHING with gems (aka real money). Programmers focus excessively on making players pay even before they are hooked to the game!!! After getting to the second street zone, I find myself unable to continue unless I pay. I find it a little lame after all the effort you put on creating a pretty good game. Bye

Cute to see yall deleted my last review. Re writing and giving you 1 star.  Game crashes constantly. . Can no longer get into.  No more money will be spent till fixed. And if my review is removed again. I will just uninstall

Fun game at first... but be prepared to spend money if you want to get 3 stars in events! Also after you conplete the first area, they force you to spend real money to get to the next areas! Its is ridiculously gem hungry! Ive played a lot of games and tgis one takes the cake as the most gold/gem hungry game ive have ever played. The crusie ship is a scam too! Will be deleting it!

You can't proceed without gems once you unlock the second area. Pretty sad, because the game has potential. Hate to see greed override balance. You should be able to grind in a game like this and proceed... Not get stuck because you choose not to spend excessive amounts of cash.

Addicting game. Buy way too many video advertisements that use up your battery. Would be 5 stars if you could skip ad after a few seconds. But some are really long.
This is a great shooting game for my son. I dont want him to be exposed to dumb gay nerd games. I want him to embrace violence and be a man. Good job board bookies.  üò•üò•üí™üèæüí™üèæ
Need more levels. Fun time waster. Stimulates the brain. Isn't timed so you're not rushed to finish a word/level. Great work. Although, takes up a lot of space on my phone.

Well, the game would be much better if there wasn`t so many ads popping up in my face every.single.time.Loved the game thoughüòÄ.Fix the ad problem  and I will give this game 5 stars happily.

comments: This was my favorite game as a kid. Of course I played it on NAMCO museum for PlayStation. The controls were perfect and the entire family loved to compete. This version looks the same graphics wise, but these are the worst controls possible! Too small space and the fire button and move buttons aren't very responsive. I looked for this game before and it wasn't in the store now it is. Want to rate 5 stars but please fix the controls first. Too hard to play and enjoy at the moment.

If the controls were better, this would be 5 stars. This really reminds me of my childhood. I was around 12 years old when this came out. Great retro game that is authentic and gun, except for the controls, they don't respond all the time and the placement is bad.

You should be able to change the on screen controls to your liking, the on screen d-pad has and up and down button that does nothing and it just takes up room on the screen. But this is the closest to the real thing on the whole Play Store and it's still fun.
I absolutely love Galaga. It's (in my opinion) the best arcade game form the 80's. The only thing about this is the controls are sort of hard to use. It's not bad, it could just be tweaked.
It's fun, but the controls are so weird. Like the ship doesn't fire NEARLY as fast as in the arcade games... Fix this please?
My all time favorite as a kid. Was impressed how close it is to the arcade version but the controls are horrible. Please please please do something to improve them.
description: The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
descriptionHTML:
The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.

A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.

Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.

*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
summary: Controls a starfighter to destroy insect-like enemies
title: Galaga

comments: This game is very nice, especially if you suffer with anxiety or have anger problems, it helps me calm down quickly, with the calming music as well. It would be nice if there were more power-ups or characters but even so! The game was nicely made & has many challenges, resulting in it not being repetitive!! Would recommend‚òÜ

I like the design of this game; it's super relaxing & unique. I just really wish you had more possibilities eg more characters, other things to jump on (besides this tree kind of thing), or different lvs with a changing background depending on how high you get. otherwise this gets kind of boring after a while

When I tap and it doesn't jump for no discernible reason, it's a reeeeeeaaaallly bad sign. There's nothing that can redeem a game that has controls that don't work. The controls are so simple, I have no idea how they even messed it up like this.

I think everything about this game is great especially the music, it's so peaceful & relaxing. The only thing I wish was in the game were objectives, it gets a bit boring after awhile just continuous jumping without any objective.

I really like the game but there s a glitch/bug where the sound and music are the same. If I turn off the sound the music stops as well. If I turn off the music, the sound stops as well. I'm trying to play the game without the jumping sound effect which is extremely annoying when you're trying to listen to the calming music. Please fix!

The game's main objective is to climb as high as you can, collecting "fireflies" and "fern flowers" along the way, and that's it, there is no story to your ascension, so the actual gameplay can get boring very quickly. The art style of the game is similar to that of Alto's Adventure which makes it aesthetically quite appealing, but a bit unoriginal and overused. The controls are probably the worst part of the game. When they are actually working the way they are supposed to, the game is fun and oddly relaxing, but when they don't work, the game quickly gets frustrating. Overall the game isn't bad, but it has some flaws.
description: Once a year blooms a flower‚Ä¶It is said that it brings fortune to the one who finds it...Fern Flower is very atmospheric and compelling game.Climb mystic mountains in search of those esoteric flowers.Gameplay:Touch left or right part of the screen for character to jump accordingly.Climb as high as you can. Collect fireflies for better score.Gather fern flowers to unlock new characters and power ups.Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Once a year blooms a flower…
It is said that it brings fortune to the one who finds it...

Fern Flower is very atmospheric and compelling game.
Climb mystic mountains in search of those esoteric flowers.

Gameplay:
Touch left or right part of the screen for character to jump accordingly.
Climb as high as you can. Collect fireflies for better score.
Gather fern flowers to unlock new characters and power ups.

Good luck!
summary: Climb mystic mountains in search of those esoteric fern flowers.
title: Fern Flower

comments: Overall a beautiful game.   I pre-registered for this game, not realizing it was tap oriented.  Progression feels very slow when the game is closed, and there doesn't seem to be too much to the story after a certain point.   A good game though, worth a download if you enjoy testing your phone screen as all tappers do!

All around an amazing clicker.  The art is great and everything feels tightly balanced.  However, the rate of Stardust when the app is closed feels too low.  When I wake up in the morning, I feel like should be able to unlock something new, but instead I have enough for like 3 levels.  I can do the same in game in 1 minute.  I don't feel I should have to have the game open to make any progress whatsoever.

Sounded like an awesome adventure RPG. Was horribly disappointed. Just another mindless tapping game. Graphics were average if cute. Nothing worth getting excited about. Unless you like those kind of games. Boring and pointless to me though. Uninstalling after 45 sec of game play after faery explains the game.

This game is AWESOME! Although,  if you don't like tapper games,  this game might not be for you.  Or maybe it will be.  I don't know...  And I don't have the time to Ask!  This game is too addicting! I need to play it right now!         This game is SO CUTE!  I love the little characters and everything The graphics are awesome too.

ADDICTIVE! graphics, game flow, sound affects, leveling....it is great. Good for little girls as well! The only thing I would change is to add quests for awakening levels as well. Nothing like going back to level one with no motivator.
Another idle tap game that can almost play itself and will eventually give you tendonitis. The art style is very cute. Too bad it's wasted on such boring gameplay.

comments: It is fun and challenging I find myself returning to play constantly to reach another level and build my team I love my mercs. I like having to find the materials too. Often going back to previous levels needing three stars for best advantage. Only problem I have is with cloud save I can't log in successfully and you must exit game to save data to your phone leave any other way all current data is gone. lOVE the game Good job.

The only way i would give this game 5 stars if there was an option to walk around instead of pressing an arrow to jump from cover to cover that ends up breaking cause your enemy's keep shooting at it. You bring all these amazing features but you take away the most important feature in any shooting game: walking around and taking cover where you like.

Its not a bad game, its actually just like the rest of the shooters on google play, which is point and shoot type of games like Zombie Frontier. I bet this game would be a lot more fun if you could walk around instead of just sitting In one place which is my only complaint. But otherwise overall this game is rather a bit fun if you are looking for a time killer.

Well executed game.  Items are there only for quick power freaks.  Looking forward to seeing the add one for the game.   PS- The English in the game isn't great and could use improvement.  It doesn't affect gameplay,  just a bit nerve wracking,  üòâ

So far it's the best game I've ever played than before. I love the graphics only that it took much time of reloading the bullets( I'm kinda an impatient person) but good job. I would totally recommend this game to my friends.
So far so good.. has vood graphics and game play its not hard but not easy and really havent had the need to spend yet i think devs have done great job keep up good work

description: Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft! Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper! Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design  items to make the most unique interior design ever!Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant! Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala! Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a  french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!Craft & BuildSimply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!Play MinigamesPlay minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you! Meet the peopleUse internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend! Explore the infinite worldYou can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it‚Äôs your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!Become an interior and exterior designerUse one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design! Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!
descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Meet the people
Use internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Crafting, building & exploration of Paris, the city of art & love! Creative game
title: Paris Craft: Exploration of City of Love & Art

descriptionHTML:
Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! Switch and match candies to create 3 in a row, or match 4 (or more) to make delicious special candies! Complete the goals before you run out of moves to progress through deliciously fun levels. It's that simple!

Switch and match scrumptious candies to make mouth-watering combinations and play challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and Candy Bears! Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

New Candy Crush Soda Saga features: 

* Over 1000 Sodalicious levels
* New Game Modes include:
Soda – switch bottles and candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears
Frosting – match candies to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free
Honey – match candies next to the honey to release the trapped Candy Bears
* Scrumptious new candies and sublime new combinations:
Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish
Match 7 candies to create the remarkable Coloring Candy
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the kookiest characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
* For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Sodalicious scores
* Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

www.candycrushsodasaga.com
facebook.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga 
twitter.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

comments: This game was great until about 5 days ago, that is when it started to take 4 to 5 minutes loading time for each game mode to start. They have fine a great job with this game. The dynamics, the playability, the graphics, and it feels as if you could never stop growing. Every bot is beast with a certain load out and play style.  Update! After playing for over 3 years, and over many different platforms this game rocks. It's definitely not the mech its the pilot kinda game. The balance is good so if you spend money and level quickly you'll be placed on your mechs rating(mech level + weapon level) so take your time and learn some tactics. Every gun has its purpose but it takes a good pilot to make them work.

Game is designed to milk money out of its players. Fun to play. But $200 for a pretend robot or $100 for a single gun. Lower prices. You might be shocked more people can afford 20 than 200......reply- you think giving someone 15 pieces of a random bot that takes 2 games to earn if you place first out of the 10000 you need. Only real option they give is purchas. Don't be fooled. This is a pay to win game.

A great game that brings back the old Mech warrior days. One of the few good theme fps shooters on this platform that is "FREE". You can pay to win but it will cost you alot. Investing afew tens to smoother the growth? But you can still have plenty of fun without spending a dime.  Until it slowly draws you in deeper.....

I like how the game has gotten better over past year in many ways.. But could you guys quit making the puzzle peice stuff to get newest goodies? I get you added lots of cool ways to get extras that's cool and all.. But who wants 7 puzzle pieces out of 7,000? Not worth the effort. Keep it gold and silver guys!!

Game plays fine. No ability to choose mode is a major letdown. I did the $20 test to see if you can actually buy anything valuable. The answer is no. The game is geared towards the have money people. Update 2/23/2018  The queing is under 10 seconds. After Lunar New Year update you can earn upgrades better.  Discounts on purchase items is better.

descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 31 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 20 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
Watch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

comments: Impossible to not not crash when they are 3 wide and going the same speed in front of you and only 3 lanes to race in, No choice but to crash plus the lag doesn't help make it any easier to play! 2 stars is being nice this game needs a massive improvement

If you add a way to brake or just slow down, then it will be perfect. But when a wreck happens, you have to get in a certain lane to avoid it, but getting in that lane causes you to plow through multiple cars in front of you and so you wreck anyway.  If you could sit behind a car going the same speed, it would be very helpful.

Emphasizes timing, but doesn't have depth. Unlockable paint schemes and (not very many) tracks. Advertisements very much forced into the way of gameplay.  Monster Energy girls pop on to your screen with a dirty look constantly...
Even if I pass the car, I just get hit from the back of it. Sure it's graphics are good, but the control and turning of the car is impossible to master.
Awful. Cool concept. Poorly executed. Pretty sure there are times where you seriously cant get through without crashing
The game won't load properly I get to the NASCAR Rush screen then the screen goes black and I left waiting for too long

descriptionHTML:
Strap in and experience the RUSH in the first officially licensed NASCAR endless racer! Choose from your favorite Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series drivers as you Pass, Draft, Pit and Avoid Wrecks across 3 unique racing modes. How long can you stay out on the track?!

INTUITIVE CONTROLS
• Switch lanes with a single tap or swipe
• Overtake opponents and avoid collisions
• Draft to save fuel so you can reach the pits
• Repair Damage, Refuel, or Change Tires – what you do in the pits could make or break your race!

REAL WORLD DRIVERS AND TRACKS
• Select from any of the best NASCAR drivers
• Race across all 23 Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series Tracks

INCREASE YOUR PERFORMANCE
• Collect cards for your album to boost your performance
• Use card fragments to enhance your car’s abilities
• Complete your card collection to dominate the competition

3 WAYS TO RACE
• Missions – Complete missions to earn cash and gold, unlock cards, and increase your fame
• Endless Race – Earn rewards based on how far you can drive
• Live Event – Compete with other racers in weekly events that follow along with the actual Monster Energy NASCAR Cup season

LEADERBOARDS
• See who can drive the furthest and how you rank against your friends

---

Please Note: Must be 13+ to play. Included in the app are links to social networking sites and the internet intended for audiences 13+. NASCAR Rush is free to play, but offers in-app purchases. By playing this game, you adhere to the Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions of 704 Games Company.

comments: Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

I really like 90% of this game. However, the way the passes are done really suck. I absolutely love when the 30 days unlimited ad free pass comes up for $9.99. Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

Love this game! The only part I don't like is that all of the best options cost diamonds and you literally have to pay for them. It makes sense for an app, but it happens to often. It ruins the story because I won't buy any diamonds. I'll rate this 5 stars if they at least change it to not as often.

I like the game but waiting three hours for two passes is terrible.  And we have no other option to get free passes it is either wait or pay. I feel like I'd we got more than two passes I would be okay with the wait. But waiting three hours knowing I am going to use those two tickets in less than a half hour is crazy.  Then I will lose interest in the story and forget what had happen, it isn't okay. But other than the wait for passes I really like this game.

I really like the idea of the whole game.  And the episodes are pretty good in length depending on what story you use. But I think it is completely ridiculous that you have to wait 4 hours for more passes.  Overall,  if you don't mind waiting and are a very patient person then I do recommend this app for you.  However if patience is a virtue you don't have then you should find a different app.

Its very addictive. But they need to give more gems and free passes. I love the Deep attraction and chain reaction trilogies. Some authors first language arent English, but the stories are still well written.  A lot of profanity used in the gang stories, so be aware of that.  But this is my fave app

You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****
Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select.

Features:
-Pixel cube graphics
-Six levels to conquer
-Precision aiming
-Radar map
-Health meter
-Perks & power-ups
-Blocky weapon collect

comments: Great game, fun to play.  Only things I don't like are the fact there are so many ads and not just short ads long videos which is really annoying, and second and probable the biggest issue I found is that there is no single player option! comments: This is a very entertaining game that is simple to play. It has provided me with hours of fun! The only thing is that I wish there were more combinations, there are things I've tried that you'd think would make something but don't. For example, Crayon (or Pencil, or Charcoal, or Paint) + Paper does not make Art.

This game is pretty addicting. I get stuck sometimes but I always find something new.  Small issue though, I it won't let me pull rust out onto the screen for some reason. I've used it before, but now it won't let me use it anymore. Perhaps it is an issue with my phone rather than a glitch in the app.

This is leagues better than the original alchemy game. There were a lot of bugs but they've all more or less been patched out. It took me 2 months of playing everyday to get all of the items and combinations cleared.

The interface is not so good. Big icons are not convenient, we have to scroll down long everytime, I could only imagine how much effort would it take if I had 500 items discovered. Please make icons small or a different tab just for icons or just make it like little alchemy one.

I love this game so much. I'm stuck on trying to make life but it's not frustrating it's challenging and I like it. Also, for all the people getting pissed off because the items disappear and you cant 'use' them anymore it's because you can't combine them with anything anymore so it is put in your encyclopedia so that doesn't waste space for the things you can use, it's actually a very smart game mechanic. I'm pretty sure it even says that in the tutorial. I also like how they didn't take the same combination formulas from the first game and instead added new ways to achieve the same product in a more realistic way, also there is so many items to create! So I think that this is an all around great game. Good job developers. Good job indeed.

Its a cool game. If you press the hint button it gives you a choice to watch a ad for help. I am not seeing in-app purchases so far and I have had this game for a while! I recommend this but not the other version. It gets a tiny bit boring after a while though. overall, GREAT GAME! Whoever made this game is great! :) :) :)

Little Alchemy, the crafting game enjoyed by millions of players, is back with more items, fresh, new art style and charming music!

What are you waiting for? A whole world is waiting to be discovered!

New animations added in the game.
summary: Mix items and discover exciting combinations! Little Alchemy returns in style!
title: Little Alchemy 2

comments: Game itself is fine, just your average clicker. Word to the wise though... DON'T CLICK ANY OF THE 'NOTIFY ME' BUTTONS. They permanently enable notifications with no way to turn them off short of hardblocking them in your phone settings. A good amount of the 5 star reviews are very obviously fake as well.

The game is good but the fact that there are no settings to turn the sound off makes is annoying and i wish you could costumize your main character, like maybe to make it a girl.  **1 day later after installation and review**: I'm trying to get on the game but it's not loading at all, so i cant play the game.

Love it..ads add value worth watching!! Passed up this game a few times playing build away offered this for a prize and now I love this one n want to uninstall build away but want to see what comes next in both sooo I'll keep!!! Great game glad I installed!
I got addicted after a while and then I noticed that you play as Crafty Callum!  SO JUST LOVE IT
This is the best game ever I've only played it for 10 minutes and I love it. I'm glad you don't have to pay for it thank you for creating this game
I love this game its my favorite along with idle farming and build away

Befriend mobs and animals to mine by your side and craft awesome gear like potions, enchanted books, furnaces and pickaxes to enhance your journey. comments: Would be better if you could Manuel between tricks  and if the tricks were in combo with other instead of individually named. Also can't seem to feeble, or smith grind:/ Fakie seems to not be working for me, it just registers at regular even though I'm clearly riding fakie! Also I've paid for this game and haven't seen a new park in the past year and the map The Docks sucks!!

Controls are terrible. Doesn't feel natural at all. Have to pay for every park/spot other than the starter park which sucks. Just pay the $1.99 for True Skate. Way better game with more natural feel for the controls and bigger parks/bettter spots. It's like going from Tony Hawk Pro Skater to EA's Skate series. Give us at least better controls to make this feel better. Fluck it. Not pick up finger to ollie which doesnt even work %80 of the time.

Spent literally hundreds of hours playing this when I had an iPhone, it was the best mobile game of all time.. Then I switched to android, and waited forever for it to be ported to android. I was so happy when I found out it had eventually made it's way to the play store, downloaded it immediately and bought all of the parks. Then I realised it didn't have the option to replay clips or edit them like the iPhone version does. This has ruined the game.. One of the best features was the ability to watch back a line you have spent hours perfecting, edit the clip and share it. PLEASE judt add the ability to replay and edit clips on android like you can do on iPhone and make it the greatest game of all time again.

It's an amazing game! I also have a suggestion. For tricks, like the ollie and kickflip, it should matter where your feet (Fingers) are, so if your going for a kickflip, you should have your foot higher up on the board and for doubles and triples, your foot should be farther down. I know it's quite large and some people may not like it, but it would add more realistic gameplay.  Edit: Also some different trucks would be nice, and also if it had grind marks.  Also you should add user challenges and maps, I know this would be a huge update to make but I know it would make the game so much better.

Needs some fixes. It's EXTREMELY annoying when I go to do a nose or tail slide, the game does a boardalide. Even if I'm blatantly placing my fingers in the right spots on the screen. How do I unlock "Skate". Needs more designs. Better customization.  Also needs to recognize more tricks.  Along with already existing ones to be better portrayed. Should add a mode where the board is essentially floating. So that one may be able to flip the board without wipe out to see how to do a specific trick. Game is fun though.

Awesome game it's so fun and like real life skating I use to play this game along time ago when It had the horrible camera angle and it has improved a lot. It's not hard to control either. The one thing I didn't like was that there is no replay! If you could replay truck it would be perfect
description: ‚ÄúTouchgrind Skate 2 blossoms into a world of enjoyment [..] Illusion Labs does it again!‚Äù - TouchArcade Just like in real skateboarding or fingerboarding, Touchgrind Skate 2 is a game of skill that takes 10 minutes to understand but a lifetime to master. Learn the tricks, complete challenges, and unlock new skateboard parts.Get the highest score in time-limited Competition mode, rip freely and complete challenges in Jam Session mode.True innovative finger controls together with real physics simulation let you pull off tricks like ollies, pop shuvits, kickflips, heelflips, impossibles, powerslides, lip tricks, stalls, drops, 5-0‚Äôs, 50-50‚Äôs, crooks, tailslides, bluntslides, darkslides etc in endless combinations, or why not do them in nollie, fakie or switch? - Only your skill and imagination set the limit!Get a maximized experience with a real skateboarding feeling - Skate like in real life on your device!FEATURES- Realistic physics and stunning 3D graphics- 3 free roam game modes: Training, Competition, Jam Session.- Tutorial videos - watch and try yourself!- Natural multi-touch controls, evolved from Touchgrind and Touchgrind BMX- Tilted camera view, similar to Touchgrind BMX- Three different skateparks with bowls, ramps, curbs, boxes and over 2.000 meters of rails- Complete the 100 challenges to unlock decks, wheels, grip tapes and stickers- True skating experience - Trick name detectionNote: Touchgrind Skate 2 comes with a single skate park and contains additional content only available by In-App purchase.Follow @illusionlabs on TwitterLike us at www.facebook.com/illusionlabs1
descriptionHTML:
“Touchgrind Skate 2 blossoms into a world of enjoyment [..] Illusion Labs does it again!” - TouchArcade

Just like in real skateboarding or fingerboarding, Touchgrind Skate 2 is a game of skill that takes 10 minutes to understand but a lifetime to master. Learn the tricks, complete challenges, and unlock new skateboard parts.

Get the highest score in time-limited Competition mode, rip freely and complete challenges in Jam Session mode.

True innovative finger controls together with real physics simulation let you pull off tricks like ollies, pop shuvits, kickflips, heelflips, impossibles, powerslides, lip tricks, stalls, drops, 5-0’s, 50-50’s, crooks, tailslides, bluntslides, darkslides etc in endless combinations, or why not do them in nollie, fakie or switch? - Only your skill and imagination set the limit!

Get a maximized experience with a real skateboarding feeling - Skate like in real life on your device!

FEATURES
- Realistic physics and stunning 3D graphics
- 3 free roam game modes: Training, Competition, Jam Session.
- Tutorial videos - watch and try yourself!
- Natural multi-touch controls, evolved from Touchgrind and Touchgrind BMX
- Tilted camera view, similar to Touchgrind BMX
- Three different skateparks with bowls, ramps, curbs, boxes and over 2.000 meters of rails
- Complete the 100 challenges to unlock decks, wheels, grip tapes and stickers
- True skating experience
- Trick name detection

Note: Touchgrind Skate 2 comes with a single skate park and contains additional content only available by In-App purchase.

Follow @illusionlabs on Twitter
Like us at www.facebook.com/illusionlabs1
developerAddress:
Illusion Labs AB
Kalendegatan 25
211 35 Malmo
Sweden
recentChanges: Fixed graphics glitch and rails in The Motel
summary: Skate like a pro in the most realistic multi-touch skateboarding game ever!
title: Touchgrind Skate 2
