comments: I like the idea of this game. I'm on level 30 now and I don't understand what's getting harder. I solved level 30 the first time in 17 seconds. Why do I have to play it three more times to move forward? What's changing in the game? I feel like it's been practically the same since level 10 or something. Also, we should really have the red/blue disparity number or get a second after solving the puzzle to look at the board and count for ourselves. These are constructive questions and ideas, it's a fun puzzle.

The way ads are handled in this is really good. Just so the developers know, there is a final fantasy XV ad that doesn't "finish". After the ad appears to be done and I close it, I'm told it doesn't count. Might be something to bring up with Google/ad company if you don't get paid for that ad.

Awesome concept, made me actually understand political stuff is read about! Ads are handles amazingly. Who knew rigging elections could be so addictive. Wish there was a bit more variety and progression, the money feels somewhat meaningless, but this has been go to commute game for weeks.

So wrong, but feels so right. You can look at this either of two ways: as a trainer for a key skill in your political career; or as an amazingly fun little puzzle game did you can pretend this doesn't really happen in the real world. Either way, this is your new guilty pleasure.
Loved it! You need to look close enough to break the pattern. But I can't get past Lavandula, level #32.. it still shows 1 star required even though  I have cleared it about 10 times

A wonderful hands on demo to show exactly what gerrymandering does. I was worried about grinding, but if you play "streaks", you'll come out with enough coins to stay ahead for a very long time (until maps in the late 40s, at least, then a few more streaks will break through the later ones.) Since the maps are randomly generated every time, it's always a new puzzle. There are NO unsolvable maps, and hints are free, to prove it.

comments: Just constant ads. Every time you go into a menu you haved to watch an ad. After awhile you need gems for every upgrade. P2P gameplay and ads filled. Gameplay is good, but this game seem to only be maded as a cash grab.
They begged me to rate. But i like it, Stop asking me to rate. I Only like GAMES with painting abilities. Okay?
Cute and delightful, the game is well worth some time. It's addictive gameplay is marred by the tap mechanics in so many other games.

The game is alright. What attracted me to this evolution game in particular was how the phoenixes looked. I killed a few hours on this game, and I decided it's not for me. The ads are also way too frequent. I get that you guys have bills to pay, but I literally get an ad each time I go to Mars. There are also a few grammatical errors here and there, as well as an audio error I noticed. When I go to change the colors of my phoenixes and get interrupted by an ad (everytime I might add), the menu music and the main page music overlap each other. This wouldn't be that big of a deal if it didn't happen every single time I opened up that menu. The game itself can get boring after a while as well, so I'd only recommend this game if you have absolutely nothing better to do. Overall, it's an okay game, but it's absolutely swamped with ads and that really kills it for me.
After 2 min in the game my first thought was: wow so nice and simple. No stress.

descriptionHTML:
How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? We don’t really know, but now YOU can play a role in their immortal legend!

Combine different mutant phoenix species and create endless new mythical firebirds to promptly replace the ones that perish!

No one will ever notice this smart trick, and the legend of the phoenix will live on forever!

(...or at least as long as you keep playing).

LEGENDARY FEATURES

🔥Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🔥Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the phoenixes.

HOW TO PLAY

🔥Drag and drop similar phoenixes to create and merge new mysterious creatures to get to the final and powerful god Phoenix
🔥Use phoenix eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🔥Alternatively, fiercely tap a phoenix to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🔥Different stages and many phoenix species to discover and merge
🔥A mind-blowing story with mythical twists in a fantasy world!
🔥The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🔥Doodle-like illustrations
🔥Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🔥No phoenixes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers (but they rose from the ashes, too)

What is it called when a new phoenix is born? A phoenix dawn.

If you like Phoenix Evolution, check our other evolution games. We have Dragon, Cow and even Unicorn Evolution.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: The greatest supercar show has begun! It's your chance to drive the slickest, most powerful cars around! Feel the excitement and joy of taking part in one of the greatest motorsport events!FEATURES:‚ñ∂ 10 AWESOME CARS: Drive the best & fastest supercars!‚ñ∂ INVITING FESTIVAL AREA: Explore the environment full of challenges!‚ñ∂ OBSTACLE COURSE OF SURPRISES: Drive around race tracks and beyond‚ñ∂ 50 DEMANDING MISSIONS: Put all those cars through their paces!The best cars and the most challenging courses await you in this driving simulator, designed and developed with fans of the fastest supercars in mind! This is your opportunity to drive the most desirable cars around and push them to their speed limits! Your driving skills will be put to the test as you reach the highest speeds and race to become on of the top competitors on the road!Explore the authentic, realistic, sunny environment where the Supercar Festival takes place! Drive around the festival grounds and beyond! Put the pedal to the metal, hear the engine‚Äôs roar and feel the rush of adrenaline as you get into the groove and complete challenge after challenge!Drive fast and drive safely ‚Äì you wouldn‚Äôt want to crash any of those slick, shiny cars! With eyes on the road and your reflexes in check, you‚Äòll be able to overcome any challenge the game throws at you. Remember ‚Äì don‚Äôt rush it. Those are high-performance, high-speed vehicles, so you may feel the need to drive as fast as possible, but sometimes driving smart and safe is a better strategy.Learn the strong and weak points of all the vehicles and you will now how they behave on the road. When you feel confident in your driving skills, start experimenting. Take sharp turns, drift, control your speed wisely. Beat the time records and put your name up there with the best drivers!The amazing fleet of in-game sports cars is complemented by two different vehicles for added variety. The Supercar Festival also allowed one limo and one classic vehicle to participate. Hop into one of them, forget everything else and drive! Start things slow in the main festival area, driving around other cars and obstacles.But fun only starts there! After a while you will be able to get on the road to explore further or try your driving skills on a sandy beach! Discover all of the games surprises by yourself!
descriptionHTML:
The greatest supercar show has begun! It's your chance to drive the slickest, most powerful cars around! Feel the excitement and joy of taking part in one of the greatest motorsport events!

FEATURES:
▶ 10 AWESOME CARS: Drive the best & fastest supercars!
▶ INVITING FESTIVAL AREA: Explore the environment full of challenges!
▶ OBSTACLE COURSE OF SURPRISES: Drive around race tracks and beyond
▶ 50 DEMANDING MISSIONS: Put all those cars through their paces!

The best cars and the most challenging courses await you in this driving simulator, designed and developed with fans of the fastest supercars in mind! This is your opportunity to drive the most desirable cars around and push them to their speed limits! Your driving skills will be put to the test as you reach the highest speeds and race to become on of the top competitors on the road!

Explore the authentic, realistic, sunny environment where the Supercar Festival takes place! Drive around the festival grounds and beyond! Put the pedal to the metal, hear the engine’s roar and feel the rush of adrenaline as you get into the groove and complete challenge after challenge!

Drive fast and drive safely – you wouldn’t want to crash any of those slick, shiny cars! With eyes on the road and your reflexes in check, you‘ll be able to overcome any challenge the game throws at you. Remember – don’t rush it. Those are high-performance, high-speed vehicles, so you may feel the need to drive as fast as possible, but sometimes driving smart and safe is a better strategy.

Learn the strong and weak points of all the vehicles and you will now how they behave on the road. When you feel confident in your driving skills, start experimenting. Take sharp turns, drift, control your speed wisely. Beat the time records and put your name up there with the best drivers!
The amazing fleet of in-game sports cars is complemented by two different vehicles for added variety. The Supercar Festival also allowed one limo and one classic vehicle to participate. Hop into one of them, forget everything else and drive! Start things slow in the main festival area, driving around other cars and obstacles.

But fun only starts there! After a while you will be able to get on the road to explore further or try your driving skills on a sandy beach! Discover all of the games surprises by yourself!

comments: An Honest attempt by the devs. The game can be cheesed too easily. I mean , I don't even think for the most of the time, I just calculate the last digit and since there is only one answer with that digit as the last I just go for it. A version with a more forgiving timer and more obscure answers (for example 458 , 468 , 598 , so you need to think actually instead of going for the last digit) would be greatly appreciated.  Edit : I changed my rating since the dev seems to care about the app.

Great Game to spend short breaks and train your brain. I haven't tried out many of these kind of games but the dark background with the bright font is easy on the eyes and the minimal design is good for concentration. It's not a kid's math app which makes the training useful ;) One question though: what's MMQ Boost?

Love it! Great way to build calculation speed and challenge yourself mentally!  One small recommendation -- please make it more like an actual test scenario! Some easy workarounds can be found for problems. For example, in the addition questions you only need to calculate the units digit to arrive at the answer because only one option with that same units digit is present. This is too easy for people who are trying to prepare for tricky tests like the GRE or GMAT, where the options are full of traps.

Edit: thanks for the fix  Great brain teaser for math nerds. The UI is well done however the timer is out of place and distracting. Why do I need to know the 10ths place of a second? when I am doing mental math the last thing i need are numbers flying across the screen. Why is the timer larger than the math problem? I want to focus on the problem and not how many seconds to the 10ths place I have left. I ended up playing this game with the timer covered by a piece of paper.

It's actually too hard for me. I can't get past beginner level. This isn't really for 'actual' beginners to learn/practice maths, it's more of a game to give people who like maths/are pretty good a challenge.
Really hate timed features on games. I just want to relax and do math not take a test. Can't understand why there isn't an option to disable the timer.

descriptionHTML:
Fed up with boring math problems like 5+7 or 3×1?
You are looking for new challenges?
Do you like calculation games?
Mental Math Master is exactly what you need!

Exercise your brain with complex and tricky math problems.
Mental Math Master promotes the mental arithmetic and the power of concentration.
Try it and you will see, your brain will thank you.

x² √x logb(x) + - × ÷

Challenging arithmetics are waiting for you:
- Exponentiation
- Square root
- Logarithm
- Addition
- Subtraction
- Multiplication
- Division
- Summation
- Factorial
- Equation

Try to reach all levels to improve your math skills!

How To Play
The rules are clear: just tab the correct result before the time runs out.
If the result is correct you get a point.
If not, you lost the round.
Try to get 10 points before the time runs out.
Master 10 rounds to advance to the next level.
The problem gets harder every time by using different arithmetics.
You can stop the time by clicking the stop button, only 10 times per level.

This game is free and is supported by ads.

If the game is too easy just let us know. (5daysweekend@gmail.com)
We already have a few ideas.

We wish you and your brain a lot of fun!
summary: Fun maths training for experts.
title: Mental Math Master

comments: This is a great game... You should play it if you like gymnastics and if you are board,You   should download this game... Is very fun... I liked it... But it still needs a bit more to improve.. I would love it even more if you had more stuff.. And if you didnt had to pay for anything  at all.. Also, please just open the spa and the other stuff you cant get unless you pay!

I downloaded this game for my little sister and the first thing she said was that there are way too many adverts and I agree because whenever she clicked on say the dress up or nail salon or gym and adverts would always come up. The game also lags too much even though she has a brand new IPad. However at this time I would not recommend this game. My sister said that she would play the game again if you reduce and have a limited amount of adverts. As well as the advert problems the game keeps telling me to buy everything and it pops up every time I think when you press the 'X' button it shouldn't show again. Please fix this now. As much as my sister loves this game the adverts really annoy her. Would not recommend this game!!

This is from my daughter, "I like the game but there's some things about it I kind of don't understand. Some of the controls are a little difficult like the one where you have to tap 1 or tap 2 when she's practicing. And its fun. Some of it I like a lot."   This is from me, "the app is annoying until you buy it. It downloaded a ton of icons (ads for other games) to my picture gallery without informing me. My daughter likes the game a lot and it's fun, but a bit intrusive with the free version. The gameplay is good overall."

The main thing I didn't like about it is how little things you can do unless you spend like 10 bucks especially seeing as this is a game that looks like it's targeted towards children $10 is pretty expensive just to be able to play a gymnastics

It's a cool game, it just could be better and maybe there could be some other things in the update. Don't take it seriously! I'm not trying to be mean but maybe there could be some other leotards and the update and some more hair dues because all of those buns and people may not like that's just buns people may want the braids that you always have in your other games. I mean the French braids and they keep going down into a braid, all those things would be nice!

I love the game,but I don't know how to take off the tights or skirts if I don't want them on. The reason I downloaded this app is because I started gymnastics class and I love it and every time after school I get on my phone and play this game and  it makes me want to go to the gym.

descriptionHTML:
All your hard work has finally paid off - you’ve made it to the Olympics! Now’s your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! Work on your amazing gymnast moves until they're ready for the Olympics. Practice makes perfect! Compete your way to that shiny GOLD medal! Keep your eye on the prize!

WOW. Your dream has come true. You’ve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you’ll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!

Features:
> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! Make that gold medal yours!
> Perfect your uneven bar routine and floor exercises!
> Get ready for the biggest gymnastics competition of the year, with an Olympic "coach to the stars!"
> Dress up is always fun, but gymnastics dress up is the best! Dress up in a glittery, fantastic gymnastics leotard that will make you stand out!
> Get creative and come up with your very own aerobic gymnastics routine!
> Look like a real star gymnast! Get a makeover, a manicure, and a new hairstyle!
> Hit the gym & get in shape before the competition!
> OMG! Golden Gymnast magazine just asked you to be on their cover! Photo shoot, here you come!
> Impress the judges with stellar aerobic gymnastics moves like side aerials, triple full layouts, triple pikes, backward rolls & more!
> Ugh - gymnastics injury. No worries - the doctor will treat you in time for the big competition!
> Relax at the spa before the big day. You deserve it after all that hard work!

About Coco Play
Coco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.

description: Border Security Wall Construction is a fascinating edition created by TwoTwenty games. In this special defense strategy games you are going to enjoy the mixture of the building and defending at the same time. This wall construction games will allow you to play the role of the builder and army force at the same time. It will give you the height of the full fun and a captivating gameplay. Do not forget to recommend your friends and family members if you like this combination of check posts and construction crane. Moreover, you are going to have the experience of handling construction crane. Here you are going to enjoy the army duty games for the country defence and for your home defense. Let us assure you that all the construction vehicles have easy and smooth control. You have to build security wall on border for security. In this airport security wall all process of cutting and simulation are divided into different levels of border crossing wall. This boarder wall is the necessity of the security fences. There was a boundary wall but the enemies have destroyed it with their attacks. So, the mayor of the city has given you an assignment to work on it in palace security wall to save your home from the attacks. The first level of concrete security walls is to break the old wall. You have to take the help from the bulldozer while working on this level of israel west bank wall. The second step of this home security walls is to dig the area with the help of excavator. Now you need to make rod structure using drag and drop in residential security. Then you are supposed to place structure on dig area in high security wall. The gravel is already filled in the truck in chinese security wall. Drive this truck and take it to the construction site in ind border wall construction and park it near the concrete mixer. The concrete mixer is ready now you can fill the dig area with it in defensive wall construction strategy. In this mission of Palestine security wall you have to place structure of walls by using tower crane. Then fill wall with the concrete in school security wall construction. In this mission of airport security wall construction you need to place tower structure by using mobile crane. Fill the tower with concrete in security wall design. Gate is already there take that gate to the site and place it in pak border wall construction and enjoy!Border Security Wall Construction: Wall Building Features:‚òÖ Play our security construction games for FREE on any Android device‚òÖ Buckle up your seat belt and take control of awesome country defense‚òÖ High-quality 3D graphics‚òÖ Many hours of free fun of security wall construction‚òÖ Awesome environments of security games‚òÖ Enjoy super immersive environment and realistic sound effects.‚òÖ Finish all levels, with different objectives and challenges.  Download Border Security Wall Construction: enemy attack sim created bye by  TwoTwenty If you enjoy this FREE game, be sure to rate us 5 stars.

So, the mayor of the city has given you an assignment to work on it in palace security wall to save your home from the attacks. The first level of concrete security walls is to break the old wall. You have to take the help from the bulldozer while working on this level of israel west bank wall. The second step of this home security walls is to dig the area with the help of excavator. Now you need to make rod structure using drag and drop in residential security. Then you are supposed to place structure on dig area in high security wall. The gravel is already filled in the truck in chinese security wall. Drive this truck and take it to the construction site in ind border wall construction and park it near the concrete mixer. The concrete mixer is ready now you can fill the dig area with it in defensive wall construction strategy. In this mission of Palestine security wall you have to place structure of walls by using tower crane. Then fill wall with the concrete in school security wall construction. In this mission of airport security wall construction you need to place tower structure by using mobile crane. Fill the tower with concrete in security wall design. Gate is already there take that gate to the site and place it in pak border wall construction and enjoy!

Border Security Wall Construction: Wall Building Features:

★ Play our security construction games for FREE on any Android device
★ Buckle up your seat belt and take control of awesome country defense

★ Many hours of free fun of security wall construction
★ Awesome environments of security games

★ Finish all levels, with different objectives and challenges.

description: Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level. With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:- Each player has two serves in a row- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead- During this overtime the players alternate after every serveYou control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible. But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You‚Äôre not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.Features:- 3D Ping Pong- Table Tennis World Tour- Realistic Ping Pong Physics- One of the best sports games- Choose your own country- Become the Ping Pong Master
descriptionHTML:
Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level.
With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.

You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.

The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:
- Each player has two serves in a row
- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead
- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead
- During this overtime the players alternate after every serve

You control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible.

But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You’re not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.

Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.

Features:
- 3D Ping Pong
- Table Tennis World Tour
- Realistic Ping Pong Physics
- One of the best sports games
- Choose your own country
- Become the Ping Pong Master
summary: Win the World Championship in this 3D Ping Pong Game with realistic physics.
title: Table Tennis World Tour - The 3D Ping Pong Game

description: Baby Ava Daily Activities is a game about learning activities of our day to day life. This game is a collection of many activities with fun tasks, which are necessary in our regular life. This famiy educational game covers all the activities we do in our routine life. description: Running games are so exciting and competitive, that's why we love them and enjoy them so much, but for some reason not all of this type of games are as we expected, sometimes it's too slow and doesn't have good designs. So this is why we made a very special and unique masks games, and we are pretty sure that all pj fans will enjoy it.Pj Marathon Race Masks be a part of a running race, run and jump all the obstacles and show us how fast you can run in this competition. Four worlds and areas are available for you to compete on it. this why our masks games is very different exciting and enjoyable. every time you play it you will have a complete different and new experience, new running tracks new worlds. and the best things about this pj games is we worked to include all the pj characters, you have the chance to choose your favorite character and play with it. description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time.

comments: Guys, this is an amazing game! Seriously, only problem the jump button is EXTEMELY unresponsive.. especially on the swimming levels, is this a design choice or a small bug, because on the normal land levels its "ok" still horrible but on the swimming levels its extremely unresponsive and is hard to stay consistant. This is the games biggest flaw. Its EXTREMELY unresponsive

Great game! Quite challenging, and really fun. I have a small bug to report. On level 8 on Classic mode, the air meter is messed up. Multiple times I have spawned and immediately died from drowning. Pretty annoying. Also, when you first enter the spinning spike section (level 8 or 9, I can't remember), the entry field is placed quite high. Sometimes I try to swim under the spikes on lvl 8 and then get warped to the next section and immediately touch the spinning spikes. But other than those two bugs, the game is amazing!

Love this game! I have beaten both new and classic levels and they are awesome. The spinning line of blades that go up and down the screen in Level 8 is especially brutal, and to me several tries to beat. To everyone saying its impossible, its not. Juat keep trying and you will get it. Overall just a fun mobile game.

comments: This is a great game but the bottom line is the developers want you to spend money upgrading. You get along so far upgrading with coins, which can be earned. Then they want tokens, which you must buy, to go further. The deals on weapons that are offered are always just out of reach. You can earn diamonds watching videos but I would rather play a game than waste time watching stupid add so I can play a game. It was fun but no more. Deleting.

It is far too difficult to advance in this game without spending money. The developers get money from ads, and I'm willing to watch them, but not for 1 diamond every 30 seconds, when the smallest upgrade in weapons is 360. They must not want people to keep playing an otherwise good game.

This is the most grindy game I have ever played. To get anywhere close to a smooth play through, you have to spend obscene amounts of money. It'd be just as much money to buy a PlayStation 3 and fallout 3, and you'd have better graphics, better shooting, and shorter load times. Plus, every level and every gun has to be downloaded separately. It's over 200 mb for me, and I only played for a day and got to level 2!
After the update on 2nd Mar-18, Spec ops not loading. Game simply terminate itself while trying to load spec ops Level 16. Everything else is working fine. I'm stuck üòìüò™

What's wrong with the "FREE TRIAL" in PREMIUM ".??  It's "FREE" but I need to submit a billing transaction card or whatever it is !!! You said it "FREE" so after 7 days cut off the trial. You just want to make money in the word "FREE" üòëüòëüòë

There are always connection errors during PvP (internet connection was stable) and since the last update PvP is such worse. I don't know why, but there are just 4-5 other players each game and  the game is over after a few seconds

descriptionHTML:
AIM and SHOOT! Download now for FREE one of the best fps shooting games!
Start the killing: FIGHT the global war on crime and become the ULTIMATE SHOOTER.

Get yourself a gun and start shooting, clash with the criminals!

Sniper 3D Assassin® in 7 words: great gameplay, awesome visuals and entertaining missions. And best of all? It's a free fps game to pass the time! Defend the victims from kidnappings to bomb attacks, hostage survival is critical!

- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
- HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
- Tons of letal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet

DOWNLOAD the app for FREE now and don't miss amazing NEW CONTENT on periodic UPDATES. If you like fighting games, you will love the cool Sniper 3D game! Take down the bad guy from his fantasy, and get the glory for saving the victim. The final word is with you, and the rules are clear: aim and shoot!

Forget those dumb, repetitive shooting games. Here, your duty will include racing against time, exploding helicopters in American cities, killing zombies and quite a few shots in slow motion. Survival is necessary! But can you solve the puzzle, save the victims and kill only the right target hidden in the crowd? Can you stop the virus from spreading? You received the call for duty of saving the people.

Read what millions of extremely happy players have say about Sniper 3D. Check out our reviews!

Sniper 3D Assassin® is brought to you by Fun Games For Free.

The best first person shooter (fps) action game! Be the best professional sniper in every environment! The combat is real, and you can be the hero.

● Hundreds of mission:
"Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, do you copy?" Find the target, aim, shoot.
Save the state secrets from the rogue agents and spies, and stop them from spreading a terrible virus. Do you have the skills? Help your country in the massive nuclear competition. Be accurate and save the hostages and victims of the enemy.

● Start racing to kill a zombie army and prevent global war and destruction. Don't leave any zombie alive: start to shoot and kill them all! Are you prepared to all the action and adventure in this awesome fps shooting game? Can you guarantee the survival of the human race?

● Unlock awesome weapons and upgrade them with evolutions in the arsenal:
Buy the best Sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns or Pistols that exist with the gem you earn in the game! Upgrade the ammo, the grip, the calibre to get bullets that inflict more damage, better range, scope, stability, or zoom. Will you choose the hunting rifle, the awesome assault mp5 or a gun Glock or colt in the armory?

● Play it anywhere
Sniper 3D does not require you to be always online in order to have fun. You can enjoy it offline in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on toilet!). From time to time, it may be necessary to download additional (free) content online.

● PvP mode
Try out the pvp mode: prepare your gun and hunt your enemy. You should kill him first. The pvp mode will test your speed in killing and hunting. Take long and you will be dead. Get into action now and enjoy the adventure in this top shooting game! Follow the rules of your training and act!

● Limited data usage
Our game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music. Have fun with limited data usage.

● Disclaimer
Sniper 3D Assassin® is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep away it from your kids and younger boys

comments: It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Took me a little while to get the hang of the controls but it's fun once you do. Could maybe do with some hints to help get the best body position in flight, as this took me a while to figure out. Otherwise, it's a good time sink.

Sometimes it makes no sense. You are coming from quailication as 7th, you jump to 2nd position so surely you cant finish worse than 8th? WRONG. You end up on 16th place which is impossible. There is no in between you either win or you finish 14th or lower. You have 30 pts lead in front of number 2. after 1st round, you slightly fail your 2nd jump, guess what? 18th place for you! If you jump for example 120m on a K90 in Q, you finish first because everyone jumped 20m less, sudennly in 1st round you need 130m to secure your first place because everone managed to jump extra 30m. All in all fun, but still needs a lot.
No idea how the take off works, seems to be a perfect sweet spot but no tutorials to help you find it. Deleted
Every time I land, I crash. Have tried everything possible, but still always crash.
It's diffrent I've only played 10 min and your asking for a rating. Can't give a fair rating if you don't get time to play lol

descriptionHTML:
Tankr.io is an all new tank shooting and surviving game. The goal of this game is to defeat all of your competitors on the map and fight to the last one. Then you’ll survive and win! Battle against the cunning enemies now!

If you are a tank lover and looking for the stress reliever, tankr.io is waiting for you! Try and enjoy the unique tank battle game!

How to play?
- Control your tank to move around by virtual control lever when your finger touches the screen.
- Fire and shoot your opponents when they show up and come close. Your tank will aim at your competitors automatically.
- Skillfully make the best use of the terrain and grass to attack
- Survive longer with many props and supplies appeared on the ground
- The more opponents you kill, the higher your ranking!
- Remember to upgrade your tank and make it more powerful.

Game Features:
- Real-time tank battle gameplay with simple & easy control
- Auto-targeting with just one click
- Variety of props assist you to fight!
- Highly optimized graphics and sounds
- 3D role and scene, gorgeous combat visual effects
- Cool skins and tanks for your choice. Make your own one!

Download Tankr.io and enjoy the battle now! Have fun!

descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!
title: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator

comments: I'm loving these updates really bring more life to the game. The new car is really fun because it can flip over really easy. Please don't change that. A few suggestions: When you go to winter wonderland you can't go back. Would be cool if car panels would become detached like the hood or the trunk. Adding a police cruiser would be cool too. I like the breakable rear lights on some of the cars. Maybe add deflatable tires? Very good game all in all

Need a 67 Shelby mustang gt 500 fastback "Eleanor". Also needs a hand brake for sharp turns and drifting and maybe an inside view with steering wheel and stick shift. Very fun and addicting game. Great job here. Multi-player would be cool too.

This game is awsome!  Controls and graphics can be a little laggy,  but the large amount of tracks and cars to unlock and play around with makes up for it. My favorite car is the Duke Wagon Classic, nitro-charged, with a v-8 dropped into it.  Will kick butt in any race or derby! My only suggestion would be on the physics of the cars... Instead of having the bodies simply crush and get smaller/deformed, it would be cool to see body panels and  small pieces like lights and mirrors fall right off. Just a thought. Also it would be cool to have more big station wagon type cars.

This game is really fun and additive I play it EVERYDAY. This game is by far the best demolition derby game I,ve  played. For my free car I would like a lykan hypersport please!!! ;-) If you do not know what it is please look it up and please try to make it they are really cool, fast, and exotic cars. If not I would like tank. Thank you for reading.

Cool game! Good grapich! Nice control! Fun Game!  Well, this game need more jumpy track and smaller road for racing. Imagine if you race and the car jumping through the track. Idk why straight maps its not very fun to play. I want downhill track with ultra high jump im sure lot of epic moment will happened there   And jumpy map for derby mode with more obstacles and every maps must have its unique​ thing like falling rock or bouncy bomb im sure this will give more fun.  Car? I want the car have accessories like extra headlight, bumper or weapon? 20¬∞ arc ram in front of car will give more fun and and rear mirror and driver POV camera  Well, i want ice cream truck, the officially derby monster truck, hot wheels car and F1? :/

I had loved this game until it stopped saving my car purchases. Like my last  one the pick up that looks exactly like a 80s chevy with the cap off and roll cage. I put 7.0 motor in it with NOS tires and paint. Went in this morning it was gone. Please fix.Norton also says you're monitoring my location how obtrusive you dushbags.

In fact we started adding so many more features it became an entirely new game!Features Include:‚Ä¢ Free Drive mode‚Ä¢ City Traffic‚Ä¢ Police Chases‚Ä¢ 55 Race Tracks‚Ä¢ 10 Demolition Derby Arenas! ‚Ä¢ 40 Unique Cars‚Ä¢ Engine Upgrades‚Ä¢ Add Boost To Each Car‚Ä¢ Custom Paint‚Ä¢ Wheel Changer‚Ä¢ Custom Window Tint‚Ä¢ Change Your Car Number‚Ä¢ Post Race and Demolition ReplayWe want to hear from you! descriptionHTML:
- Banger Racing - Destruction Derby - Open World Driving - Upgrade & Customize Vehicles -

Smash and Bang your way to the lead in this fun and exciting Demolition game inspired by Banger Racing and Destruction Derby races all around the world.

With the great success of Circuit: Demolition Derby from Beer Money Games we wanted to keep adding new features to the game. In fact we started adding so many more features it became an entirely new game!

Features Include:
• Free Drive mode
• City Traffic
• Police Chases
• 55 Race Tracks
• 10 Demolition Derby Arenas!
• 40 Unique Cars
• Engine Upgrades
• Add Boost To Each Car
• Custom Paint
• Wheel Changer
• Custom Window Tint
• Change Your Car Number
• Post Race and Demolition Replay

We want to hear from you! Please post a review and let us know any bugs and what feature or car you want us to add to the game next!

title: Demolition Derby 2

comments: Why changed something that wasn't broken?  Using easily slipped drag-n-drop is awfully annoying, very bad it ceased my interest to play

It simple and enjoyable, but the nested loop chapter doesn't really explain how to actually use a nested loop to solve the puzzle. I didn't use a nested loop in any of them. And there's only two levels. After that you have to pay, and given the complete lack of instruction or assistance, I wouldn't want to pay to advance...
Very bad control for code movement. Hate it so much it spoils the game. One single wrong step and you cannot do anything other than restart again or study your "code" from the beginning.
You love games? Also love to learn programming? Say no more!! this is the best app that ever created for both things!!

In level 1 Loops, it gives you 5 blocks to place. I place: loop 3 times, pick, move forward x2, pick. I tried to place turn right BUT IT SAYS CANT PLACE MORE. HOW STUPID IS THIS THING? And on level 8 Basics, the same thing happened!
I prefer the original coding planets; gameplay was easier and control smoother. In my opinion it just needed some more development, not a sequel.
description: Do you want to improve your Coding logic skill?Coding Planets is Educational, Brain training and puzzle game. In this game, you have to write program for a robot to solve the puzzles. descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for this challenge? Probably the hardest raft challenge you can possibly play right now . This is.. YLYL ! (You Laugh You Lose), Welcome !

This meme game is really easy to play, just watch funny videos and try not to laugh, seems easy right? Believe me.. is not so easy to try not to smile. You will see ! LWIAY and start challenging your reigns friends !

We have pick the best videos for this app, watch those and try to getting over it ! This is really a trap adventure game, once you have watched the video two meme images will appear.

- Did you laugh?
- Did not laugh

Once you have made a choice in this little trivia you will see the percentage of people that have voted Laugh and Not Laugh. But can you do this?

The topic of the videos are quite general .. from tide pods challenges to uganda knuckles videos on the virtual chat or many others as fantastic bottle flip challenge, and smash or pass videos.. as you can see the variety is huge !

You Laugh You Lose was popularised by youtubers life pewdiepie and markiplier. They made many videos talking about this challenge.

Are you sure you want still to play? Will you press the button to play?
summary: Play now YLYL ! Try Not To Laugh in the latest Internet challenge
title: You Laugh You Lose

comments: I was super looking forward to this game! And it is pretty good, the graphics are nice, love the ancient Egyptian setting. A reasonable variety of games, although I have seen better, there seemed to be more HOGs than usual? I found some of the puzzles hard to see, because the background was dark and the lines of the hieroglyphics faint. Solid effort though.

It was okay. It seemed exciting throughout the free play part, but the more I played, the more I realized it was a lot of back and forth retrieval of objects. I've seen more interesting minigames, though I did like the option of searching or matching in the hidden object games. I do wish the story and game was better, for that price. The collectables were a bit too easy to find, but the morphing items in the hidden object games were hard to find, at least for me. Overall, the discounted introductory price was the maximum I'd pay, and honestly this game wasn't that good for the introductory price one has to pay.

Meh.....too much random clicking in HOS's with no clear direction. I really wanted to like this game, but with no bonus chapter, it is not worth the price. I don't mind paying for good games, but AM needs to deliver more if they expect me to keep paying.

descriptionHTML:
🐬 YOUR FAVORITE DOLPHIN GAME JUST GOT EVEN BETTER!

Now’s your chance to become a dolphin trainer! With more than 20 million downloads, My Dolphin Show is loved by dolphin fans all over the world! Teach your dolphin incredible tricks, then put on shows that will make the audience go wild. Your performances will take you through seven awesome locations including Las Vegas and Hawaii, where you’ll get the opportunity to show off your dolphin’s new skills!

🐬 TEACH TONS OF TRICKS & CREATE YOUR OWN LEVELS
There are more than 80 tricks to teach your dolphin, including crazy corkscrews, dazzling donut jumps and a piñata smash! Pick your favorites and combine them in awesome new levels that you create yourself. It’s easy! Your levels can be played by your friends and other players from around the world. They will rate your levels and help you climb to the top of the leaderboard. Of course you can just play other players’ levels too – choose from over half a million levels that already have been created!

🐬 DRESS UP YOUR DOLPHIN!
Collect coins as you swim and dive in the pool, and use them to buy new stuff. Have you ever seen a dolphin dressed as a princess, or a cheerleader? How about a fairy, or a bride? There are tons of gorgeous outfits you can choose from to make your new dolphin BFF look fabulous. You can even pick new animals and characters, such as an orca, shark, mermaid, or even a unicorn! With more than 40 options to choose from, you’ll have endless fun!

🐬 FABULOUS FEATURES
- Safe fun for kids of all ages
- Become an expert dolphin trainer
- Perform in 7 worlds with 200+ levels!
- Teach your dolphin 80+ tricks
- Collect coins and stars!
- Create your own levels!
- Choose from 500,000+ levels created by other players
- Pick from 40+ outfits to dress up your dolphin
- Play with crazy new characters
- Enjoy amazing HD graphics
- Play anytime, anywhere, no wi-fi needed

This game for girls and boys of all ages is free to play. So, are you ready to wow audiences worldwide with the tricks you’ve taught your favorite animal? Dive straight in!

PRIVACY POLICY
http://www.spilgames.com/mobile-apps-privacy-policy/

TERMS OF USE
http://www.spilgames.com/terms-of-use/

descriptionHTML:
Rebirth of MapleStory From RPG to Real-time PVP!
Duel with Cards, Win with Strategy!

Witness a fresh new take on MapleStory's heroes in MapleStory Blitz!

ㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡ
Enjoy the Fairy King's blessings while raining arrows upon the battlefield, Mercedes!
What he wants, he steals! Maple's master of Subterfuge, Phantom!
A charismatic captain set on destroying everything that stands in her way, Kyrin!
The blazing conqueror who engulfs her enemies—and allies—in flames, Oz!
Vengeance incarnate! Every bit of damage only makes him stronger, Demon Slayer!

And don’t forget Maple’s roster of super cute monsters!
Build and battle with a custom deck of freshly reinterpreted characters and skills!

comments: This game is actually really good, one of the best gacha games out there at the moment. I'm giving one star for now because it's currently unplayable for me. When I try to open the app, I get a black screen for half a second, then I'm booted back to home screen.

One piece story plus the game itself makes it really fun. One problem: for some reason when I'm trying to buy gems, the game doesn't properly update on how much balance I actually have on google play, therefore preventing me from purchasing it when I actually do have enough money.... Please fix.

It's a great game in all manner but the inventoy system needs a complete change. Putting items and characters in the same inventory makes no sense and makes it impossible to store important itmes. Please make a separate inventory for items and manuals and it will be perfect.

Great things have been implemented into the game recently and it must be commended. The thing that really bothers me is the character recruitment side of things, pull rates are really confusing and stacked very heavily in bandais favour. In other words The characters most sought after will have a 0.002% chance of dropping, added to  that the prices charged for a chance of getting these characters is ridiculous, so expensive.

It's awesome but could you put the time of the game somewhere in the corner to see?  I lost 50 gems for nothing cuz I didn't know the exact time.. As some might find it annoying then maybe optional if it's possible

Reached my 400th day today and am still unsure whether to continue or not- 3rd anniversary was a big rip off. For sth which suppose to be a celebration event it did only one thing to consider to quit this game for good.

descriptionHTML:
With over 60 Million+ downloads to date, ONE PIECE TREASURE CRUISE is an exhilarating adventure with your favorite Anime crew. Form your own misfit pirate crew, pull off power combos, and relive your favorite moments from the One Piece storyline. The world of One Piece awaits you!

- Relive the ONE PIECE storyline -

• Join Luffy and the Straw Hats on their quest to find the One Piece!
• Explore each chapter of the epic story
• Complete quests and watch as the adventure unfolds
• The unpredictable and diverse World of ONE PIECE is now yours to explore!

- Recruit and train your own Pirate Crew! -

• Featuring your favourite major and supporting ONE PIECE characters
• Over 1,000 characters from the Anime to recruit
• Each character has unique abilities
• Re-enact and create new thrilling battles!

- Intuitive Battle System -

• Featuring an all-new tap battle system, specially designed for your smartphone.
• Unleash exhilarating tandem attacks to deliver devastating damage and send enemies flying!
• Strategies and chain together attacks to fight even the toughest of enemies
• Become the strongest pirate crew on the seas!

comments: Such a shame. The game is great, really enjoyed the concept however it is a prime example of how monetisation strategy can ruin a game. Gems too difficult to earn without buying them, and purposely easy to accidentally spend them. Too many ads too. I'd rather have paid for the game. Deleted it after a  day or so.

Not What It Used To Be  The second to last update I did for this app switched the aim of the ball to slightly off from where you point it. So now have to compensate (guess a bit) when you're aiming which makes play more challenging.  Likewise, levels beyond about 440 are becoming impossible to beat w/o saving like a weeks with of bonuses to use on each level. Beating one level a week is hardly fun anymore! I may be uninstalling this app soon.
Everything has been great till about 1 month ago when the graph is slowed downed. After you start off there's delays in the line of balls and very unsettling it's not continuous anymore.

Game has so much potential and is a blast. I'm giving it a bad rating because gems are insanely expensive and they have so many buttons to hit to "use 200 gems to remove 3 lines" as one example or another to lose 200 by placing the button right above the back button on a phone. Super lame move on devs to intentionally take insanely expensive gems from us by mistake. No confirmation or anything, just boom, gone. Lacks ethics to say the least rinow
Games fine. I refuse to rate a game well when it's annoying ads start pushing political agenda against gun owners. Will go elsewhere
Great game.   But one of the adverts is a virus.   The IG Academy advert wrecked my game and now my phone's being a pain in the ass

comments: Just saw this and even though I haven't played it yet, it looks beautiful! Lots and lots of positive reviews and its wonderful that you respond to every review. Can't wait to play it! EDIT: I. Love. This. Game. A little glitchy, sure, but we can't get 'em all right! Keep it up! The game's fantastic!

I installed this game today and I already love it. It helps me build characters and think about how I can work with my stories. I only have one issue, I can't get any black hair. I see that you can change the colour of the hair that you have, but I can just get it to a light/dark brown. Other than that I really adore the game, please keep up the good work

I absolutely love this game with the part of me that is OBSESSED with anime. And i think that it is so sweet you respond to comments like that... I just... Wow most people that have created apps I've played don't listen to the players and that's what makes the app better.üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

Great layering options. Plenty of customization. Quality drawings. I like it! Thank you! Also, the ability to resize characters is so useful. I haven't seen this mechanic on other apps, and as such, this is the best!
I love it! The problem I have with this though, is the save mechanic. When I press the camera, it won't save. And I can't screenshot it because of the huge checkmark in the center.
This app is beautiful but when I change the hair I wanna go down but if I let go it disappears and  then I can't put anything else on it

comments: It's a great game if you like consistency. The level are set up the same way, with different icons. The down fall is that there is a limit on how much you can bet, you wouldn't be able to bet 3/4 of your pot or even 1/2 your pot. This game is still by far a really good game.

Thank you for creating a game that is actually fun!!  The payouts are excellent!  This is the best slot game that I have played and I have been through quite a few!  The only thing that could make this game even better is to make clubs so we can talk to team mates!  Please do not change the win/loose ratio like all other slots have done.  I have recommended your game to everyone I know with positive comments from all!

Played a lot of these games and this is the best by far. Love it Don't waste your time with any other game. The pay outs are frequent and sizeable. I've been playing max bets for ever and I'm sitting with 6.5 trillion in credits. That's right ......thats trillions. Best slots

This is a very entertaining game. Great graphics,great returns. No complaints, plenty of plaudits. This is the second time I've written a comment. Do you feel insecure? Do you need me to write a second review? I stand by my original comment. Please don't ask me to write a third review, it takes me away from the game!
Awesome payouts! Frequent wins. Great graphics only down fall is it takes awhile to level up which gets boring also would rather be able to bet higher make it more risk taking cheers

description: Tricky Bike Trail Rivals is 3d stunt drive game among tricky bike games of motorcycle adventure with crazy offroad stunts. Best bike stunt game in which you will perform insane stunts of motocross with stunt driving of mountain bike on amazing stunt tracks by moto ride. Tricky bike trail rivals have the awesome challenge of riding and driving in extreme stunt adventure of speed moto. As bike stunt rider and driver, you are doing stunts and tricks on tricky track in bike stunt challenge 3d. Perform crazy stunts on challenging tracks in top bike games to become stunt master and tricky racer. Crazy bike tricks master challenge 2018 will test your real stunt drive skills as a top driver and top racer.Drive tricky stunt bike and heavy motocross in the wooded tricky environment. Perform crazy moto jumps with impossible ramp stunts on wooden tricky tracks. Test your driving skills of a fast motorcycle in a motorbike stunt racing adventure to get the title of best racer and a top driver. Use real bike power to make huge jumps over hurdles race to finish point. Be careful while riding and racing do not fall from tracks. Enjoy speed stunt riding on wheels while racing against time. Time is running out you have to jump and perform tricks on stunt ramps with fast speed motorcycle in crazy bike stunt 3d adventure 2018.Stunt and jump motocross on jump filled tricky tracks to do crazy stunts. With expert riding and precision extreme driving of high-speed bike on jump tracks, you will get the title of stunt champion. Get ready for stunt motorcycle adventure of motorbike and bike to become expert driving and master of stunt world. Your challenge is to do perfect high jumps and insane tricks with fast moto riding and racing to become ultimate racer and legend of modern tricky stunt adventure 2018.Fasten your seat belt and ride the 2 wheeler bike and motorcycle to join real stunt adventure 3d 2018 of driving and racing as a professional stuntman and extreme tricky bike driver. Be expert stunt driver and racer of the heavy bike and show your expertise in tricky stunt racing and driving to become stunt driver and racer in motocross stunt adventure 2018. descriptionHTML:
Unleash the power of the bubbles!

Get ready for the ultimate bubble shooter app!
Play now and enjoy the classic and most popular bubble game for FREE!

Can’t get enough of exciting, fun puzzles?
Then this app is just perfect for you! Download today the best app on the app store and discover exciting new challenges and levels.

Gear Bubbles Amazing Features:
• Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
• Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to create a line blast and pop the group.
• Beat all the challenges to win coins and reach high scores.
• Clear a level with less moves to get a higher score.
• Avoid bubble clusters by planning your moves!
• Complete the missions and reach the level target.
• Use your logic and color-matching skills to overcome the obstacles and pop all the bubbles

• Challenge family and friends and see who can reach high scores and win the battle!

Play everywhere, anywhere and as much as you want. No internet connection is required.

comments: This used to be my favorite match 3 game of all, but lately every level is impossible unless you get JUST the right amount of luck in the gems that fall. I'll give it a few more tried and then I'm uninstalling it.
After 4hrs got to level 6 & couldn't even get close to progressing further. Seemed no point in playing the same level over & over & over again so I quit, you win (but you lost me)

I had rated it 5 stars even though it's tough to pass some levels. It took me more than a year to get to the 18-20th house & then an update sent me back to the beginning. :-( I don't play much anymore.

Relaxing - challenging, love the graphics Update: I was recently out of town and happened to check my bank account thoroughly for something else - I found all kinds of charges I didn't make but came from this game. It came to my attention because I didn't have time to play, not to mention I don't care how long it takes to pass a level so rarely pay for anything to pass a level. LOTS of unauthorized charges - I'm speechless and just sick. Had to cancel my card. I'll NEVER submit a card number for a game again - unless it's a throwaway visa - it would be the only way I would purchase in the future. Its a fun game -  DONT  let them into your account. Just...dont.

... UPDATE ON 3-1-2018 ... Was 5 star now 1. In my best Dalek voice UN--IN--STALL!!! Not sure which update did it, but this game that was one incredible is now slow as molasses! Each move painstakingly takes about 5 seconds for the gems to fall. I'm completely bummed. üòï

Slow and impossible. Yon need to collect items to move forward.  To collect items you need to beat the same previous level over and over. Just completing a level once is a major achievement. Got bored uninstalled

description: Features:‚Ä¢ ONE SWIPE BOWLING - gets you bowling Strikes in no time, but also helps you develop skills to master an awesome banana bend. Free bowling games have been waiting for this - control the speed, trajectory, and spin on your ball in one simple swipe to launch it down the lane.‚Ä¢ DESIGN YOUR BOWLER - Unique to Strike Master, select face type, hair, eye color, clothes and more to create your own unique bowling character. Use him/her online to show off and make people remember you.‚Ä¢ ONLINE ACTION - take on the best, or your pals in online or local multiplayer matches.‚Ä¢ SKILL SHOT CHALLENGES - 40+ hand-crafted special shots with pins in lines, pinball-style poppers, ramps and more. 10 pins doesn't seem so easy when they're in a line.‚Ä¢ CUTTING EDGE - Full of fancy 3D shaders, animated alleys and with the best and most accurate physics engine around, Strike Master Bowling has everything covered and in full 3D.‚Ä¢ ACTION REPLAYS - Celebrate your strikes and spares by watching them again in slow motion, all beautifully rendered.‚Ä¢ 11 TOURNAMENT MODES to play, including Free Roll, Small is Beautiful, Strike Master Challenge and Risky Rumble.‚Ä¢ FOUR GAME MODES to get stuck into; Practice, Tournament, League and On-line.‚Ä¢ EIGHT AWESOME LANES to bowl from the glamour of Vegas to a submarine lane in an aquarium, a neon palace or even an alien invasion themed folly! ‚Ä¢ 125 BOWLING BALLS - from beautifully marbled, baseball and basketball like balls, and even glass bowling balls encasing flowers and even particle emitters!‚Ä¢ ACHIEVEMENTS to bag including ‚ÄòMillionaire‚Äô, ‚ÄòElite Bowler‚Äô and ‚ÄòLocal Champ'‚Ä¢ SAVE GAMES across devices with Cloud Save ‚Äì climb up the leagues on multiple devices and never lose your progress.Strike Master Bowling gives you it all, in one handy 3D game, and best of all it's free with no need to spend endless money to get anywhere.
descriptionHTML:
Features:

• ONE SWIPE BOWLING - gets you bowling Strikes in no time, but also helps you develop skills to master an awesome banana bend. Free bowling games have been waiting for this - control the speed, trajectory, and spin on your ball in one simple swipe to launch it down the lane.

• DESIGN YOUR BOWLER - Unique to Strike Master, select face type, hair, eye color, clothes and more to create your own unique bowling character. Use him/her online to show off and make people remember you.

• ONLINE ACTION - take on the best, or your pals in online or local multiplayer matches.

• SKILL SHOT CHALLENGES - 40+ hand-crafted special shots with pins in lines, pinball-style poppers, ramps and more. 10 pins doesn't seem so easy when they're in a line.

• CUTTING EDGE - Full of fancy 3D shaders, animated alleys and with the best and most accurate physics engine around, Strike Master Bowling has everything covered and in full 3D.

• ACTION REPLAYS - Celebrate your strikes and spares by watching them again in slow motion, all beautifully rendered.

• 11 TOURNAMENT MODES to play, including Free Roll, Small is Beautiful, Strike Master Challenge and Risky Rumble.

• FOUR GAME MODES to get stuck into; Practice, Tournament, League and On-line.

• EIGHT AWESOME LANES to bowl from the glamour of Vegas to a submarine lane in an aquarium, a neon palace or even an alien invasion themed folly!

• 125 BOWLING BALLS - from beautifully marbled, baseball and basketball like balls, and even glass bowling balls encasing flowers and even particle emitters!

• ACHIEVEMENTS to bag including ‘Millionaire’, ‘Elite Bowler’ and ‘Local Champ'

• SAVE GAMES across devices with Cloud Save – climb up the leagues on multiple devices and never lose your progress.

Strike Master Bowling gives you it all, in one handy 3D game, and best of all it's free with no need to spend endless money to get anywhere.

descriptionHTML:
The best game for girls this summer now with new super cool activities: boat party, ice slush and dolphin rescue!

Join the Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun club and play the best summer holiday games for kids and toddlers! Spend your summer at the beach near the ocean with Sweet Baby Girl and her friends in a paradise seaside resort. From animal care and ocean clean up to delicious snacks and beauty makeover, these girls have many plans for summer. Have fun exploring 12 amazing activities and play the games that you love!

Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun 2 games for girls:
· Girls always take their pet pony on holidays! Take care of this cute little horse: clean up the mess, dirt and spider webs in the stable, shower the pony and make a beautiful hairstyle!
· Oh no! Little dolphin is in danger, help him! Rescue the pink dolphin from trash in the ocean, wash it with a sponge and make this precious ocean animal happy again!
· Refresh with the best frozen fruit ice slush! Slice, chop and blend fresh fruits with ice, fill the glass with this frozen rainbow color drink and taste it with your summer friends!
· Sweet Baby Girl and friends are planning a boat party but the ship is a mess! Clean up, wash, scrub, polish and makeover the boat, paint it pink and gold, and get ready for the best boat party before the sun goes down!
· Makeover time! Start in the Shopping Center, mix and match different clothes and colors, and design the perfect boat party outfit!
· Visit Hair Salon for a new hairstyle! Wash, dry, comb, cut and curl hair to make the most beautiful haircuts and hairstyles. Dye hair in bright summer colors and decorate with the most fashionable holiday accessories!
· It’s a really hot day in the summer resort. Make the most delicious chocolate, vanilla and strawberry frozen ice cream for the girls!
· Now the girls are looking for a fancy manicure, learn how to do one! Clean up, cut, and shape the nails, paint them pink and decorate with cute pictures, flowers and stripes!
· Sweet Baby Girl and friends are hungry, time to make the most popular holiday snacks - hot dogs! Grill sausages and heat up hot dog buns, add vegetables and sauces, and serve hot dogs to your little clients!
· Decorate the fancy villa where the girls will be staying this summer and plan a chill area with chairs and sun umbrella!
· More summer fun inside: collect summer postcards and watch summer videos for kids!
· Collect coins and use the to unlock new dress up and decoration items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

descriptionHTML:
【Game Introduction】:

An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)

Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.

【Features】:

-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.

-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.

-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.

-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.

Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/
Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
recentChanges: The bugs on account connecting and switching are fixed.
summary: The Sole SQUARE ENIX Official Licensed "Final Fantasy" Action Game
title: Final Fantasy Awakening: SE Licensed

descriptionHTML:
Come and play the most exciting Coach bus driving game where your bus driving skills will be put to test! Complete challenging missions, pick and drop passengers and upgrade your bus for better driving.
Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 gives you a realistic bus driving experience in big open world city!

Play the latest coach bus driving simulator game - Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018.
Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 is an exciting, action packed bus driving simulator game.

Detailed coach buses, realistic interiors and a beautiful open world city environment will make you feel like you are driving a real bus! Get behind the wheel of the Coach bus and drive around the big open world city to complete all the routes!

Each level of Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 is more challenging and more exciting than the previous one! Your passengers are waiting for you!
Drive carefully to the pick up spot, open the bus doors, let the passengers board the bus and then drop them to their destination. Drive carefully because every time you crash into traffic your bus will get damaged and the passengers will scream! Make sure you drop your passengers before your bus is completely broken and damaged!

Change the camera view as per your comfort to the sturdy exterior or the realistic plush interiors.
Play the career mode of this truck simulator, make money and purchase new buses and upgrades for your Coach bus.

FEATURES - Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018
- Real life traffic
- Beautiful city environment
- Challenging missions
- Different grand Coach buses to drive
- Realistic Coach bus physics
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic Coach bus interiors
- Realistic game sound effects
- Easy steering wheel, buttons and tilting controls
- Fresh attractive music

Explore the beautiful city in your Coach bus and become the king of the road!
Get Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 now!
summary: Drive a big Coach Bus to pick and Drop passengers
title: Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018

comments: I don't see what everyone's problem is. The controls work fine and its what you would expect from digital controls. And to the guy Creative Muvo, you must not have grown up in the 90s cuz hello!!!! Nintendo games BARELY EVER IF AT ALL had save options. You die, you start over again, thus is 90s video games. Mellenials and their complaints. Christ help us.....

THIS APP IS A SCAM! It will allow you to play a couple games and then it will immediately prompt you to download an updated version which has ads every other time you touch the screen. You cannot back out of this updater alert to continue playing the free emulated games. IT IS A SCAM!!

This is awesome!! Great games to play again and again!! Ignore the picky haters.. There is nothing wrong with the controls or the games. People just like to whine about every little thing.. Free games?, can't complain :)

The controls are not the best. The d-pad is so huge that when pressing right you can't see a lot of what's going on. Also, there is a noticeable lag between when you press the button on screen and when the character performs the expected action. The first problem can be solved one of two ways. Either put the video on the top half of the screen and the controls under it, or use a Bluetooth controller. The lag issue is just due to poor resource utilization and can probably be improved in future builds.
Love these old classic games and you can ignore the haters, you don't need to save game levels I like it when it restarts that's the way it was when I was a kid love this app THANK YOU app creators
Love this app. Nostalgia at it's best. Thank you so much for this. Took some time to get used to the controls but got it down and now I can't put it down... ü§ô

Test out their new vehicles and catch crooks with the Net Shooter!BE A CREATIVE LEGO¬Æ CITY HERO!LEGO¬Æ City is a creative mission-based game for brave 6-8-year-old everyday heroes. Build cool vehicles to put out fires, construct buildings, save minifigures in distress at sea, chase crooks across the City, explore the mysteries of the jungle or the dangerous volcanic excavation site!DEVELOP SKILLS THROUGH PLAYYoung LEGO City heroes can experiment with the basics of physics and practice their fine motor skills while dodging obstacles, reaching goals, and saving the day in a thrilling race against the clock!FEATURES ‚Ä¢ BUILD ICONIC VEHICLES: Players can build their own versions of LEGO City vehicles including fire trucks, police cars, construction vehicles, helicopters, coastguard boats, jungle ATVs, and many more.‚Ä¢ BUILD A WHOLE CITY: Watch the City grow with every completed heroic mission.‚Ä¢ ENGAGING ENVIRONMENTS: Every area in LEGO City needs a hero: The city centre, the jungle, the volcano, even the sky and the sea! ‚Ä¢ RACE AGAINST TIME: A real hero can keep cool under pressure ‚Äì each mission must be completed before the clock runs out!‚Ä¢ ENDLESS BUILDING COMBINATIONS: Combine vehicle parts to create your own super-vehicles!‚Ä¢ AGE-APPROPRIATE: Intuitive navigation and lots of LEGO City humour!‚Ä¢ SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children‚Äôs creative play.WHY PLAY WITH LEGO CITY?Nothing beats real-life heroes! LEGO City honours the creative problem-solvers who see opportunities in life when others see obstacles, who dare break things down to rebuild them into something even better, who can keep their cool in the face of danger, and who take the time to eat a hot dog and drink hot chocolate once in a while, too. Because that‚Äôs when all the best ideas happen!For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
