comments: I freaking love this game but I do recommend more energy or at least less time to wait for energy. Please and thank you :)  P.S. We need more diamonds some how like. Maybe you should let us watch ads for 2-5 diamond's each ad. Or do a daily login type thing. I know you guys wont but I've been playing this game a ton and for a long time. i restart everything because when you guys make new stories it makes me want to use diamonds but I don't have anymore. I restarted the game like over 10 times honestly. Thanks for a great game though.

I never thought I would find a game like this that would work so well and play so easily! The only things I would change would be adding videos to gain more gems, or getting 2 gems after each chapter. Maybe even some extra gems after finishing a story? Getting gems on previously finished stories as well. I would also add the option to replay a chapter from the menu, not only after playing the chapter. Other than that, THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!

I really do love the stories this game offers. I just wish the key and diamond system was better. I feel like I've purposely passed up some great stories just to play through them quickly so I could get back to the current story I'm really hooked on. Not to mention I've put money into the game as well. But being on a budget, I'm limited with what I can do. Sadly I think that is what will eventually make me stop playing such a great game. It's just too expensive in the end.

I love this app! I just wish you could collect more than 2 keys at a time. Sometimes the chapters feel short and to only be able to accumulate 2 keys feels like its not enough. 3 to 5 would be way better! Its already a bummer to not have enough diamonds to unlock cool stuff. (unless you want to pay more.. Not everyone has money to spend on phone app games)

I actually really like this game. It's fun, it's time killing, all that good stuff. But the diamonds are what really kill it.  You get one free diamond at the end of every chapter, which would be nice if it didn't cost 25+ diamonds to make a choice. So to get all the options required to have a truly full game play experiance you must buy the diamonds, which also wouldn't be a problem if they didn't cost so much. (For 5 dollars you get 60 diamonds which is ruffly 2 choices and really they should be lasting longer then that.) There isn't even the option to watch an add for more diamonds. Buying them is the only choice if you want to have those certain experiances. I understand that the company has to make money, I really do, but charging out the ass for something is not the way to do it. In short, I would love this game if it didn't cost an arm and a leg to play.

The gameplay is great but nearly all of the important choices cost. I am not opposed to paying to play a great game but the cost of this one is too high. Every chapter of every story has at least one important choice that will cost. The price for the choice is too high and there is no way to obtain free currency for the game. In order to shape a story the way you want to you have to spend a rediculous amount of real money to obtain game currency. A method of obtaining free currency and cheaper costs for choices needs to be implemented
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we‚Äôve created our best work to date. We hope you‚Äôll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team

Pixelberry Studios
201 SAN ANTONIO CIR 205

comments: This game is amazing, it really helps with stress, anxiety and just any and all negative emotions. With its calm, relaxing music and adorible graphics, this well thought out game is the perfect way to releave stress. I really recommend downloading this game, trust me, you'll love it!!!üòÅ

Very relaxing. I fell asleep playing this game. Though it's a bit addictive, so I don't like playing during the day. Another problem is that saving and loading the game between devices from the cloud are a bit confusing. There is no explanation and I haven't gotten it to work.

PLEASE DON'T IGNORE...I need help, there appears to be a glitched achievement and it's driving me insane. I wish not to be intrusive  about it but my Ocd's  preventing me from continuing on thinking I will not be getting the other achievements. It's the Disiplined V, which is the 4000 for the virtues, I unlocked the virtue but not the achievement . I even reset my oasis twice and nothing

Honestly I am quite disgusted at how many 1 star ratings there are. I agree it's boring, HOWEVER, only in some cases. I don't play for fun like I guess what most of the 1 star ratings are for. Its not meant to be played for fun but meant to try to calm down or relieve stress for anyone playing it. If you're playing for the sake of fun then yes it will be boring. DO NOT download this game if you are seeking something to entertain you. It is boring for me when I play like that. However if you play to try to find a way to calm yourself down, say you need something to distract you, it will really work. The game really works for me when I am in a mental breakdown or feeling extremely suicidal. Playing My Oasis in those state of minds has helped me to calm down instead of acting on suicidal thoughts. This game has also helped my older brother when he has a breakdowns as well because of his depression. This game IS a tap game but it is not pointless if you play the game for the reason you're supposed to play it for, which is to relax/calm down.

So, I really enjoyed oasis for a while, at least until they rolled out this new update. One of ly favorite things was unlocking the animals and I had three. The movement was nice.   Now, with the update, you can only have one and choose to upgrade the amount you can have with diamonds. Do you know how irritating it is to have something suddenly locked that you already had unlocked through previous game play? Very.   I don't suspect I'll keep in installed much longer.

I really like this game, but I'm giving it one star until they fix it. I have the auto cumulation for all the traits, but it's about a 30% chance it works. If I don't go in within the 24 hour mark (or I upgrade anything a good amount), it cuts my gains and makes it like I earned nothing. So, love this game, but until the bug is fixed, it's getting 1 star. It's really irritating I need to go through this after also sending them an email on what's going on.
description: Taking a break can be difficult when there are so many things to do, and you have so little time to spend for yourself. My Oasis is a game app created for people who need a break from life.My Oasis does not focus solely on the gameplay and it contains no content that can stress you out. Let your Oasis gradually expand while you interact with the surrounding life in a relaxing atmosphere. It will calm your mind before you know it.* Deleting this app will also delete its data. Make sure to save your data on the cloud server before deleting the app.* Please write a review. We will read every comment and try to make the app better!
descriptionHTML:
Taking a break can be difficult when there are so many things to do, and you have so little time to spend for yourself. My Oasis is a game app created for people who need a break from life.

My Oasis does not focus solely on the gameplay and it contains no content that can stress you out. Let your Oasis gradually expand while you interact with the surrounding life in a relaxing atmosphere. It will calm your mind before you know it.

* Deleting this app will also delete its data. Make sure to save your data on the cloud server before deleting the app.

* Please write a review. We will read every comment and try to make the app better!

summary: This is a god send if you get anxious about everything like me you need this.
title: My Oasis - Relaxing Sanctuary

description: Try to picture how it would be to have an important moment in your life that is illustrated in an event you have to attend, then increase the necessity of a unique look you might need for that kind of event. That is the moment when you know you want to appear in a perfect shape with everything dolled up on up. But as a woman is hard to maintain that balance and even if you do not have any event you will want from time to time a moment where you will give yourself a break to relax and enjoy a refreshing spa treatment for legs. This is exactly what this girl is going to get and you will learn how to do it and eventually try to do that for yourself as well. So, as the legs are in a bad shape and have some unwanted hair on, you will be getting a hair removal as is done in a pro spa salon. The beautician though still need to prepare the area before the process could begin. Take her into the bath and apply some tonic to wash the inferior members. The foot then is going to be ready for the wax. Prepare the wax, heat the asked ingredients and put it on the area that needs epilation. Wait for it to get cold and then take it off. Right after you will add a cream that will calm down the irritated skin so the legs will be ready for the next phase. Now you will be doing the fashion designer job where you have to create a stunning outfit to outstand those gorgeous legs you have just spoiled. Choose a nice dress, add a cute detail like a jewelry, maybe even a pair of glasses. Do not forget the shoes because they might complete your fabulous look.This game offers more than you would expect, check out some of the great features it presents:- The possibility to design more outfits for a beautiful girl- Spa treatments for legs to execute- Learn the art of taking care of your own body- Free and cool to play- Easy control of the game- Participate in a major transformation - Entertaining background sounds and nice graphics- Play with textures and merge it with the theme- Opportunity to make a leg makeover- Add a new skill to your list- Be a beautician and a fashion designer too

descriptionHTML:

This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/

descriptionHTML:
Cat Simulator is an arcade game, where you play as a katze kitty. You can pick from several different breed of kittens. There are 7 diffent houses with gardens to play and explore. You have 6 different quests that you need to pass to complete the level. There are quests such as
- caught swift stray mice ( mouse )
- scratch ginger carpets
- scratch armchairs
- mess real food
- destroy vases, that are destructible ( you can smash and crash all of them )

You can also bully people in house such as Tom Kätzchen. If you interact with them they will say something. People in house are doing a lot of things, talking, eating, sleeping. You gain coins by moving or jumping on objects. Coins unlock other cats

- stunning, real, beautiful HD 3D graphics
- easy controls

UPDATE 1.013

- MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT
From now, you can compete with your friends in multiplayer. You can choose from 8 different levels.

- NEW LEVEL
We added new garden level, with different quests. You can ride on a carrossel, jump on trampoline, push balls from slides, push balls to pool, ride on skateboard, destroy gnome statues, pop balloons.

- HATS!
You can buy many different hats to your kitty.

- CAT'S HOUSES
You can also buy new cat house and make life of your cat more pleasant.

- LANGUAGE SUPPORT
You can choose between English, Russian, Spanish and Portuguese

- Christmas Special

By installing this app you agree to the following privacy policy:
http://www.oneaudience.com/privacy/?package_name=com.hgamesart.catsimulator
summary: Cat Simulator is an arcade game, where you play as a katze kitty MULTIPLAYER.
title: Cat Simulator : Kitty Craft

descriptionHTML:
Sweet Baby Girl Katie was brushing teeth and lost her first baby tooth! Tooth Fairy Mrs. Twinkle saw everything in her magic mirror and now is going to visit sweet little Katie. Help the Tooth Fairy get ready!

Give a facial spa and do makeup for Tooth Fairy Mrs. Twinkle before she leaves her fairyland. Make toothpaste in the Toothpaste Factory and grow a magical fantasy tree that gives shiny coins. Play with Katie in her house: brush teeth and dress up with the cutest pajama before sleep. When sweet little Katie falls asleep, help Tooth Fairy Mrs. Twinkle put her gifts under Katie’s pillow. Don’t wake her up!

Sweet Baby Girl Tooth Fairy games for kids and toddlers:
· Learn how to brush and take care of your teeth with little Katie!
· Play PJ dress up and design the most beautiful pajama for Katie!
· Work at the super fun Toothpaste Factory and learn how to make toothpaste!
· Plant an enchanted seed and grow a fantasy tree that gives Tooth Fairy coins!
· When the fairy gifts are ready, play Tooth Fairy makeover in the Beauty Salon!
· Facial spa and makeup time! Help Mrs. Twinkle look really magical when she visits Katie.
· Pack the gifts and fly with Tooth Fairy Mrs. Twinkle to Katie’s house!
· Replace the baby tooth under Katie’s pillow with Mrs. Twinkle’s gifts for her daily teeth cleaning!
· More fun inside! Watch videos for kids and get more Tooth Fairy coins!
· Collect all Tooth Fairy fashion clothes and accessories, and dress her up!

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

description: Hippo presents a new game from the series of games for girls, the game Hippo's Nail Salon. Would you like to try yourself as a professional stylist and get to know how to paint nails correctly, to make a stylish manicure and maybe you would like to know what is it a unique art design of nails? Then try to play the game Hippo's Nail Salon and create an art design of nails, which any princess would like!Stylish nails and a beautiful make up are important for girls. But if you make a stylish fragrant make up and a beautiful manicure, any photo or just an ordinary selfie will be unbelievably astonishing. But the real beauty of the manicure is not just a bright nail polish and all possible images on nails. An astonishing manicure is worth doing because of its uniqueness, the taste for art and original art of the nail master. To make a beautiful manicure, master should practice a lot and have a lot of manicure tools, a wide variety of nail polishes, stickers, sparkles and so on. Real beauty is a result of a hard work. And if you have everything to make stylish nails, where could you get a wide variety of manicure tools, nail polishes, stickers, sparkles and so on? All that you could find in the game Hippo's Manicure Salon! This game has everything to use your imagination in a full swing. There aren't any limits for your art! You could combine ready-made and create new astonishing images and patterns on the nails of clients. Use your imagination, and any princess will send selfies with your manicure to all her friends. And don't forget to take photo of your best work!And let's start! Nail salon is waiting for its new master! You are the super professional stylist, and you know for sure, how to polish nails correctly, make a fashion manicure and a unique art design of nails! To play the game Hippo's Nail Salon is a dream of any princess! Our educational games for girls will make you happy!

comments: They made me misspell Rabbids, including "games" like Sword Art Online and Attack on Titan, and had obscure art that gave really bad visualization of very simple things. Overall super fun game and I'm really enjoying it, however some of these levels are really easy, and then there are others that are super challenging and nearly impossible to find out. comments: I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

Should make the money in higher value as it is very hard to accumulate.  Poor marks because it takes so much of your hard earned levels and drops you down the ranks if you don't solve immediately.  I was at ruby level and have so many points taken away now I am back to silver....uninstalling thanks for nothing.

I really enjoy this game, its quite addictive but i find it very satisfying. The only problem with it is that once you get into higher levels (i'm at 300) you start needing tons of stars for small things and for instance to get rid of one stump takes like 8 stars. Anyway I like the game and am going to keep playing it.

I use the love this game and have played it for months, but the lasted update ruined it for me. Every time you don't finish a level it asked you a second time if your sure to want to lose this or  that. I don't apreciate the guilt trip to try and get money out of me. It's dispicable and unethical!

If I could give it 0 stars I would. There is no way to contact support and you can't restart the game. I got a bad download and now I'm stuck with it. My personal information should not be part of playing a match 3 game anyhow. Game crashes at least once a day and my controls only work about 60% of the time. Horrible experience! Playrix should be ashamed of their programming here.

The game is awfully hard for what is essentially a match 3 game. For a game that is supposed to be as much about the storyline as it is about the matching, it sure doesn't want you to advance that storyline. It's more about the very obvious money grab than it is about game play. Do yourself a favor and don't waste the space downloading this game. There are much more enjoyable match 3 games on Play. There's a reason it's the #3 grossing game on Google play. It's all about how much you are willing to spend, not about the actual play.

Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory.

Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free!

The game features:
● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!

it's a very addicting game that I would recommend to my kids.  Cause it shows them the ethics of real life.  And honestly who doesn't give weed to babies these days...?

Fun game. Kinda far fetched and cheesy but I'm addicted lol

comments: I can't get past some of the levels with 3 stars no matter what I do.... Also stuck on level 2-10. I can't find any tutorials on YouTube for this game. Sigh.... Also I do not like that u have to blow up your lemmings once it has the stop job. I should be able to give it a new job..... Can anyone message me about how to beat level 2-10? I can't figure it out for the life of me

Grew up playing lemmings.  This one is challenging, but simple.    Dislikes: once you give a lemming a chute, but change their"job" the chute goes away.  If I remember correctly, that wasn't the case in the original. Also, wish you could speed up time like you could before after you know that your solution works. And lastly, I'm connected to Google play and have cleared first three boards, but achievement are not recorded/recognized in game.  Likes: the three star system.  Challenges me to think a bit more. Wish though it would also include a bonus star for saving more than required. The creativity of the boards... Inversion was quite challenging to get the lemmings to cooperate.

Great port of a classic. Takes me back to being a kid. Gem system is slightly annoying to unlock later level,  would rather just pay than sit through 15 adverts for rubbish slot machine games. Otherwise great

This game is a remake of classic, is really fun, and really cute! It's addicting - I'd recommend trying it to anyone.  Unlocking the final episode does require watching 15 adds, which is fine, but it can be an adventure, as some take forever or never load at all, and you can only try to watch one every 2.5 minutes. I'd recommend watching extra adds and getting 16 diamonds as you play the first 3 episodes, so you're ready to unlock it when you have enough stars!  Graphics are simple too, but its just.plain fun!
In between boards you will see advertisements.  Okay the game contains adds.  But you can't unlock the last set of boards unless you watch extra adds!  I have uninstalled it.
Great little game but the ads are very annoying. I would rather pay for the ap and not have the ads.

IT DOENS'T WORK ANYMORE!! It worked perfectly fine before the latest update. Now every time I open the app i doesn't load at all and after that it quits the game completely. Please try to fix this problem.

Just turn off the stupid skip level pop up. It's extremely annoying. Or add a setting that doesn't make it pop up. Or just don't have it pop up every two tries. It's very annoying. Other than that 5 stars üòÇ

The levels need more diversity. After a while it just the same level just faster or slower spinning. Maybe add challenges or spinning platforms. Also if you could pick a color then choose  knife that would be awesome.

This game is wonderful! It is pretty much time consuming! It often passes my time when I'm damn bored. Only one thing is not there, once you complete a level, you can't play that level again. It's a humble request to the developers that there should be a feature of playing previously played levels.
I wonder is there a way to go back and replay levels? Im stuck on 1 and I notice I get coins even during fails, just a question,

comments: Uninstalling!!! Took less than 24 hrs to take 300 million i won away. Payed off great for the first 20 levels. I was thinking "finally a slot that pays!" Sat and played it for hours straight to try and build up the bank. Made it to level 23 and the game just stopped paying. I know you want us to make purchases but how is anyone going to want to purchase if it just depletes your winnings that fast. I'm done!!

Beautiful graphics,  smooth layout and really tough to move on to next challenges. Game doesn't payout as huge as it seems.  Overall fun to play and challenging for a slot game. Want a game to kill time, literally,  this it. Enjoy and good luck! Update..OK so I spent 5 diamonds to try and get extra spins which I did and won 30 free spins, I was betting 250k and won a whopping 1.5 mill out of 30 spins. Really? Come on! I understand greed but 30 spins and won what was equivalent to 7 free spins. Sheesh this is suppose to be fun right? Played the latest table for almost an hour on all bets and NOT 1 bonus game. GL all you will need it. Make sure bring your lucky rabbits foot.
This game gives a new perspective to "slots".  Im still not 100% sure if i like it or not; although, the "token" start AND  payouts are rather good. Its a worthy opponent to regular slot games!

I was really digging this game, until... It would appear that once you win a specified amount on free spins you can no longer win. I had 50 free spins won 4mill in the first 10 then won nothing on the  next 40 spins.

Worst slot game I've ever played, went instantly to the delete pile. Wouldn't play this game ever again if you paid me too. Anyone who gave this app a positive rating was probably a relative or paid to do so.
I've had this game for about two months and I've played it every day, that is until my phone broke, went crazy not be able to play it. best slot game I've ever played.

description: Join the shopping craze with 6 beautiful girls of different races! This dress-up app offers about 200 virtual apparel items, hairstyles and accessories to try out. Put together new looks for the dolls: glam, trendy, classy, traditional, fancy, casual or other. These gorgeous women are fabulously rich and don't have to worry about maxing out their credit cards! With their great sense of fashion and style, these fashionistas pick the best places to shop and the most expensive beauty salon to do their hairstyle at.Unlike most other fashionista games out there, there are no in-app purchases, and you can't spend any real money here. It's a truly free dressup game. That's also true for all our other makeover / cosplay apps. Just follow the "More by Games For Girls" link to our new styling games. Train your skills and tastes as an outfit designer. Learn to express yourself and show other people your inner personality and uniqueness with the way you look. If you're more into youth's urban clothing, be sure to check "College Student", "High School". For more glamor stuff, models and celebrities, download "Beauty Queen", "Prom Night" and "Model Wedding".Unleash your inner shopaholic and imagine you are a top super model or a celebrity (famous actress, movie superstar, pop icon, or a reality show star)! Try various outfits and makeovers with each glamour doll.

descriptionHTML:
Puppies need your child's help to save their friends!
This game is made especially for children who like to play in Paw Puppy Patrol. It will bring a lot of fun thanks to the familiar characters. Your baby will like running around with the puppies, and you will have free time.

Let the kid feel like a real rescuer along with a patrol from his beloved cartoon.
Levels in the game The names for patrol puppies are created specifically for children's games, the interface is intuitive, as in any game for kids.

• Simple and intuitive game interface The name, designed specifically for children's games
• Intuitively understood levels for comfortable patrol management of puppies
• Ability to feel like a rescuer of one of your favorite characters cartoon about the dog patrol puppies
• Beautiful colorful graphics will pleasantly surprise your baby
• Pleasant background music written for children's games

Your child will be able to:
• Running and jumping with puppies
• Collect bones for puppies

The name - will allow your kid to run the Chase and advance through the levels of the game, achieving the best result. This simple game will capture your child from the first minute of the game!

In the future, other characters of the puppy patrol will be added: Marshall, Skye, Rocky and many others.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of being single this valentines?? Is there someone you love or someone who is on your
mind all day?? Is there possibly no way of approaching her to say your heart in a proposal?? Well, time
to let your loneliness away, if you are already single in real life, play this game and you won’t be single
anymore but only in a virtual reality…
This dramatic romance game is just right for everyone honestly, for valentines as the game protagonist
struggles his ways through to get a girlfriend!! Witness this virtual struggle yourself (not in real life so
don’t worry) by downloading the game and playing it to your hearts content!!!
The game has many options and choices for you to go through to get to the girlfriend and get through
the game!!! It has proposal setting, it has a fight to protect the girlfriend setting, it has an approaching
setting, it has a date setting as well as a romance setting!!!
The dramatic game unfolds into a dream which comes true as the blossoming love story of the boyfriend
and girlfriend!! There’s nothing more innocent then the blooming love story of a teenager couple
struggling romance!! The girlfriend with the boyfriend and the boyfriend with the girlfriend!!
The issues which seem so heavy in a love story then become something to laugh at in the future as a
couple!! This girlfriend simulator is just like that!! You make your struggles to propose to your aspiring
girlfriend, circumstances become grim and you try to protect her because of which she starts to respect
you which results in her to choose romance over arrogance which is the start of a new love story and a
loving couple!!!
STORY:
This game follows the following chronological pattern; the boy and the girl have a little chat in their
university where the boy makes the proposal to her to become his girlfriend. Unfortunately, she rejects.
He then decides to prove his love to her! He helps her inside the university café but shyly she goes
away…
It’s not until the girl is surrounded by a bunch of teenager gangster boys who start to tease her then the
boy comes to rescue her and protect her!! He succeeds in running them away and so saves the girl!!! He
then makes a proposal to her again by presenting her flowers. Overwhelmed, she accepts and becomes
his girlfriend.
Then the two go on a dinner date as a couple and finally he takes her on a romantic long drive. They
lived happily, forever as girlfriend and boyfriend!!!

~~~ HOW TO PLAY ~~~
 Download the game and begin as instructed
 Select all the options that you want which appear on screen
 Play the game
 Use joystick on screen to move about
 Perform tasks in the provided time
 Navigation provided on screen to locate mission
 Use onscreen icons to perform different action
 Continue to proceeding levels
summary: Earn your girlfriend and her love this valentines in this virtual love story!!
title: My girlfriend Virtual High School Simulator

descriptionHTML:
Join us on an adventurous bubble quest!

Shoot and burst all the bubbles and solve all the riddles! Play Bubble Quest for free and enjoy the classic gameplay, hundreds of ancient levels and challenging puzzles.
This is an addictive game featuring some cool power-ups, colored bubbles and amazing settings and designs.

This cool bubble shooter game is the best game to play when you have some free time, or when you’re looking for a fun activity to share with friends and family. Are you ready to start the thrilling adventure?

How to Play
* Tap on the screen and drag your finger to move the laser sight.
* Lift your finger to smash bubbles.
* Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the combination and win points.
* Clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up.
* Pop all the bubbles and solve the puzzles to win levels.
* Reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on every level.
* Swap bubbles without limit and plan your shots.

Explore the challenging quest map and use some cool and amazing boosts that will help you clear the board from all the colored bubbles. Join us along for the adventure, and solve incredible and interesting levels full of awesome elements!
One thing you’ll love about the game is that you can start any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited!

Solve all the action-packed puzzles and crush the bubbles to win!

descriptionHTML:
Train driving simulators have never been this amazing until now! Enjoy real Euro train driving as you drive train across european countries to new and exciting locations in this realistic train simulator game. Be amazed at beautiful HD environments and realistic train driving physics!

Euro Train Simulator 2018 is one of the best train driving games for Android!

Get to the train station on time to pick up busy train passengers and drop them off at their destination on time. This simulation gives you the opportunity to become a professional driver and transport passengers and tourists all around the world.

Featuring an easy to use gameplay interface, play each euro train driving level and unlock new cooler, faster trains and driving routes. Watch as passengers, from all walks of life, waiting at the train station. Featuring dynamic camera angles to see the non-stop train driving action, spin the camera around to see the train from all angles when on the daily commute.

Want to have some competition? Race against other profession train drivers in multiplayer mode and drive your train to reach the finishing line safely and quickly to see who can get passengers to their destination on time.

Detailed environments of the outdoor countrysides, busy city centers, huge train stations, and a whole load more to marvel at when driving your fast train. Unlock and drive bigger, faster, amazing trains, wonderful features that will make the driving a real experience! Drive and control your very own Euro train perfectly with modern and new graphics.

Complete all the routes on time by driving freight trains and passenger trains to the destination within the time limit! Slow the rail speed when you’re coming up to the station platform. Wait for all the passenger to board the train and then complete the voyage to the next important destination. Enjoy your train ride around the vast European cities with realistic rail physics in one of the best train driving simulators!

Euro Train Simulator 2018 Game Features:

Explore 30 Train driving levels.
Compete against other train drivers in multiplayer action
Realistic train driving simulation
Easy to drive train controls
Tracks changing and fully functional signalling system.
Multiple weather and exclusive night mode.
Dynamic HD camera angles

Play Euro Train Simulator 2018 for free and enjoy the drive of a lifetime!

description: Six! is the latest game from Gram Games, makers of global smash hits 1010! and Merged!. This game is challenging, exciting and infuriating at times. As with all great puzzlers, Six! is great in one minute bursts or hours of emotive fun.In the game you are challenged to interact with a tower block of varying shaped bricks upon which rests a hexagonal block. The aim is to get the hexagon down the tower block to earn points.  You do this by tapping the bricks to make them disappear bringing the hexagon down into the space cleared underneath.It sounds easy, but when the hexagon starts to roll or the tower tilts, and with pressure of high scores you‚Äôll find it‚Äôs not as easy as you originally thought. If the removal of the blocks topples the tower  or the hexagon gains momentum and rolls off the screen, then it‚Äôs game over and you have to start all over again.  Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play. Six! will have you hooked on getting as far down the tower as possible. In keeping with Gram Games‚Äô hits, playing this game is simple and fun, but claiming a spot on the leaderboard and bettering your friends is challenging and rewarding.Key Features‚óè    Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay‚óè    Challenge your friend‚Äôs high scores, challenge the world.‚óè    Fun and engaging graphics.‚óè    Engaging and addictive.‚óè    Play for a few minutes or hours at a time.
descriptionHTML:
Six! is the latest game from Gram Games, makers of global smash hits 1010! and Merged!. This game is challenging, exciting and infuriating at times. As with all great puzzlers, Six! is great in one minute bursts or hours of emotive fun.

In the game you are challenged to interact with a tower block of varying shaped bricks upon which rests a hexagonal block. The aim is to get the hexagon down the tower block to earn points. You do this by tapping the bricks to make them disappear bringing the hexagon down into the space cleared underneath.

It sounds easy, but when the hexagon starts to roll or the tower tilts, and with pressure of high scores you’ll find it’s not as easy as you originally thought. If the removal of the blocks topples the tower or the hexagon gains momentum and rolls off the screen, then it’s game over and you have to start all over again.

Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play. Six! will have you hooked on getting as far down the tower as possible. In keeping with Gram Games’ hits, playing this game is simple and fun, but claiming a spot on the leaderboard and bettering your friends is challenging and rewarding.

Key Features
● Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay
● Challenge your friend’s high scores, challenge the world.
● Fun and engaging graphics.
● Engaging and addictive.
● Play for a few minutes or hours at a time.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
summary: Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play
title: Six!

comments: Simple game that had the potential to be fun but the fact that you can't dodge the spears is stupid takes a lot of the fun out of the game.  Bug: Any score above 19 doesn't get registered for some reason. I got a highscore of 19 and after that even if I get 22-25 kills, the new highscore is never saved. I think the app is not counting the added points for headshots.

Great game, but what's next? Have the Spear of Infinity (cool) and have reached 420 kills. What about an exploding spear (BOOOM) that clears the entire field. Especially those fireball buggers. More aggressive opponents too would be nice :-)  Thanks for a fun game to pass the time with. Cheers!

I really do enjoy this game. but it had suggested I download another of one your games called "vikings" in exchange for 900coins. afterwards there were none awarded or no indication of how I would recieve them. I hate stupid ploys like this or even miss direction whatever it may have been. I'm actually considering deleting the app because of it.

Kinda fun but not really sure it's worth it. You really have to grind to get any items, and then when you do get a helmet... Well ultimately it's pointless, as getting hit in the body is far more common and it only takes two to die. Maybe add body armour, and slightly reduce the cost of items

Absolutely love it, two suggestions though to perfect it. A sensitivity adjuster for finer aiming would be cool, but most importantly, could we please have an option to select a single background colour. It's jarring having the background changing all the time. Great work though!

I unlocked one of the special abilities and it is hard to use in gameplay.  I would be in a game and as an enemy shot an arrow at me I tried to click the small button on the bottom right corner but I wasn't able to because it was too small.  I would suggest that you make the button bigger for convenients. Thank you.
description: The spear is a throwing, piercing or piercing-chopping polearm weapon.With the help of a spear, a warrior will be able to effectively counter a lot of enemies.Control the Stickman to throw spears at other stickmans. You will be confronted by many enemies: archers, javelin throwers, armored swordsmen and even magicians.Simply drag and drop your finger for targeting and throwing.The power of throwing a spear is always the same, so you only need to aim and specify the direction of the throw.Enemies die from one hit of a spear in the head and body or from two hits of the spear in the legs.In the game there is a store with helmets, several defensive skills and an apple for healing.Write in the comments of your impressions of the Spearman game.Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
The spear is a throwing, piercing or piercing-chopping polearm weapon.
With the help of a spear, a warrior will be able to effectively counter a lot of enemies.
Control the Stickman to throw spears at other stickmans. You will be confronted by many enemies: archers, javelin throwers, armored swordsmen and even magicians.

Simply drag and drop your finger for targeting and throwing.
The power of throwing a spear is always the same, so you only need to aim and specify the direction of the throw.
Enemies die from one hit of a spear in the head and body or from two hits of the spear in the legs.

In the game there is a store with helmets, several defensive skills and an apple for healing.

Write in the comments of your impressions of the Spearman game.
Have a good game!
summary: "The Spearman" is a new timekiller based on ragdoll physics.
title: The Spearman

description: Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARSWe have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTSYou will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.REALISTIC TRAFFICStaying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!FREE TO PLAYThe Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.GAME FEATURES‚ñ∂ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles‚ñ∂ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!‚ñ∂ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.‚ñ∂ 100% Free-2-Play Missions‚ñ∂ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls‚ñ∂ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.

A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARS

We have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!

BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTS

You will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC

Staying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!

FREE TO PLAY

The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.

GAME FEATURES

▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles
▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!
▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view

description: Apple Appstore BEST of 2012 (PAID/GROSSING) Flick your finger and make a homerun. You can experience a real baseball batting through the physical pendulum. This is a game in which you can experience various throws based on the pendulum. The ball will fly further if you can hit the ball directly with the quick flick. Experience a ‚Äúreal-life like‚Äù batting simulation. # Easy Control--------------------------- You only use flick to control the batting for this game. The more accurate you flick your finger to hit the ball; it is more likely that you will be a home-run hitter. The rule is simple. Flick your finger with the same feeling in which you would swing a bat in real life. Think of your finger as a bat, and flick it with speed and accuracy. That‚Äôs all. # Movement of the ball------------------ Various kinds of throws are materialized into ‚Äúreal-life like‚Äù feelings. Different pitches pull out different various kinds of movements. Thus, the batter may miss the timing and would be hard to hit. # 10 GAME mode------------------------ You can enjoy this game through 5 kinds of mode. Minor & Major Mode- Hit as many home-runs as you can; as far as you can. Multiplayer Mode- You can compete with other players via Game Center. Moon-Star Mode- Try for a record with the given 9 balls. Training Mode- You can practice with different kinds of pitches. *Bunt mode ( need minor 15step): Drop the ball on the target of the floor correctly. *Total mode ( need bunt 10000 point ) : You‚Äôll meet many different types of the balls from the beginning of the game. *Faster & faster ( need total 25000 point ) : Head-to-head with only fastballs. *Jiant mode ( need F&F 10000 point ) : Match with a Giant pitcher *Cutter mode ( need Jiant 12000 point ) : Match with cutterballs which can cut the baseball bat. # add 28 Achievement Bonus-------------- 1 Achievement = 1 level up bonus!!! # Level Up System----------------------- You can choose and upgrade 1 of 3 skills every time the exp becomes full.- Power: You can increase the power of the bat Accuracy: You can increase the accuracy of the batting Batting Eye: You can know ahead of the next ball‚Äôs pattern # Home-Run Tip!--------------------------- 1.Make a full swing with a fast batting-speed! 2.Hit the ball followed from the various thrown pattern with an accurate swing! 3.Let‚Äôs keep an eye on the ball until the end and predict the change of the pattern! 4.Let‚Äôs be confident and make a full swing! # FAQ ------------------------------------- Q : How does STEP UP SYSTEM? A : STEP UP = More balls ex) Minor 1 step = 3 balls Minor 2 step = 6 ballsJust download this !
descriptionHTML:
Apple Appstore BEST of 2012 (PAID/GROSSING)

Flick your finger and make a homerun.
You can experience a real baseball batting through the physical pendulum.

This is a game in which you can experience various throws based on the pendulum. The ball will fly further if you can hit the ball directly with the quick flick. Experience a “real-life like” batting simulation.


# Easy Control---------------------------
You only use flick to control the batting for this game. The more accurate you flick your finger to hit the ball; it is more likely that you will be a home-run hitter.
The rule is simple. Flick your finger with the same feeling in which you would swing a bat in real life. Think of your finger as a bat, and flick it with speed and accuracy. That’s all.

# Movement of the ball------------------
Various kinds of throws are materialized into “real-life like” feelings. Different pitches pull out different various kinds of movements. Thus, the batter may miss the timing and would be hard to hit.

# 10 GAME mode------------------------
You can enjoy this game through 5 kinds of mode.
Minor & Major Mode- Hit as many home-runs as you can; as far as you can.
Multiplayer Mode- You can compete with other players via Game Center.
Moon-Star Mode- Try for a record with the given 9 balls.
Training Mode- You can practice with different kinds of pitches.
*Bunt mode ( need minor 15step): Drop the ball on the target of the floor correctly.
*Total mode ( need bunt 10000 point ) : You’ll meet many different types of the balls from the beginning of the game.
*Faster & faster ( need total 25000 point ) : Head-to-head with only fastballs.
*Jiant mode ( need F&F 10000 point ) : Match with a Giant pitcher
*Cutter mode ( need Jiant 12000 point ) : Match with cutterballs which can cut the baseball bat.

# add 28 Achievement Bonus--------------
1 Achievement = 1 level up bonus!!!

# Level Up System-----------------------
You can choose and upgrade 1 of 3 skills every time the exp becomes full.-
Power: You can increase the power of the bat
Accuracy: You can increase the accuracy of the batting
Batting Eye: You can know ahead of the next ball’s pattern

# Home-Run Tip!---------------------------
1.Make a full swing with a fast batting-speed!
2.Hit the ball followed from the various thrown pattern with an accurate swing!
3.Let’s keep an eye on the ball until the end and predict the change of the pattern!
4.Let’s be confident and make a full swing!

# FAQ -------------------------------------
Q : How does STEP UP SYSTEM?
A : STEP UP = More balls
ex) Minor 1 step = 3 balls
Minor 2 step = 6 balls

Just download this !
summary: Flick Home Run!
title: Flick Home Run! baseball game

comments: I gave Fish Tycoon 2 4 stars I have spent a lot of time playing this game, BUT, recently the daily rewards and rewards for task completion which include coins do not work.  You complete the task, you are told you are getting $200 added to you bank account, BUT your $ total does not change.  This makes it hard to get money to spend.  All you can do is breed and sell fish - which takes time.  I reported this and got a prompt response that they are sorry and that they were adding $ and Gems  to my account balances.  Nice, but my $ total did not change.  I did see an increase in my gems.  There is an update 2/21/18 hopefully this will improve some issues.

The upgrades are too expensive, with no other source of income than just selling fishes that takes forever to grow (if they even grow to adult), and watching ads. I tried to make it work for a day but it's super hard to earn money for upgrades. Even watching ads give so little rewards. Uninstalling. So unfortunate because i really loved the PC version of this.

I fell in love with these developers when I saw a co-worker playing Virtual Families.  It's so cute!  From there, I got into Virtual Villagers and Fish Tycoon.  This second release is better than the first, but it's still the same basic gameplay.  (tip: Don't buy uncommon eggs too early, or you'll be struggling with too many dying rare fish)
I personally hated it because it changed so much from the original. Nothing was wrong with how it operated, it was just to diffetent(IT CHANGED THE MAGIC FISH SPECIES)
Love this game & the support staff rocks. Made a huge mess if things and asked them to reset. They did and offered me game gifts, so quick to reply and very friendly!!!
Would love a way to pause the game or a way to keep a fish from dying if you stop playing. Woke up one morning and all my fish were dead. Please fix

descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

A note from the developer:

Hi there! I know you've been waiting a long time for the opportunity to become a bigger and better fish tycoon. I’m happy to tell you it’s your lucky day!! Now you can rediscover and explore the lost magic fish of Isola as you feed, breed, and sell your way from small time merchant to the ultimate aquatic entrepreneur!

Dive into a delightfully fishy adventure of a real-time virtual aquarium with over 400 unique and distinctive fish to discover: it’s an adorable fishtank mania!

Just like a real world, this one will be changing and growing along with the families of pet fish you collect and care for. The truth is, we are a small team and putting everything that we want into these games is not always possible. While you are discovering the world of Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium, we’ll be investigating lots of new and exciting changes for the future. We hope to continue working on Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium and making it more beautiful, more fun, and more real as the months go on.

Features:

Start with access to 400+ unique species of fish!
Unlock an array of useful upgrades and power-ups!
Renovate your storefront and reveal special surprises to expand your fish empire!
Nurture and cure your fish using magical plants and marine life!
Hire a colorful mascot to draw in the big crowds!
Decorate your tank with a plethora of gorgeous items!
Research advertising, environment and food to sustain rarer species and increase your revenue!

Check out our other hit games like Virtual Families, Virtual Villagers, and more! Bye!

Thanks for playing,
Arthur Humphrey
Lead Designer, Last Day of Work

comments: Loved the game, however as outlined by other users the coin system is bizzare. Packs 1-5 can be opened easily, however after that you simply cannot get enough coins to progress. Tried watching ads to collect coins but ran out of ads to watch (without even getting enough coins, had 50, needed 250 for the next pack, thats 125 ads! grr)

A fantastic game ruined by microtransactions. A fun mechanic and challenging puzzles, but you only get the first few packs for free. After that, you don't earn enough coins to open more packs, at which point you have to wait 6 hours for 10 coins, or watch an additional for a measly 2. I'd love to recommend this game but just can't in its current state.  EDIT: After waiting a couple of days and saving up coins, I unlocked one more pack. It's slow, but the game is quite compelling when you do get to play it. I would now recommend this game, just don't expect to play it too often.

I'm totally addicted to this game, but after the 10th pack or so u don't have enough coins to buy anything. I rushed through all the levels and never used hints or the double coin thing. And now I'm stuck, I can't do anything. The daily 6 "maps" are like 3 minutes of fun and cost more as you get in return. Maybe don't make the packs so expansive or give more coins for faster clearing. Idk I just want to play this game it's to much fun. Please fix it. I love this game ‚ù§Ô∏è

Simple and relaxing Sudoku-style puzzle, mostly trains attention as you look for opportunities to gradually eliminate unknown cells. Hints are awesome as they seem to know exactly where you're stuck, and teach new methods along the way.   Economy is odd, as you progress packs cost more so become unprofitable -- you can watch ads to gain a little more, but still not enough (plus, app detects WiFi at start and can't see it if switched on in game).  Still, a nice little puzzle with a lot of simple levels, until you hit the paywall.

If only for the game, I would've given it 5 stars. But the ridiculous system of gaining coins forces you to wait days before you can actually play a bit more. I don't understand what's the point of getting coins if you have to use them to get the next level, if you want us to buy the game then list it as a buy only product

This is a really neat puzzle game, but the monetization is terrible. Once the packs get more expensive, you have to wait a long time, watch a ton of ads, or pay for coins. I'd be willing to support the game, but buying all puzzles would cost more than 20 USD, which is not worth it.

comments: You have to PAY to see the pieces you've lost?! That's unbelievably stupid. That should be a basic feature of any chess app, especially one with ads.  In this week's challenge, you're stacked against five rooks and five bishops against your EIGHT knights. That is not a winnable scenario. It CERTAINLY is not a "53".

Playing freely, oh my god it takes so long. Found myself bored halfway though because the cpu wasnt fast enough where i was making moves in under 5 seconds, it felt like an entire minute at some points

A lovely play on the game of chess. Instead of those dumb 3d chess gimmicky things, its a clean 2d board. All of the peices are easily identifiable and it does not take up any extra processing than it needs. The best part is that its not truely random pieces. It changes the various pieces on each side of the board depending on skill.

I absolutely hate when apps put the ads exactly at the part of the screen you have to swipe to get the menu to exit. Oh look i accidentally clicked an ad to give you more money. Just a coincidence I'm sure...
I paid for this app, then didn't play for awhile, and now all of the unlocked features won't work until I pay again. Also there is not a direct way to contact the developer. Bad form.
The only two things i don't like about this game.... Chess is no more a zero sum game and the AI is most of the times (99%) defensive and rarely aggressive!
description: Really Bad Chess is just like chess, but with totally random pieces. Try 8 Knights, 4 Bishops, and 3 pawns ‚Äî why not?As heard on NPR's Weekend Edition5 out of 5 Stars "An essential puzzle experience for anyone even remotely interested in strategy games" - TouchArcadeWhether you play chess daily, or quit just after learning the rules, this small twist will open the door to an entire new world of chess.------WHATS IN THE ‚ÄúBOX‚Äù?The free version of Really Bad Chess lets you compete vs. an AI in Ranked, Daily, or Weekly Challenges. Improve your skills using the included Freeplay mode. A single in-app purchase unlocks Versus Mode so you can compete against your friends locally! It also removes ads, displays captured pieces, and adds soothing alternate color-palettes to choose from.------REALLY BAD PRESS"Makes chess fun even if you‚Äôre really bad" - The Verge"Feels more modern than chess has ever felt" - Applenapps"Really Bad Chess takes a really bad idea and somehow manages to make it a lot of fun." - Pocket Gamer------A WORD FROM THE DEVELOPER	Chess is one of those games I always wished I enjoyed, but its commitment to beauty, elegance, and perfect balance always turned me away. Really Bad Chess removes these boring restrictions and flips chess on its head.As much as random pieces change the game in some ways, I was really surprised to notice how much the game remains the same, and how powerful some pieces are ‚Äî you've never truly struggled against a pawn until you've struggled against a pawn in the back row.For chess pros, Really Bad Chess will give you a new type of challenge ‚Äî the pieces & the moves are the same, but you'll have to throw out your openings and your understanding of normal patterns of play. For novice chess players (like most of us), Really Bad Chess greatly opens up the game. Instead of starting by studying openings, in your first games you'll get to discover the joy (and challenge!) of learning how to checkmate.I hope you have as much fun with Really Bad Chess as much as I did making it.-zach
descriptionHTML:
Really Bad Chess is just like chess, but with totally random pieces. Try 8 Knights, 4 Bishops, and 3 pawns — why not?

As heard on NPR's Weekend Edition

5 out of 5 Stars "An essential puzzle experience for anyone even remotely interested in strategy games" - TouchArcade

Whether you play chess daily, or quit just after learning the rules, this small twist will open the door to an entire new world of chess.

------WHATS IN THE “BOX”?
The free version of Really Bad Chess lets you compete vs. an AI in Ranked, Daily, or Weekly Challenges. Improve your skills using the included Freeplay mode. A single in-app purchase unlocks Versus Mode so you can compete against your friends locally! It also removes ads, displays captured pieces, and adds soothing alternate color-palettes to choose from.

------REALLY BAD PRESS

"Makes chess fun even if you’re really bad" - The Verge

"Feels more modern than chess has ever felt" - Applenapps

"Really Bad Chess takes a really bad idea and somehow manages to make it a lot of fun." - Pocket Gamer


------A WORD FROM THE DEVELOPER
Chess is one of those games I always wished I enjoyed, but its commitment to beauty, elegance, and perfect balance always turned me away. Really Bad Chess removes these boring restrictions and flips chess on its head.

As much as random pieces change the game in some ways, I was really surprised to notice how much the game remains the same, and how powerful some pieces are — you've never truly struggled against a pawn until you've struggled against a pawn in the back row.

For chess pros, Really Bad Chess will give you a new type of challenge — the pieces & the moves are the same, but you'll have to throw out your openings and your understanding of normal patterns of play.

For novice chess players (like most of us), Really Bad Chess greatly opens up the game. Instead of starting by studying openings, in your first games you'll get to discover the joy (and challenge!) of learning how to checkmate.

I hope you have as much fun with Really Bad Chess as much as I did making it.

-zach

description: This is a simulation game of the life of Dave - your very own "Virtual Beggar". Your job is to uplift his wealth and to bring happiness into his life.You start from the lowest level of society i.e beg to earn a living, up to a multinational CEO.Consequently, you start from a torn sack up to your very own mansion!‚Ä¢ Lead a life from the poor to rich. ‚Ä¢ Eat foods ranging from trash to international assortments to stay alive.‚Ä¢ Get medication in times of distress and injury‚Ä¢ Be occupationally mobile - Work as anything, LITERALLY!‚Ä¢ Buy all you want weapons, various lodgings, and various transports‚Ä¢ Educate yourself to qualify in working at your dream job.‚Ä¢ Over 15 Bosses to beat -> this lets you your gameplay more fun and challenging.Life Simulator also features a Casino Mode where you get to have fun with three different modules - Roundup, Daily Lucky Draw, and Lottery.           Roundup is a realtime-multiplayer casino module where four players across the globe      place a sum of money on the table. More the money the player puts in higher is the      chance of sweeping all the cash on the table.     Daily Lucky draw lets 1000 lucky winners every day to earn cash. All you need to do is to      signup for the lucky draw and the rest depends on your luck.      Lottery features players buying  100, 1.000 or 10.000 dollar tickets of any quantity. The      results of each lottery vary and you have the potential to ridiculously multiply your      money!! üí° Introducing Careers for life simulator where you can choose from one of our well-crafted paths in order to specialize in a field.This game also contains a City Builder Mode which is available in the settings panel of the game. This mode essentially makes you a mayor where your job is to manage a city from 0 population up to a gigantic metropolitan city. It's the population that determines the success of your city. These are the main features of the game -‚Ä¢ You must build Houses, Commercial Buildings, and Community buildings in order to transform your city into a success.‚Ä¢ Expand land to accommodate more structures.Good Luck! Dave is waiting for youAny feedback is most appreciatedEmail me @ : rahulravindran.in@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
This is a simulation game of the life of Dave - your very own "Virtual Beggar". Your job is to uplift his wealth and to bring happiness into his life.

You start from the lowest level of society i.e beg to earn a living, up to a multinational CEO.
Consequently, you start from a torn sack up to your very own mansion!

• Lead a life from the poor to rich.
• Eat foods ranging from trash to international assortments to stay alive.
• Get medication in times of distress and injury
• Be occupationally mobile - Work as anything, LITERALLY!
• Buy all you want weapons, various lodgings, and various transports
• Educate yourself to qualify in working at your dream job.
• Over 15 Bosses to beat -> this lets you your gameplay more fun and challenging.

Life Simulator also features a Casino Mode where you get to have fun with three different modules - Roundup, Daily Lucky Draw, and Lottery.

Roundup is a realtime-multiplayer casino module where four players across the globe
place a sum of money on the table. More the money the player puts in higher is the
chance of sweeping all the cash on the table.

Daily Lucky draw lets 1000 lucky winners every day to earn cash. All you need to do is to
signup for the lucky draw and the rest depends on your luck.

Lottery features players buying 100, 1.000 or 10.000 dollar tickets of any quantity. The
results of each lottery vary and you have the potential to ridiculously multiply your
money!!

💡 Introducing Careers for life simulator where you can choose from one of our well-crafted paths in order to specialize in a field.

This game also contains a City Builder Mode which is available in the settings panel of the game. This mode essentially makes you a mayor where your job is to manage a city from 0 population up to a gigantic metropolitan city. It's the population that determines the success of your city.

These are the main features of the game -
• You must build Houses, Commercial Buildings, and Community buildings in order to transform your city into a success.
• Expand land to accommodate more structures.




Good Luck! Dave is waiting for you


Any feedback is most appreciated
Email me @ : rahulravindran.in@gmail.com

comments: Great game. However,there were a couple parts that I had to use a cheat on some number combinations and even after doing so didn't understand how I was supposed to have known what they were. A bit confusing. But overall..really great game. Good job
Really good, quite hard which I like

Awesome game. But this is no surprise since I have played every one of Kotorinosu games and have never been disappointed. It's logical, clever, intuitive, and "challenging" (a word that is used much too often with games that are almost laughable for being so easy they insult the intelligence of experienced escape game players.) This developer's games require thinking out of the box and looking in the hard to reach places for clues. Items found can be used multiple times and some objects provide clues to multiple things. I will say, this game is shorter than their usual. But, hey, it's still free! Be patient, pay close attention to everything, and you will escape! It is possible without needing hints or walkthrough, but some may find it hard to do so. I love games like this! Please devs, make more!

Vague. . OK but not great. Much shorter than the other games by this dev. Clues were weird. Diagram upstairs shows arrow down, but on puzzle it ends one click to the right. . ???  Also, hints did not work. Just tapped the "cards" but nothing happened.
This is a strong, challenging escape game with good graphics, nice sound effects, pleasant music. The puzzles are difficult, and the hints are helpful without giving things away.
So much better than its predecessor, which was too easy. This is more in line with Kotorinosu's earlier releases. A thoughtful and challenging escape!!

descriptionHTML:
This is a simple Room Escape Game.

Somehow, You are trapped in a room like a basement surrounded by stone wall with no exit. Let's escape from here by using what is in this room.


- What’s Room Escape Game ? -
Room Escape Game is a game that you explore inside a closed room, find the items and solve the riddles, and finally find an exit.

- When you can’t solve riddles -
If you press the "HINT" button, hint cards are arranged according to the progress of the game. Use it when you can’t solve the riddles.

- When you want to save the game -
The state of the game is automatically saved. If you want to resume, please touch the "LOADGAME" button from the title.
recentChanges: Fixed a problem that there is no response even if you touch the card.
summary: A simple room escape game which you can play with only tap.
title: E.X.I.T ‚Ö° - Room Escape Game -

descriptionHTML:
Game Liêng là một game dân gian được ưu chuộng tại Việt Nam vì ngoài game Liêng ra còn kết hợp Tài Xỉu treo hấp dẫn. Giao diện đẹp, trải nghiệm hay, Liêng68 được cộng đồng bài thủ đánh giá rất cao.

Game Liêng là một trong những game đánh bài dân gian có lối chơi gần giống 3 cây được nhiều người ưa chuộng. Cách đánh đơn giản, hấp dẫn với tỉ lệ may mắn cao giúp game này ngày một thu hút người chơi.

Liêng68 ra mắt giúp người chơi có thể chơi game đánh bài Liêng online này ở bất kỳ nơi đâu miễn là có smartphone kết nối internet. Không những vậy, cổng game chơi Liêng trực tuyến 68 còn tích hợp mini game Tài Xỉu online hấp dẫn, giúp người chơi có thêm thật nhiều phần quà hấp dẫn khi tham gia.

Tính năng nổi bật của Liêng68
- Kết nối bạn bè khắp nơi khi chơi.
- Giao diện, đồ họa, hiệu ứng sinh động.
- Tặng Chip miễn phí khi tải và cài đặt.
- Phù hợp với hầu hết các dòng điện thoại hiện nay.
- Kết hợp thêm mini game chơi Tài xỉu trên mạng.
- Kết hợp thêm mini game chơi Tài xỉu trên mạng.  - trò chơi sâm


Liêng68 có thêm chơi Tài Xỉu online hứa hẹn mang đến cho người chơi nhiều trải nghiệm thú vị, hãy nhanh chóng tải game này về máy và trải nghiệm nhé.

P/s:
Khuyến cáo trò chơi này chỉ nên dành cho người trưởng thành
không chơi liêng đổi thưởng Trò chơi không cung cấp tiền thậ

description: Develop your own planet, collect a strong battle deck and fight other players from all over the world in real time! Discover and upgrade more than 40 types of units, defence structures and spells!Prevail in battles and receive Starships with valuable loot. Build up your planetary town and prepare it for any external threat. Earn rating points for your victories and make your way into the ranks of top players!Choose your unique battle tactics. Powerful giants and dragons with the support of healing spells? Mechanical fighters, which are immune to poison? Hordes of savages led by a shaman? You have various options to experiment with!Features- Planetary duels against other players in real time;- Your own planet with various buildings and defence structures;- Great card collection which includes dozens of units, spells and tower weapons;- Numerous possible battle styles and card combinations;

comments: Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

Only game that has not begged for money and really is fun to play if you can keep up with all the fares driver's n cabs. Just try it yourself. It can be addicting if you don't take your eyes from it haha
