comments: A really beautiful and atmospheric little game with an interesting storyline and a fair few puzzles. I only wish there was more - of this and this kind of game. I like the availability of hints (though in one case is of found references to locations for one of the ghosts handy). I sort of can't believe that it's so free - no in app purchases, no adverts, not even a "donate" button presented in game.

I am stunned. I thought it was going to be a good game from the start because of the beautiful art but everything exceeded my expectations! The scenery is honestly so pretty I would just stop and imagine myself in the beautiful world and ponder. The music surprised me as well, it's so full of feeling and gets you very well into the mood. Lastly, the story was beyond interesting. It was very exciting to learn a bit about these myths and legends. Overall, the experience was amazing and I would recommend this game to everyone.

The graphics are too good. Especially when you reach certain points and can suddenly communicate with spirits. It's amazing. If you're looking for casual adventures for android, this game does the job. Yes, the hints are given, but you are adviced to solve things yourself till you can't get any logic at all for the best experience. Good job, Snow Cannon Games. I want more like these. I'm sure everyone else who's played this, wants so too. Please make a similar one on the Aztec Culture.üíñ

This is so far, 2018, one of the most stunning games I've had the privilege to play. Upon opening it I decided that I was going to record my play through and let others see how gorgeous this game is. I get excited to play it. The puzzles are challenging and really make you think while the graphics and voice acting immerse you this other world where spirits roam and the Old Gods still rule. Thank you to those who had a hand in making this game. 10/10

OH ME LAWD. It's been such a long time since i found a game on play store that i could label "good". The art style is beautiful, story was captivating but my favorite part was the audio. Sound effects are amazing, the voices i could listen to all day although i don't know what language that was. Is there somewhere i could just listen to the warriors singing? They didn't sing words but it was still so relaxing to me. I feel like the game is a masterpiece and deserves hundred times the attention that it is getting. Kudos devs

This is a classic point and click adventure game based on Norse mythology. Beautiful graphics, atmospheric sound, music and voice-overs. No stupid hidden object puzzles like in so many other point and click games nowadays, this game is reminiscent of Myst. I really missed a map with teleportation feature though, as you end up constantly running around from one end of the world to the other. A journal where the game automatically saves photos of the clues would have been really helpful as well, had to take screenshots myself. It's not overly long either. Otherwise a thoroughly enjoyable game, and it's completely free.
description: Unravel a mystery inspired by Viking myth and legend in The Frostrune, a point-and-click adventure based on ancient Norse culture and environments.Find yourself shipwrecked on an island after a summer storm. Nearby, a recently abandoned settlement shows signs that its inhabitants left in a panic. Surrounding the village is a dark, dense forest filled with ancient rune stones and burial mounds. Among them are hidden relics and other well-kept secrets that will bring you closer to solving the mysteries of the island.The Frostrune is made by game developers who are passionate about Norse culture and history. We have taken extra care to make The Frostrune as authentic and historically accurate as possible.KEY FEATURESRich StoryThe Frostrune embraces the Nordic tradition of storytelling: One filled with magic, myth and wonder common in Viking lore.Hand-Painted ArtBeautiful, hand-painted art and an original Viking age themed soundtrack bring the The Frostrune‚Äôs desolate Norse landscape to life.Challenging PuzzlesThrough exploring the rich environment, you will unravel the mystery of the deserted island. Use the objects that you collect to solve puzzles on your journey of discovery.Culturally & Historically AccurateAn authentic Norse environment where elements from myths and folklore come alive. Old Norse speech with subtitles. All objects faithfully recreated from archaeological sources.
descriptionHTML:
Unravel a mystery inspired by Viking myth and legend in The Frostrune, a point-and-click adventure based on ancient Norse culture and environments.

Find yourself shipwrecked on an island after a summer storm. Nearby, a recently abandoned settlement shows signs that its inhabitants left in a panic. Surrounding the village is a dark, dense forest filled with ancient rune stones and burial mounds. Among them are hidden relics and other well-kept secrets that will bring you closer to solving the mysteries of the island.

The Frostrune is made by game developers who are passionate about Norse culture and history. We have taken extra care to make The Frostrune as authentic and historically accurate as possible.

KEY FEATURES

Rich Story
The Frostrune embraces the Nordic tradition of storytelling: One filled with magic, myth and wonder common in Viking lore.

Hand-Painted Art
Beautiful, hand-painted art and an original Viking age themed soundtrack bring the The Frostrune’s desolate Norse landscape to life.

Challenging Puzzles
Through exploring the rich environment, you will unravel the mystery of the deserted island. Use the objects that you collect to solve puzzles on your journey of discovery.

Culturally & Historically Accurate
An authentic Norse environment where elements from myths and folklore come alive. Old Norse speech with subtitles. All objects faithfully recreated from archaeological sources.

I think it sucks if you fight and lose guys it cost more then you win to get back the ones you lose. So you really don't make money. I think it should be cheaper to buy new guys.

You need to go to YouTube to fig out how to play?? Really??? Minimum instructions.  You're left alone with a map on a table and clueless after about the first couple of tips.  Uh hello!! Then your cowboys take thousands to make.  Sucking the life outta would be players.

Great concept, lousy game. What happened to games that a person could play? I'm not playing a game for 100 hours to get to lvl 6 and if you want money, just sell it for 5 bucks. Wasted to much time already waiting for the buildings to make money. I would rather have ads to speed up production.

I was extremely disappointed to find out that this is just another stupid city build game. I don't need any more of these, even if it is wild west themed.

This game could be better.  My issue was that in order to not get kicked from "gangs" you have to be on at least 4 or 5 times throughout the day to participate in "raids".  If you have any sort of life, that is a complete hinderance. I got kicked from gang after gang because I am busy during the day.  If it wasn't for that it would be a great game.

descriptionHTML:
Dust, sand, spurs that sparkle in the sun. Twelve men are standing opposite each other in the scorching midday sun. It is dead silent ... Until the first shot is fired and a murderous duel begins outside the saloon.

At the end, six men lie dead in the New Mexico dust. You and your deputies successfully protected the town from the bandits.

You are the founder of a town in the Wild West. Become a wealthy cattle baron, drive the Wild Bunch Gang from your land and expand your own sphere of control – with a Colt in your hand. Use tactics and strategy to reach your goal and assert yourself against the other players.


The story:

After the end of the civil war, I wandered aimlessly from place to place. Completely without perspective and marked by the experience of war, I hired myself out as a deputy, Cowboy, and Pinkerton agent. By chance, I came across the ruins of this abandoned one-horse town in the middle of nowhere in New Mexico. My old friend John Galveston knew the place from before and helped me restore the saloon. Now I finally have a home - a place where I make the rules. This town belongs to me. I am the law and I will put everyone six feet under who threatens me and my town.


The task:

You are the ruler of this town. There is not one dollar which is made that you don’t see a profit from. Make sure your Sheriff and his deputies are able to protect your town and interests. Recruit gunslingers who make sure that there is no doubt who is calling the shots in the territory of New Mexico. Dig for gold, trade with cattle, and expand your sphere of influence without letting anyone stop you.

Affiliate yourself with like-minded people and establish a gang that is known across the borders of the county.
Wild Bill Hickok, Billy the Kid, Jesse James, Wyatt Earp – the legends of the Wild West – will all stand in your shadow as you relentlessly pursue your goals.


The game:

"Bloody West: Infamous legends" is a strategy and management game that requires strategic thinking, tactics, and skill from the player. The following features are included in the game and provide nearly endless fun:
• Be a gunslinger and establish your own gang.
• Strike against your opponents in fierce duels on dusty roads.
• Get on your horse and conquer the Wild West.
• You are the ruler of your town. Earn money with the stores and build up a trading network.
• Drive the bandits out of the area and become the largest cattle baron of the Wild West.
• Play the game by your own rules and try out different tactics to win.

descriptionHTML:
Với những bài thủ yêu thích chơi Tá Lả và Tài Xỉu Xí Ngầu chắc chắn không thể bỏ qua ứng dụng chơi Tá Lả kết hợp mini game Tài Xỉu treo có một không hai trên cổng bài Phỏm 368.

Phỏm hay còn gọi là Tá Lả là một trong những game dân gian hay được nhiều người yêu thích tại Việt Nam. Người chơi cần phải tính toán để thả bài rác và tìm cách ăn bài tạo phỏm sao cho có thể ù hoặc điểm số thấp nhất để giành chiến thắng.
Tá Lả - Phỏm 368 là trò chơi bài dành cho từ 2 đến 4 người chơi. Tổng số bài là 52 lá, mỗi người đươc chia 9 lá. số lá bài còn lại được đặt ở giữa để những người chơi bốc cho lần đánh tiếp theo nếu không ăn quân của đối thủ. Người đi đầu tiên sẽ được chia nhiều hơn một cây so với những người khác.
Khi chơi Tá Lả online trực tuyến, người chơi cần liên tục đọc suy nghĩ của đối thủ qua từng quân bài để có thể tung hỏa mù, tấn công tâm lý và giành chiến thắng. Chính điều này giúp người chơi nâng cao được tính tư duy logic, khôn ngoan và quyết đoán trong cuộc sống.
Ngoài ra, Phỏm 368 còn có thêm mini game Tài Xỉu treo trực tuyến hấp dẫn, chỉ với hai cửa đặt Tài hoặc Xỉu để người chơi có thêm một hình thức giải trí mới mẻ sau những ván bài Tá Lả online đầy căng thẳng.
 Tính năng nổi bật của game đánh bài Phỏm 368:
- Giao diện mượt mà mang đến cảm giác chơi như ngoài đời thực.
- Hoàn toàn miễn phí khi tải và cài đặt về máy.
- Được tặng Chip cho lần đăng ký tài khoản đầu tiên trên 1 thiết bị.
- Có mini game Tài Xỉu treo hấp dẫn bậc nhất hiện nay.
- Kết nối bạn bè bốn phương.
- Hệ thống sự kiện hàng ngày phong phú độc đáo với nhiều phần thưởng lớn.
- Nhiều hình ảnh minh họa độc đáo, các mẫu câu chat có sẵn giúp giảm thời gian gõ phím trên di động.
- Không chứa quảng cáo khi chơi.
Chơi Tá Lả trực tuyến trên cổng bài Tá Lả Phỏm 368 sẽ nâng cao kinh nghiệm chơi phỏm của bạn, giúp bạn trở thành cao thủ trong thời gian không xa.
Chúc các bạn chơi game Phỏm online và Tài Xỉu treo vui vẻ, đừng quên đánh giá 5 sao để ủng hộ nhà phát hành.

P/s:
Khuyến cáo trò chơi này chỉ nên dành cho người trưởng thành
không chơi tá lả đổi thưởng Trò chơi không cung cấp tiền thật

descriptionHTML:
Ứng dụng chơi Xóc Đĩa trên mạng đi kèm chơi Tài Xỉu trực tuyến cực kỳ thu hút người chơi với nhiều quà tặng, chip chơi miễn phí, dễ chơi dễ thắng.

Xóc Đĩa là một trò chơi dân gian vui vẻ dành cho nhiều người chơi vào các dịp lễ tết ở Việt Nam, được chuyển thể lên chơi trực tuyến dành cho các thiết bị di động. Chơi Xóc Đĩa trên mạng thu hút nhiều người chơi bởi lối chơi đơn giản, dựa vào yếu tố may mắn để mạng lại chiến thắng.

Những điểm hấp dẫn trên ứng dụng chơi Xóc Đĩa:

- Game Xóc Đĩa online dễ chơi, mang tính giải trí cao, luật chơi giống Xóc đĩa offline ngoài đời, giao diện mượt mà, không spam quảng cáo, phù hợp với nhiều thiết bị di động.
- Cách chơi game Xóc Đĩa trên mạng có hai lựa chọn Chẵn và Lẻ, người chơi đặt cược vào một trong hai cửa. Nếu kết quả đúng ô đã chọn thì sẽ chiến thắng.
- Người chơi được tặng Chip chơi miễn phí khi cài đặt và tạo tài khoản chơi Xóc Đĩa.
- Có đánh Tài Xỉu online “mini Tài Xỉu treo” hấp dẫn bậc nhất hiện nay.
- Cộng đồng người chơi đông đảo, giao lưu kết bạn, thi đấu.
- Hỗ trợ 24/7, giải quyết mọi yêu cầu thắc mắc của người chơi.
- không chơi sâm đổi thưởng - trò chơi xã hội

Khi tải và chơi game Xóc đĩa 68, người chơi còn được chơi thêm mini game Tài Xỉu treo, với cách đánh khá giống với Xóc Đĩa. Với 3 quân xúc xắc 6 mặt có nút tính điểm, từ 11 điểm trở lên là Tài, 10 điểm trở xuống là Xỉu.
Với những ai yêu thích trò chơi dân gian Xóc Đĩa và Tài Xỉu thì ứng dụng kết hợp cả hai trò chơi này là điều không thể tuyệt vời hơn.
Hãy tải về và chơi ngay để nhận nhiều ưu đãi!

P/s:
Khuyến cáo trò chơi này chỉ nên dành cho người trưởng thành
không chơi sâm đổi thưởng Trò chơi không cung cấp tiền thật

comments: Great game, Love it! Very creative, fantastic graphics. Not so difficult or loss of life's to where you can't even play.  Yet still challenging.  Only negative is lots of ads. Would gladly pay nominal fee to get rid of them.

A truly fun, interesting & free game. A good game for any age. If you need to do something relaxing, this is a good way. You'll get hooked!!! I'm in the 500's & it's still fun! The ads only require 1 more touch on the screen than you have been doing. Well worth it.

Love it !!! Caught my eye when I saw "pick 2" vs. pick 3. I'm a stay at home mom kids in school 6 days week that gives me time to burn   (lol) They did a couple small tweeks which  made the "typical pick 3 concept"a thing of the past (FINALLY) BUT WAS ENOUGH change to make it a keeper

Not a clue if there's a story line, how the power ups work, the difference between the levels or what the deal with the chest is BUT it a cute fun game to pass the time with and relax with. It's challenging but I've yet to get completely and frustratingly stuck. This feels like a game designed for fun not to make money though "buying lives"

This is a rip off of toy blast!  Peak Games went after hashbro MLP Puzzle party for ripping off the gameplay of toy blast by peak games. I am pissed off that they went after hashbro but not other knock offs. I liked MLP Puzzle Party this game is so boring. Not only they ripped off peak games they ripped off the music from Genies and Gems from Jam City. I will uninstall!

I really like this game but newer version I have updated to after 3 months and I see the Hooray Sound in the end and some more sounds in between has been changed to Ticking kind of sound.   I seriously and kindly request to the developer to restore those sounds which were there in old versions because I seriously loved it. I wish those sounds can come back which makes the game more amazing.   And ofcourse I still continue to play this and have hope for those sounds to be back.
description: Candy Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.Candy Legend is easy to play, but it is plenty of fun and surprise.How to play - Just tap on the same color blocks to crush them. Tap on 5 more blocks to generate a new candy which has a special skill!There is a nice booster system, which supports you to solve any problem you meet in the game. By the way, the booster is also free.One more thing, you can play the game at anywhere anytimeÔºåinternet is not necessary for it.Game features: 1. Be friendly to ladies 2. Completely free 3. Easy to play but very interesting 4. Wonderful gaming experience 5. 900+ levels
descriptionHTML:
Candy Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.

Candy Legend is easy to play, but it is plenty of fun and surprise.

How to play - Just tap on the same color blocks to crush them. Tap on 5 more blocks to generate a new candy which has a special skill!

There is a nice booster system, which supports you to solve any problem you meet in the game. By the way, the booster is also free.

One more thing, you can play the game at anywhere anytime，internet is not necessary for it.

Game features:
1. Be friendly to ladies
2. Completely free
3. Easy to play but very interesting
4. Wonderful gaming experience
5. 900+ levels
summary: Candy Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.
title: Candy Legend

description: Do you love Adventure Games? Do you love Escape Games & Intriguing Puzzles? Do you love solving Mystery Games? Play 'The Long Journey' and feel like you are in a Gigantic Adventure Game with a Massive and Abandoned world to explore!If you love Adventure Games & Mystery Games with a storyline that will Captivate you from the start, then you will LOVE The Long Journey - Adventure Games & Point & Click.Travel to a faraway and distant land nestled in the mountains, where mankind is often unseen, and stories of the ages unfold. You crash land in a very isolated, dense area in the forest. It appears to be another world - totally uncharted territory, where only outliers dwell.With a backpack as your only supply, you start your journey through the vast woods, picking up clues on your expedition.Along your way, you see visions of young children in the distance, waving you to keep moving along, as if there is a path and destiny to be reached.Where did you come from? Who are these young children, and what are they leading you into?The mystery of the Long Journey will unravel before your very eyes, and another improbable twist ending will unveil and leave you astounded, and wanting to discuss the turn of events that lead up to the epic finale...Features Include:Over 110 Gorgeous HDR Scenes from many places around the world, sewn together to bring you one stunning game.Beautifully crafted music and sounds immerse you into a whole other world.Captivating new storyline that builds up into an improbable twist ending!Includes a Map System, Hints, Answers & other tips and tricks to help you along the way!
descriptionHTML:
Do you love Adventure Games? Do you love Escape Games & Intriguing Puzzles? Do you love solving Mystery Games? Play 'The Long Journey' and feel like you are in a Gigantic Adventure Game with a Massive and Abandoned world to explore!

If you love Adventure Games & Mystery Games with a storyline that will Captivate you from the start, then you will LOVE The Long Journey - Adventure Games & Point & Click.

Travel to a faraway and distant land nestled in the mountains, where mankind is often unseen, and stories of the ages unfold.

You crash land in a very isolated, dense area in the forest. It appears to be another world - totally uncharted territory, where only outliers dwell.

With a backpack as your only supply, you start your journey through the vast woods, picking up clues on your expedition.

Along your way, you see visions of young children in the distance, waving you to keep moving along, as if there is a path and destiny to be reached.

Where did you come from? Who are these young children, and what are they leading you into?

The mystery of the Long Journey will unravel before your very eyes, and another improbable twist ending will unveil and leave you astounded, and wanting to discuss the turn of events that lead up to the epic finale...

Features Include:

Over 110 Gorgeous HDR Scenes from many places around the world, sewn together to bring you one stunning game.

Beautifully crafted music and sounds immerse you into a whole other world.

Captivating new storyline that builds up into an improbable twist ending!

Includes a Map System, Hints, Answers & other tips and tricks to help you along the way!
summary: The Long Journey - Adventure Games, Escape Games & Point Click Adventure Puzzle
title: The Long Journey - Adventure Games & Point Click

comments: The game wouldn't be so bad if they didn't have those STUPID flashing lying ads about you winning something.  I tried to turn it off by telling it i was under 18 because it says you must be over 18 to qualify.  I said under 18, no Facebook and it said you qualify!  That flashing is irritating enough that I might delete the game.

In 2017 I loved this app and the puzzles, looking forward to it every morning, but with the new update since yesterday, it sucks!!!   The daily puzzle, when you can get through all of the other screens to get to it, is mediocre at best.     I see it getting uninstalled from my tablet before Sunday!!!

I love this game soooo much, but the only problem I have with it is the ads. I'm sorry, there's just way too many ads and their so annoying. But I love this game and whoever created this game should be proud of theirselves because they did such a great job creating this game for children and i bet that everyone in the world who plays this thinks that too.

Had played the game for almost a year straight and earned free hints that totaled almost 280. When I got my new phone and did the transfer of apps from old phone to new phone, app transferred over but the points and level of play went back to the beginning, so it feels like being in college and being put back into kindergarten because the school lost its records.

I like this new take on a word game. Very easy to understand and reminds me of Boggle. I also enjoy that there is no time limit...you can take as much time as you need before having to use any hints, which makes the game relaxing. I would definitely recommend this to someone who loves word games.

I loved this before the update. I played it every day, but they made it to open on the puzzle levels instead of the home screen every time now, and it takes way too many clicks to get back to the homepage to play the daily puzzle. Uninstalling.

comments: Another microtransaction cash grab, fun at first but within the first 15 or so games the paywall comes crashing in.  Im getting tired of the mildly entertaining modile game needing hundreds of dollars to continue playing...

Really fun at first, but the paywall comes hard and fast. Upgrades ramp up to the point of being near impossible to attain unless you spend money or spend hours watching adds. If grinding it out was more effective, id play longer, increasing the odds of the occasional in game transaction, but as it stands, not worth the time, since most of it is spent in ads and not the game.

Far too expensive to buy new workers. Seems like I'm not the only one who thinks that as well. Good time killer but so not going to pay to win. Plus there was an ad for that evil dead show, the really bloody and gory one. Thought this was more of a kid friendly game but I guess not if they're showing rated r ads.

Fun game but upgrades and new staff are way too expensive. You have to beat 20-30 levels to afford anything making the game pay to play for a long term commitment. Dev needs to either increase money per level or reduce cost of upgrades and staff.
Overly simplistic and not very engaging. Prices for upgrades are very high to encourage real money transactions. Kills the rest of the player base. Wasn't fun enough to commit

Like other reviewers, I think this game is cute and fun at first, but upgrades are far too expensive. If this was a game before microtranactions, it would have cost between $5-10. Now you can spend hundreds and still not get all the upgrades. Not worth the price.

comments: This is a wonderful cross stitch app. The picture quality is excellant. Among all apps in the store, this one lets you make  the largest pics from your own. It is  also the most generous option to gain coins. I think the adds blocking colors some reviews mention must depend on your device. I play on 8 in samsung tablet and have no problems. I  have two requests. Would like to play in landscape mode and would like the  ability to turn off the highlighting of the selected color like Cross Stitch world for a little extra challange.

This is my favourite cross stitch game of them all. I love the spin the wheel feature where you can earn bonuses such as gold, protect, etc. I actually don't mind the ads as they offset paying actual money for the patterns if you are a bit "broke" at the time and the import feature is great! Totally addicted.

I love this app. It is very calming and fun BUT there are soooooo many ads. I will raise the rating when you stop having me click/watch so many ads.  Update: there seems to be MORE "+80 coins" ads that block out areas to work in so I eventually HAVE to watch them to get them to go away.

I'm using my Samsung galaxy s7 and I LOVE this app! Such a great time killer, anxiety reducer, stress reducer. You can even upload your own pics! I just wish the spin would land on things other than 60 coins, unpick and shield. There was a day where I got 5 prizes every spin! That was AWESOME!!!

Don't bother playing the mystery ones unless you like cartoon characters. Honestly, it's the last thing I want to see when I'm relaxing after putting 3 kids to bed....more of the same characters that screeched at me all day.

You have to pay if you make a mistake ! You can pay to not ever make a mistake on a single color not all colors just one at a time! I'm sorry but I use recolor and I can change the color anytime!! I wouldn't down load this unless you are a really perfectionist and close to a perfect I'm not sure typer I'm not sure case like it was a mistake!  As I Chuckle! I'm sorry cross sticherz,

description: From the creators of Airport Scanner comes the sequel, Airport Scanner 2!  This super addicting luggage scanning game now has a brand new 3D gameplay experience and a Player versus Player smuggling game!Work your way through over 100 missions at 50 airports across the US. Build your rank by stopping the bad guys from bringing bad things through security while still getting the flights out on time! Stay on top of ever changing rules and regulations, while working at busier and busier airports.Use your X-RAY scanner to look through carry-on luggage and find the prohibited items. Your scanner is equipped with a high-tech 3D exploded view that lets you really get in there and see what‚Äôs in the bags. If that‚Äôs not enough, you can also equip your scanner with an arsenal of handy power-ups that can help you handle even the craziest bags.This time around there are also smugglers! These sneaky passengers will try to smuggle a valuable collectable past your scanner in the midst of the frantic action. If you find the collectable you get to add it to your collection and the smuggler will join your team! Then you can then send your new smuggler to another player‚Äôs airport and help you build your collection of collectables!  Just pack the collectable into in a bag and send it to a friend or random opponent and hopefully they wont find it! Can you find or smuggle every collectable in the game?FEATURES * New 3D exploded view scanning mode.* Multiple viewing angles just like real X-RAY scanners.* Smuggle collectable items past your friends for an extra reward in the new PvP gameplay! * Find 100+ rare collectable items.* 50 airports with multiple missions means hours of enjoyment.* Real TSA Prohibited and Allowed Items.  * Fully Upgradable X-RAY Scanner with power-ups.* Line management - fast track first class passengers and get flight crew on their flights with just one tap!* Line management Rewards ‚Äì collect coins and upgrades for successfully completing line management. game.* Lots of brain-bending rule variations that keep you on your toes.ADDITIONAL FEATURES * Challenge your friends by trying to smuggle collectables by them.* 3D baggage screening and beautiful graphics.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Airport Scanner comes the sequel, Airport Scanner 2! This super addicting luggage scanning game now has a brand new 3D gameplay experience and a Player versus Player smuggling game!

Work your way through over 100 missions at 50 airports across the US. Build your rank by stopping the bad guys from bringing bad things through security while still getting the flights out on time! Stay on top of ever changing rules and regulations, while working at busier and busier airports.

Use your X-RAY scanner to look through carry-on luggage and find the prohibited items. Your scanner is equipped with a high-tech 3D exploded view that lets you really get in there and see what’s in the bags. If that’s not enough, you can also equip your scanner with an arsenal of handy power-ups that can help you handle even the craziest bags.

This time around there are also smugglers! These sneaky passengers will try to smuggle a valuable collectable past your scanner in the midst of the frantic action. If you find the collectable you get to add it to your collection and the smuggler will join your team! Then you can then send your new smuggler to another player’s airport and help you build your collection of collectables! Just pack the collectable into in a bag and send it to a friend or random opponent and hopefully they wont find it! Can you find or smuggle every collectable in the game?


FEATURES
* New 3D exploded view scanning mode.
* Multiple viewing angles just like real X-RAY scanners.
* Smuggle collectable items past your friends for an extra reward in the new PvP gameplay!
* Find 100+ rare collectable items.
* 50 airports with multiple missions means hours of enjoyment.
* Real TSA Prohibited and Allowed Items.
* Fully Upgradable X-RAY Scanner with power-ups.
* Line management - fast track first class passengers and get flight crew on their flights with just one tap!
* Line management Rewards – collect coins and upgrades for successfully completing line management. game.
* Lots of brain-bending rule variations that keep you on your toes.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
* Challenge your friends by trying to smuggle collectables by them.
* 3D baggage screening and beautiful graphics.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and user feedback tweaks.
summary: Airport Scanner 2, now in 3D
title: Airport Scanner 2

comments: Good game. I have tried alot of Bingos and this one is the best to me. I had an issue with my tickets but I emailed them and they took care of it right away. The Bingo caller even shouts out rhyming sayings for certain numbers. I really enjoy playing this Bingo. Definitely a good and worth it download for all Bingo players.

Allthough I love it, I am giving it a 3 star rate. I mysteriously lost my 2 ticket packs I bought on saterday 17 February 2018, One 240 pack tickets 240 for R 246.99 and one 140 pack tickets for  R 129,99. The transactio I had were successful. One moment it was there after I bought it, and when I wanted to play it was all gone. I still don't understand how and why and feel that I have wasted my money. Can you help me to resolve this issue?  Thank you.

Luv It !!!!  I've Played This Bingo Game More Than Any Game I've Ever Downloaded. I Have An Update About This Game When They Give You The Daily Spin And 12 Paw Powerups Are Giving They Also Give You The Daily Spin With Other Options I Often Times Spin And Get The Paw Bucks Which They Claims To Double. My Paw Bucks Never Are Added To The Rest Of My Paw Bucks ! It's All A Waste Of Spin If I'm Not Really Winning.

The only frustrating and annoying thing is that you receive more dubs and avitars then you can use. I mean seriously if you want to change your avitar and dubber THAT OFTEN  than buy it. I'd much rather receive tickets, coins, or power ups, which are more important than a monkey to dub with.

Been trying for 5 days to get a triple bingo but it never seems to happen. It takes to long to win a bingo even if I play with 4 cards yet all the other players seem to get bingos so quickly. The way things are going I would not recommend this game to my family or friends. Will give the game a little bit longer to see what happens.

It would be appreciated if the game allowed us to use our coins to purchase tickets instead of real money. I am on a fixed income and can't spend our money buying tickets, credits or whatever to play. You don't even give that much in a daily collection.

description: Craft Shooter is a blistering action game set in a familiar world. Shoot enemies, build covers, fight and defeat other players. If a wall is in your way ‚Äì simply remove it. And then rebuild itGame features         +Interactive world. Raise fortifications using blocks, hide, and build bridges and tunnels to go around opponents.     +Dozens of weapon types that you can level up as you like. Hundreds of upgrades.     +Fight real players ‚Äî up to 10 on one map.     +Automatic firing and assisted targeting. Open fire by simply turning in an opponent‚Äôs direction. If you like being in complete control, both functions can be disabled, either together or separately.     +Stand out from the crowd. There are numerous unique skins at your disposal.     +Get resources.  Smash other players‚Äô blocks and claim them for yourself.     +Level up your gear. Be the strongest.ModesEach map boasts a unique setting and battle conditions. Play the role of police officers or a gang of criminals in ‚ÄúCoppers & Robbers‚Äù mode. Fight in the jungle in ‚ÄúDeadly Games.‚Äù Take on the opposing team in ‚ÄúBattleground.‚Äù Defend your fortresses in ‚ÄúSniper Forts‚Äù and hurl opponents out of the sky in ‚ÄúSky Wars‚Äù mode. Enter a destroyed city in ‚ÄúZombie Apocalypse‚Äù and have fun in ‚ÄúPixelmon Park‚Äù mod.Weapons and levelling upEach mode has its own special gear. Players can increase their power and level up the types of weapons and outfits they like.Before entering a battle, players can select the optimal set of gear for the map, and when they die, they can make changes to it to tweak their tactics. Shoot enemies with a sniper rifle, blow them away with a perfect shotgun round or run headlong into melee combat armed with an axe.Find your favorite among 40 weapon types and upgrade it, increasing destructive power and improving your accuracy and other attributes. Players who prefer building to shooting will enjoy the special blocks that can be used to create incredibly secure covers.LeaguesThe more you win, the higher you climb. Each subsequent league unlocks new types of weapons and opportunities to level up. Your skills are the key to everything. Train hard and one day you will be top of the leaderboard.
descriptionHTML:
Craft Shooter is a blistering action game set in a familiar world. Shoot enemies, build covers, fight and defeat other players. If a wall is in your way – simply remove it. And then rebuild it

Game features

+Interactive world. Raise fortifications using blocks, hide, and build bridges and tunnels to go around opponents.
+Dozens of weapon types that you can level up as you like. Hundreds of upgrades.
+Fight real players — up to 10 on one map.
+Automatic firing and assisted targeting. Open fire by simply turning in an opponent’s direction. If you like being in complete control, both functions can be disabled, either together or separately.
+Stand out from the crowd. There are numerous unique skins at your disposal.
+Get resources. Smash other players’ blocks and claim them for yourself.
+Level up your gear. Be the strongest.

Modes

Each map boasts a unique setting and battle conditions. Play the role of police officers or a gang of criminals in “Coppers & Robbers” mode. Fight in the jungle in “Deadly Games.” Take on the opposing team in “Battleground.” Defend your fortresses in “Sniper Forts” and hurl opponents out of the sky in “Sky Wars” mode. Enter a destroyed city in “Zombie Apocalypse” and have fun in “Pixelmon Park” mod.

Weapons and levelling up

Each mode has its own special gear. Players can increase their power and level up the types of weapons and outfits they like.

Before entering a battle, players can select the optimal set of gear for the map, and when they die, they can make changes to it to tweak their tactics. Shoot enemies with a sniper rifle, blow them away with a perfect shotgun round or run headlong into melee combat armed with an axe.

Find your favorite among 40 weapon types and upgrade it, increasing destructive power and improving your accuracy and other attributes. Players who prefer building to shooting will enjoy the special blocks that can be used to create incredibly secure covers.

Leagues

The more you win, the higher you climb. Each subsequent league unlocks new types of weapons and opportunities to level up. Your skills are the key to everything. Train hard and one day you will be top of the leaderboard.
developerAddress: 3 Themistokli Dervi Street, Julia House, CY-1066 Nicosia, Cyprus

comments: Just way too many ads. Eventually you start having to watch an ad after every second other level. Its a free game, so I get it but the levels are so quick sometimes I'm watching more than I am playing. Fun game, though. Easy controls and great graphics and sound.

This game is outstanding. Love the graphics, simple to understand. Some appear quite easy and then you suddenly get a level that looks like it should be but has you scratching your head for AGES!!! Love it. I can live with the adverts, just wish i could put the phone down.

descriptionHTML:
Roll the Ball® - slide puzzle is a simple addictive unblock puzzle game, keep you playing it!

Do you like the game genres as below? Great! Roll the Ball® - slide puzzle has all the elements. ;)
• Sliding Puzzles, Just move and move!
• Puzzle Games, Thought-provoking fun.
• Maze Puzzle Games, Escape the maze.
• Brain Teasers, Test yourself. Exercise your brain.
• Physics Puzzler, Physics-based gaming.
• Match-3 Puzzle, Easy to learn but hard to master.
• Retro Games, Revisit the classics
• Exam Prep & Tutoring, Practice makes perfect. Train you brain to active mind.
• Family Puzzle Games, Enjoy the game with your family.

Move the blocks with your finger to create a path for moving the ball to the red GOAL block. But riveted blocks can't be moved. Are you ready to play? Download and start solving puzzles now!


FEATURES
• SLIDING PUZZLE
- An essential is for the adult to kids of all ages.

• TONS OF EPIC LEVELS
- You can enjoy the game enough.

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play at your own pace.

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- Games you can play offline.

• MORE VARIATIONS
- Moving, Rotation mode to challenge & Star mode to relax.

• USEFUL IN-GAME FUNCTIONS:
- RESTART: Just restart a level quickly.
- UNDO : Have a mistake? Don't worry, just put it back.
- HINTS : It's a good friend. Of course, it may be wrong.

• GET DAILY BONUS & GIFTS
- The Santa may give gifts to you. Check a message box often.

It's support game progress only, not hints, not auto-save. Be careful, if you tap the "Save" or "Load" button, it will works at once.

comments: I know whales are probably keeping you guys in business, but spare a thought to those of us who just want to play a fun game without ads or in-app purchases hindering us. They're unpleasant. Please listen to us. We liked you before all this, and we want to like you again. But we don't like you right now. We want to pay once for a full, fun game. Not many times for a slow, wait-filled game.

It's just another freemium game from Kairosoft. Lately they've only been making rehashes of their old classics, only more bent on making you pay more. I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone. It would be wiser if you just bought the original The Ramen Sensei instead of this.

Seriously, kairosoft. Please return to making actual kairosoft games, not games that are free... With huge price tags to enjoy a full game. You got your fanbase because of the games you USED to make. Not these trashy remakes with no substance. You are losing so many fans with this.

What the hell Kairosoft, stop doing garbage free to play games. This game is just boring, you don't have a lot to do. Also the gold and platinum passes are just ridiculous, you should seriusly go back to what Kairosoft was. Is Kairosoft now a  shovelware company?

I like the game, and the thought of it have many kinds of ramen, not only original broth ramen. But i don't really like the free medal trade. I like it better if the method for free medal is like the other Kairosoft games. Hence the 4 stars, sorry.

U're even getting greedy arent u?but really kairosoft. it wasnt good move. to do some microtrans. i would like to pay for a full game from start instead this s*hit system.  The community that you build for a years, going to dissapear. if u still do this to us.

descriptionHTML:
Noodles, soup - easy! Think again!

Get your apron on, it's time to learn about the complexities and wonders that is ramen. Have what it takes to become a noodle legend? Or will you end up as just another dime-a-dozen soup-slinger?

But why stop at one restaurant? Embark on Ramen Odyssey, conquering one region after another with your mouth-watering creations. It's world domination by ramen!

Win over lots of customers at ramen festivals, which you can play together with friends.

Face off rivals at ramen arena contests and make your Ramen Hall prosper. Become THE Ramen Sensei!
--
・Should the screen go dark and freeze, try to power your device down and relaunch the game.
・All game progress is stored on your device. Save data cannot be transferred between devices, nor can it be restored after deleting or reinstalling the app.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kairopark.jp/.
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues!

Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information.
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010
summary: Ramen Restaurant SimulatorCook ramen so deliciousit can change the world!
title: The Ramen Sensei 2

descriptionHTML:
Classic game Dominoes Puzzle Science style is completely free now, but also a very famous puzzle game.
As a classic puzzle game, Dominoes Puzzle Science style is famous for a long time.
Whether the elderly, women, children or housewives or fashionable women, are very suitable for play, will love this game.
Dominoes Puzzle Science style is also a fun and enjoyable game, suitable for playing with family.

What do we hope for?
We hope to bring you relaxation and enjoyment.
We hope to help you solve boring time.
We hope to practice your mind and fingers.
We hope you will not be alone, we will always be with you.

Unlike the test-word games, Dominoes Puzzle Science style is great for people of all different languages.

How to play Dominoes Puzzle Science style?
1. Place equal or greater than three squares of the same number in a horizontal or vertical position to blend them.
2. You can also rotate them before placing them.
3. Blending as many squares as possible to get high scores.

If you have an elderly person in your family and you want them to stay away from games in mahjong, playing cards or other casinos, and do something to consume boring time.
If your wife, children, or girlfriend always bother you.
If your husband, or boyfriend always ignore you.
Call them to play the game together.

Key Notes:
Dominoes Puzzle Science style is a completely free game, without any paid links.
Dominoes Puzzle Science style is a game that does not require a network, you can disconnect online play.

Apology statement:
Although it is a free game, but we also need to run our company, so there is advertising.
Apologize for advertising again.
If the ad is annoying to you, there will be no advertisement for disconnecting your network.
summary: This is a puzzle game that merges the same squares.
title: Dominoes Puzzle Science style

Pocket War is a turn base mobile game with elfin cultivation, collection and strategy battle. There are more than 500 lovely elfins in the game, what’s more, also have unique evolution system, various gorgeous skills and brand new scene. Interact with friends to cultivate, speed up to adventure and also have tactics arena element here for you. New and old players can have fun in this game.
[Elfin Cultivation]
In the game, players can collect various elfins freely, cultivate them and evolve to stronger elfins for you in battle and arena.
[Strategy Battle]
Enter battleground through tactics deployment and have a odds-on battle.

Obtain abundant resource through unique friends speed up system, so that you can cultivate your elfin quickly.
[Various Element]
Abundant events, interesting tasks, Pokemon Palace, Resource War, Void Realm, Legendary Reveland, Trainer House etc. no matter the leisure or arena players, all they can find the plays and fun which are suitable for them.

descriptionHTML:
Tap the Bored Button and start your journey into series of games specially selected for you. A new addictive game will always be ready for you to play with every tap in just seconds. It is all free and it will always be free. Start surfing now!!

Downloaded by over 2 Million gamers in the first 6 months and featured in 20+ countries…

**The Game Collection**

The game collection of Bored Button consists of more than 100 games from wide range of genres. From brain teasing puzzle games to featured new arcade games, from friv games to classic board games are in the same collection and they are ready for you to enjoy with just a tap.

Some of the Popular Puzzle Games;
Maze; Jelly Doods; 100 Blocks; Ojello Puzzle; Pebble Boy; Hexaginta; Ancient Blocks

Some of the Popular Arcade Games;
Balls; Color Valley; Go Down; Teo’s Escape; Let’s Park; Geometry Rash; Virus Attack

Some of the Popular Friv Games;
Babel; Monster Rush; Gunmach; Sticky Goo; Sky Race; Paint Boy; Crazy Wheel

Some of the Popular Board Games;
Four Colors; Connect Four; Master Checkers; Master Chess

And many more games in many more genres are available for you to surf through and enjoy your time :))

**Recommendation System**

First you will be served a pack of new games in an order to analyze your game taste, then a new game which is calibrated to your personal taste will be presented to you.

If you like to play unique puzzle games like Ancient Blocks, then friv games will not be presented to you, games like Hexaginta will be prepared for you next. But if you like friv games like Sticky Goo then games like Babel will be ready for you to play with your next tap.

We get that your game taste can change time to time, in that case the system will detect the change and adapt the following games on-the-go to find your next favorite game.

**Create Your Own Games List and Play Offline**

While surfing through games, you will of course love some of them more and want to be able play them whenever you want. So you can add the ones you loved to your favorites by just tapping the plus icon at the menu and save it to your personalized games list which will always be free and available for you to play.

While you are saving the games and creating your own list, the system will analyze your most liked ones and save them for offline play so you can enjoy Bored Button even when you are in an airplane or a subway :)

We will also be having some surprises for you when you are playing offline. The system will save some of the hand-picked new games for you to discover and enjoy; even when you want to play offline.

**Low Memory Space**

For those of you who have low memory space in their phone, we thought of you too. When you download Bored Button and start playing, it will analyze your memory space and save the games to your phone accordingly. We do not want to overload your phone by loading games that are not suitable for you. For example If you have 100 mb space available in your phone, the system will be saving most suited, low storage games for offline mode and it will only block max 50mb of the storage.

**No More Searching for New Games**

Just give it a go and start playing now. You will be addicted to the smoothness and have fun with the flexibility of discovering a new game . There will be no need to search for a new game when you get bored of one. For your own convenience, we do that for you. It is now just a tap away to discover your next favorite game with Bored Button.

**No Need to Update for New Games**

We are constantly adding new games to the database. Despite other gaming apps, you do not need to update the app every time you want to play a new game.

You can play the most popular new games in just seconds by just tapping the button again.

Download it now for free!!

For any inquiries please contact us through info@gabblestudios.com
summary: Discover many addictive games with every tap, save to favorites to play anytime.

descriptionHTML:
Chơi tiến lên miền Nam đếm lá online trực tuyến với ứng dụng đánh bài Tiến Lên68 cực kỳ hấp dẫn kèm theo mini game Tài xỉu online giúp người chơi giải trí mọi lúc mọi nơi. Tốt chơi bài sâm lốc online.

Trò chơi tiến lên miền Nam là một trong những game dân gian giải trí cực kỳ hấp dẫn Được đưa lên cổng Bài Tiến Lên 68. Có thể chơi trực tuyến trên máy tính bảng, mobile chạy hệ điều hành Android và iOS.
Chơi đánh bài tiến lên miền Nam online dùng bộ bài 52 lá, được chia cho 2 đến 4 người chơi, với hình thức đánh kiểu đếm lá cực kỳ đơn giản và hấp dẫn, thu hút hàng triệu người tham gia tại Việt Nam.

Tính năng nổi bật của ứng dụng game tiến lên miền Nam mới nhất:

- Chơi tiến lên miền Nam online mọi lúc mọi nơi chỉ cần có mạng internet
- Tải, đăng ký tài khoản nhanh chóng miễn phí
- Giao diện chơi tiến lên miền Nam dễ nhìn thân thiện, sinh động, dễ sử dụng
- Đánh tiến lên miền Nam online mượt mà trên mọi thiết bị di động và tiết kiệm pin
- Tặng Chip miễn phí cho người chơi sau khi tải và đăng ký tài khoản
- Nhiều phần quà hấp dẫn khi người chơi chiến thắng
- Có thêm chơi tài xỉu trực tuyến với mini game Tài xỉu
- Cộng đồng chơi đông đảo, giao lưu kết bạn, thi đấu mọi lúc mọi nơi
- Không có quảng cáo
- chơi bài sâm lốc online

Ngoài ra, khi tải ứng dụng chơi đánh bài tiến lên miền Nam đếm lá sẽ có thêm mini game Tài xỉu treo. Bạn hoàn toàn có thể chơi bài tiến lên miền Nam và đánh Tài xỉu online mà không cần tải game tài xỉu miễn phí thêm về máy.
Tài Xỉu treo chỉ có duy nhất hai cửa là Tài và Xỉu với 3 quân xúc xắc, nếu tổng điểm từ 11 trở lên là Tài, từ 10 trở xuống là Xỉu. Tải xuống chơi ngay để tận hưởng cảm giác vui vẻ, cũng như trở thành bài thủ tiến lên miền Nam đỉnh cao và vua Tài Xỉu treo nhé các bạn.
Chúc các bạn chơi tiến lên miền Nam miễn phí vui vẻ.
P/s:
- Khuyến cao trò chơi dành cho người trưởng thành.  - Trò chơi không hỗ trợ các giải thưởng bằng tiền mặt.  - Nếu bạn giỏi trong trò chơi không đảm bảo rằng bạn sẽ giành chiến thắng trong casino thực. - chơi bài sâm lốc online - mô phỏng.

descriptionHTML:
World’s healthiest game!

Cure your way through the quirkiest and funniest diseases in My Hospital - the ultimate simulation game where you design, manage and maintain your very own medical centre!

Create elixirs, farm and harvest your own medical plants and produce cures for hundreds of patients that need your help. It’s a world where Panacea rules and every treatment is available at your fingertips!

◉ BUILD YOUR HOSPITAL

Construct and manage your own hospital. Build doctor’s offices, diagnostic rooms, the treatment centre and laboratories. Expand and upgrade your hospital and share it with friends!

◉ CREATE UNIQUE CURES

Farm and harvest plants with healing properties, produce dozens of elixirs, and blend syrups to treat more than 80 funny diseases. Whether it’s a chilli throat condition, frozen hands or slimey lungs, you’ll be sure to find the cure! Unlock new remedies, treatment rooms and new conditions with every level and complete fun challenges!

◉ DECORATE YOUR HOSPITAL

Customize each area of your health center to make your patients feel at home. You have tons of decorations to choose from and when you finally manage to make it look as pretty as a picture, show it off in front of your friends!

◉ PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Connect with your Facebook account to access your friends’ Hospitals around the world. Buy, sell cures and compete with other Hospital managers. Tell them about your achievements via Google Play Games and Facebook.

Please note that My Hospital is free to download and play. However, some in-game items are available and can be purchased for real money.

description: Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!

I loved this game and found it very fun. As someone who is currently learning Java, I can vouch that it's not as easy as it may seem, to make a full fledged game like this. I appreciate that the developer would not overflow it with ads but instead make it a choice to see ads in exchange for in game benefits. I think this game should get more attention

I'm an avid music gamer and I have to say for a mobile game it's graphics and choice of music is very nice. However, the reason I don't give it 5 stars is I was expecting the nodes that you collect or other gamplay aspect to be in tune with the music, like say button pressing games like tap tap sonic etc where you press the button in time with the music. The fact this game doesn't do that is a little off putting and I'm not sure how much I would play this game for that reason. Maybe they will implement this in later updates. The option to buy almost everything with in game currency rather than real money is a bonus, give you reason to play it more because you know you can unlock songs etc without forking your own money. Overall though still a good game!

It's a good game, obviously an upgrade from the original, just feel a bit bothered with some of the minor changes.  The fact that on the list of things to collect is only 2 items long instead of 4  That after about the 5th one collected, every item just appears on a formation instead of being spread.  And that you don't get power ups while playing anymore.  And why is addicted to you not here?

I like the game especially because there aren't many like it right now. Though it would be nice to see an update that lets you use other songs too. Even though it's avicci's app I mean the songs do get repetitive after playing for a long time

It's great, but not great enough. Graphics has drastically changed, new songs added (which i like it), but only one problem, why did you remove the feature that you will be healed up when you collected enough, uh things. Why tho? But anyway, a major upgrade to its predecessor. So thumbs up
description: There‚Äôs a party in space - and you‚Äôre invited! In collaboration with award-winning Hello There Games, Avicii proudly presents hit music game AVICII GRAVITY HD, where you can experience Avicii's latest and greatest hits through compelling and atmospheric gameplay.  In fast-paced AVICII GRAVITY HD, Avicii's galactic hits merge with intense gameplay into a uniquely immersive experience - and YOU decide how it all plays out! Your progress determines how the melodies build up, while the environment changes to match the music. Swipe, push and power up your ships to maximize your rides! Enter a flow-like state and ride through endless, artistic environments inspired by Avicii hits. Earn credits to unlock new ships, environments and power-ups. Better yet, you can access and immerse yourself in a variety of Avicii songs - in ways attainable only through this game. Preparing to play is exciting in itself, as slot machines determine the tokens and power-ups you receive for your next ride. Also, the store is loaded with consumables, credits and hit songs. And finally, daily challenges and achievements unlock new ships and upgrades, and will have you coming back for more!

comments: Bloody amazing, like that's the best way I can put it. Its good for idling but you can make real progress by tapping as well. The fact that all the upgrades are based of real things like space marines and aliens is just good. Add the good music and its almost perfect. Only thing that I don't like is how the all be it good music is just a loop so I usually just play it silent. Great game.

Great app and time waster. Currently saving up 100 Rainbow Triforces for the end cutscene. My only complaint is that the game is short. I'd love to see this game have more characters and trees added to it eventually. Other than that I won't hesitate to say that this is one of the best idle clicker games out there.

A bit weird that the game is called 'Project1_Android' on my phone, but apart from that, this game keeps me interested. I like how I can just keep it idle instead of upgrading the tap, and I can still progress alot. I find one thing weird, I don't keep the exact CPS when it's offline. Not sure if it's meant to be that way.

I beat the game and got the (warning: spoilers)    triforce after the rainbow one then reset. make a idle tree 3.0 with max level for every thing 100 or something. I AM LITERALLY THE BIGGEST FAN OF THIS GAME EVER!!!

It's an amazing game, but I might have found a bug or a glitch. When I went go play it from the shortcut, it was labled Project1_Android. I'm not sure if this is a glitch or not, but it spooked me a little bit.

This game is so awesome! I love the fact that I know all the characters and references in this game! I suggest everyone to at least beat this game once because then you can truly appreciate the thought that went into characters, trees and upgrades! On my second game now!

descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to control the stickman. The goal of the game is to get to the finish line by clinging and jumping horizontal bar. To get to the finish line you will need to overcome many obstacles (saws, axes, walls, fans...). The game has two modes. In the first mode, you consistently go through the levels and gain for each level of reward. The second mode is - free. In it, you can collect coins until will not die or fall.

• Bonus system
• Shop where you can buy the right skin for you (for those who want to offer their version of the skin write in the comments)
• Unusual ragdoll physics
• Stunts, flips
• Unique game play
• Many different objects
• Two level modes
• Stickman destruction

The fans of stickman games will be absolutely thrilled!
Play with true ragdoll physics and pass interesting levels!

Stickman flip on the bar is a free game!
summary: Get stickman to the finish line, jumping from one horizontal bar to another!
title: Stickman flip on the bar

comments: I Give up üòÇ I'm not English natives speaker so puzzle 2 really makes me feels dumb(I don't see that coming bruh). Anyway this is such a good game

Its really the kind of 'solve the puzzle game'  where you think ok i got the answer and type it but you arent even halfway through. Every puzzle is like a chain reaction and makes great use of the web. If youre looking for something to put your brains into then give it a go!
I really like this game. It's a nice change of pace from the current flood of inane clicking games in the market
Everything great except that the app doesn't support API 27 properly. Crashes everytime one enters the code.
Great game, with cool concepts. Rating 4 stars because one of the features (the counter) is not working, and is stuck at 0 for every puzzle
***Possible Spoiler***     You're off by a few degrees in puzzle 5.  Other than that, brilliant fun.

description: Subway School Children SimulatorMetro Train Train School Children Simulator - build a career as a subway mechanic.Do you like to manage different techniques? Then this simulator is for you!Carry children and their parents from home to school and back.Remember - you are responsible for the lives of the passengers you carry!Smoothly accelerate and slow down, without disturbing the comfort of transported people.Stopping at the stations, make sure that all people enter, no one should be late for lessons!Get experience points and change to more modern electric trains!Open all the presented locomotives for a more successful passage of the game.Metro is one of the fastest modes of transport, capable of transporting passengers to destinations without any traffic jams in a very short time!On the straight sections of the route, accelerate to the maximum speed.Come to the cabin of the train!  - Modern 3D graphics will give a lot of unforgettable impressions.- The mechanics of the electric train control is as close as possible to the real one.- A detailed environment will please even experienced players!- View from the cockpit will allow you to immerse yourself in the gameplay.- Qualitative soundtrack will create the atmosphere of the metro.  Share your comments and leave ratings!Start playing now!
descriptionHTML:
Subway School Children Simulator
Metro Train Train School Children Simulator - build a career as a subway mechanic.
Do you like to manage different techniques? Then this simulator is for you!
Carry children and their parents from home to school and back.
Remember - you are responsible for the lives of the passengers you carry!
Smoothly accelerate and slow down, without disturbing the comfort of transported people.
Stopping at the stations, make sure that all people enter, no one should be late for lessons!
Get experience points and change to more modern electric trains!
Open all the presented locomotives for a more successful passage of the game.
Metro is one of the fastest modes of transport, capable of transporting passengers to destinations without any traffic jams in a very short time!
On the straight sections of the route, accelerate to the maximum speed.
Come to the cabin of the train!

- Modern 3D graphics will give a lot of unforgettable impressions.
- The mechanics of the electric train control is as close as possible to the real one.
- A detailed environment will please even experienced players!
- View from the cockpit will allow you to immerse yourself in the gameplay.
- Qualitative soundtrack will create the atmosphere of the metro.

Share your comments and leave ratings!
Start playing now!
summary: Subway School Children Simulator
title: Subway School Children Simulator

comments: After paying to unlock all, was VERY disappointed that there was very little additional content compared to what the was while using ads, and I paid $6+ my daughter was saddened that there was barely anything more to play either

Free version: seems good at 1st, a bit limited being that you only get to help 1 city from the monster and that's only after watching at least 10 videos added to the other videos that you have to watch every few seconds. The ads are too much and its too distracting from the play so you'll lose interest or just get annoyed enough to not want to play.  Paid version: this cost about $5 for no ads, save the city from 2 more monsters, and you get to put makeup on one of the power girls. It's sounds better than it actually is though. The best part is not having ads. The  game itself was ok the 1st time but it goes nowhere. Doesn't take much to help the city, my 3yr old daughter got bored after the 1st time playing it. Also you earn gold every time but there's really nothing to spend it all on. The game just doesn't progress enough. I completely regret spending money on it thinking it would unlock some fun. The graphics are good. But the game play really needs A LOT OF WORK. DISAPPOINTING! Don't waste your money!

descriptionHTML:
- NEW Power Girls’ adventures inside: Ice Monster and superhero makeup!
- To the rescue: help the Power Girls save Super City from the monsters!
- Visit the Power Girls’ house to play dress up, bath and cooking games for girls!
- Learn to sort waste, save the environment, set the table, clean up and more!

Play and learn with the Power Girls in Super City! Join the Power Girls in their girly daily fun at home or go on exciting city rescue adventures.
Every Power Girl has a special skill: beautiful Blaze can control fire, sweet Moana’s superpower is water and charming Flora has the power of nature. Meet your new super friends in the Power Girls’ house to play superhero dress up and bath spa, do makeup, cook in the kitchen and watch TV. When Super City calls for help, catch the monsters and turn them into friendly super citizens!
Power Girls Super City is a new game for girls that combines fun and education, builds good daily care habits and helps to learn how to save the environment.

Game Features

NEW! Ice Monster
Super City is freezing - Ice Monster is turning everything to ice! Fly with Blaze and rescue the cute baby kitten frozen in the ice cube. Help Blaze melt the snow in the city and save Ice Monster by taking him to the North Pole!

NEW! Makeup
After a long day of Super City rescue, Moana needs a facial spa. Apply a face mask and put cucumber slices on her eyes, then wash her face and refresh it with face cream. Next - superhero makeup! Apply colorful eye shadows, glitter, eyeliner, mascara and your favorite lipstick for the perfect look!

Trash Monster
Oh no! Trash Monster is trashing Super City and eating trees! Clean up the city with Flora, learn how to sort the waste and turn Trash Monster into friendly Green Monster!

Dress Up
Can you guess what Flora loves to do the most when the city is safe? Play super girl fashion dress up! Mix and match superhero clothes, create hundreds of dream looks and design Flora a new super girl outfit!

Fire Monster
Hurry to the rescue with Moana and save Super City from Fire Monster! Walking in the city streets, Fire Monsters burns everything he touches. Help Moana put out the fire with her water power and turn Fire Monster into Monster Hot Dog Chef!

Bath Time
Beautiful Moana has the power of water so no wonder she loves bathing! Help her relax in a warm bubble bath, wash her long blue hair and dress Moana for Power Girls' dinner!

Cooking
Cooking with superpowers is super fun! Blaze loves to use her special fire powers in the kitchen. Help her make pasta, learn to set the table and invite Power Girls to boost their energy with delicious food!

More Power Girls Fun Inside!
Relax with your new best friends after long superhero day – watch short videos on TV, get extra coins and use them to unlock new dress up items. Don’t forget to check the Mailbox – play every day, collect six Power Girls' photos and add them to the newspaper!

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

PRIVACY
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Discover more fun with TutoTOONS!
Play our games: http://tutotoons.com/games

Subscribe our YouTube channel: https://goo.gl/3FsX1j
Subscribe our newsletter for families (coming soon): http://eepurl.com/bUWUTj

comments: I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

I understand that people want their games to be entartaining. But i dont understand why there is a thing that downgrades your item upon trying to upgrade it. I have soent the last 3 hours trying to upgrade my helm to lvl 15. Guess where it is now, On goddamn lvl 11. I have spent less time grinding mounts in wow than getting my gear to lvl 15. Stupidest thing ever. One tip. Play the campagin lvls to lvl 40. Then dont do campagin at all and run hell for gold and xp. Repeqt to lvl 80 and then get rekt by the stupid item upgrade system.

This game would be perfect if the controls were better. They are nonsense. Doesn't always shoot when I tap, jumping is crazy, and the game gives you multiple ways to control, but they are all garbage. Also would have appreciated a tutorial so I knew what I was doing

I really like the game. But there's one thing that annoys me: when I don't play this game for a few hours and then I do another battle in dungeon, the game crashes after killing last monster in that battle.  I found out that if I switch on mobile data it works. So I wanted to asked why is that. EDIT: now all works just fine. 5 stars

The best game on market right now. No ads, unless you request it for coins,(which I doubt you'll need to), many modes, including HELL(Infinite waves), MAP(To gain access to abilities and magic) and BATTLE(Normal wave advancement with bosses every 5 levels.). By far the best game that advertises it is not pay to play. Because it's not, despite the option to buy coins.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

comments: I love this game however, it has taken multiple lives from me for no reason. The game starts you off with 5 lives & then I accrued 10 lives from winning multiple lives from extra spins. All of a sudden the lives just disappeared and I was reduced to just 5 lives again. This is the 2nd time this happened to me which sucks cause the game is fun as hell.

It's fun but the further along you get the more it seems to lag and freeze. I've even had bottles stack on top of each other a couple times. It's also kind of a pain to have to wait 30 minutes for another life.

Glitchy as hell, have to continually close the app to start again. Wish I would have seen this before I spent some money playing. Not worth your time or money. It is clealy designed for you to spend spend spend.

Update  from last April.....  Down from 3  stars to 2. It seems after every update this game is getting worse. It crashes more and more and is getting even more frustrating. I don't have any problems with Genies and Gems. But this game still with a lot of potential is just plain out unstable.
Myself and my girlfriend really love playing this together. But whether her Android or mine. Always acts up. Slows down, freezes, crashes. Bummer. Still play though... Addictive.

Game is enjoyable, however the bottom of the screen is cut off on Pixel XL 2. Unable to use power ups and when game has a pop up teaching you what a power up is, you have to minimize game and exit have to move forward. Please fix, until then it is almost unplayable.

Wonderful What a great HD rendition of a classic, cult game.  True to the PC version, there aren't many ports that are spot on like this one.  Great RPG adventure game.  I played this on PC many years ago and it has aged well.  The humor is great, the gameplay is solid and the graphics are lovable.  Not to mention the characters are fun.  I highly suggest this game, old or new to the game!

Brings back memories! Dink smallwood was ahead of its time in the sense that it was truly an indie game in the early age of PC gaming. What distinguishes itself from all other RPGs was just the weirdness...it's very unique and something I hadn't experienced before. It's not a long game like most RPGs and it's definitely worth the $3 for the entertainment it provides!

Good pc port with lots of extras Game plays just like the original, which is great, and the speed up tweet and quick save makes the difficult joystick still enjoyable. The add-ons are a great addition into the dink madness. REVISED: I wrote a money's worth review that ended up being MY phone software and carrier network issues and apologize about the pre-emptive negative review of 3 stars. All add-ons work and play just as well as they do on my pc. Please support these devs they were quick to try and help me with MY issue.

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas
